He is struck by a fire blast from Korra from the side just before he can land his attack. The Lieutenant rolls and gets back on his feet as Korra does a side kick, sending a stream of flame at him. The Lieutenant jumps and rolls out of the way, and runs to the side when Korra shoots more fire at him. Korra chases after him, and he turns around once she's close to strike her. Korra does a back flip to avoid the Lieutenant's attack. She lands in a hand stand, pulls her legs back, then swings them down heel first as the Lieutenant rushes in for another strike, sending out a wave of fire, but the Lieutenant jumps over it.<br><br>Korra and the Lieutenant continue to battle each other, dodging and striking back with fire and electricity. Two chi blockers regain consciousness and run past Lin to join the Lieutenant, but Lin gets up and fire her cables, wrapping them around the chi blockers and then flinging them to either side. Lin gets back on her feet, spinning around on her hands and whipping her cables around her as she does so before retracting them. She looks back up to the zeppelin as it starts floating away. Lin flings a cable at it one more time and catches one of the hanging platforms. She starts reeling the cable in, pulling herself up to the zeppelin.<br><br>There's a flash of electricity and we cut to Korra fighting the Lieutenant. She jumps back and the Lieutenant rushes at her, attacking with a downward swing with both sticks before stabbing at Korra. Korra dodges the attacks, grabs his arm and hits the Lieutenant in the chest with her knee, using the momentum to throw him down, cracking the roof. Korra follows up with a fiery axe kick, but the Lieutenant rolls to a crouch and deflects Korra's foot with his stick. He follows up with a reverse hook kick, Korra avoids it and counters with a punch-punch-kick combo, shooting out more fire. The Lieutenant dodges all of them, ducking under the roundhouse kick. The scene goes into slow motion as the Lieutenant's stick charges for an attack, and we cut to a close up of him as he swings his stick down. Cut to Korra as she ducks and spins out of the way, turning around and striking with her elbow. She hits the Lieutenant, knocking him back and forcing him to his knee. The Lieutenant gets back up, but Korra runs at him. She jumps and spins in the air, delivering two waves of fire from a whirlwind kick followed by an aerial axe kick. The camera zoom out as the Lieutenant is knocked over the side of the roof and goes rolling down.<br><br>Korra lands, but there's a cracking sound. She gasps when the glass beneath her breaks, and we cut to an overhead shot as she goes plummeting. The camera zooms out to show Lin looking down from above. Cut to Lin with a worried expression. She looks back up at the zeppelin, and then bends her cables to let go of it. Lin begins to fall, and shoots her cables down at the hole Korra fell through, attaching four cables to the edges and then reeling them in to make herself fall faster. Cut to Korra falling through the air and into the smoke cloud from the explosion, then to Lin as she shoots a cable to the side, latching it to an Equalist banner. Lin shoots another cable down at Korra, and we cut to Korra and zoom in through the smoke as the cable reaches her and she catches it with her hand. Lin swings out of the smoke along with Korra towards the stands, tearing the banner. Lin lands on her feet and retracts her cables while Korra rolls to her hands and knees. Lin runs over and helps Korra back up.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> You alright? <br><b>Korra:</b> I'm fine, thanks to you.<br><b>Lin:</b> Don't mention it, kid. <i>(they look up at the hole in the roof and see the zeppelin flying away)</i> Looks like we lost this one.<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of Mako and Bolin with Pabu jogging up to Korra. Mako gives Korra a hug.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> I'm so glad you're okay! <br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(giving them both a hug)</i> Me too!<br><br><i>(The camera pans left as Tenzin walks up to Lin and puts a hand on her shoulder.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> I can't believe Amon did this. I played right into his hand. <br><b>Tenzin:</b> He played us all. Republic City is at war.<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot from behind the group and then tilt up towards the smoking ring in the center of the arena, then up to the hole in the glass roof as the moon shines through it.)</i><br><br><br><br>[End Credits]<br>

I know we're not exactly "best friends," but I'm sorry Amon took your bending.<br><b>Tahno:</b> I've been to the best healers in the city. Whatever Amon did to me, it's permanent. <i>(becomes intense)</i> You gotta get him for me.<br><br><i>(Korra nods, her face hard. I want these Equalists to pay for what they've done.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(looking to Tahno)</i> We're ready for you now.<br><b>Tahno:</b> <i>(stands, turns to Korra, and gives her a casual salute and smile)</i> See you around, Avatar.<br><br><i>(Tahno walks away, and scene changes to the Sato Estate. The camera flies up past the front gate and follows the path uphill, past various buildings, to the main mansion at the highest point. The scene cuts inside to a Lionturtle statue with a waterfall pouring out of its carved mouth. Pabu squeals and takes a flying leap off the statue's head to dive into the large pool. The view shifts to show the whole room, decorated luxuriously with carved golden walls, lawn furniture, and potted plants. Ever been behind the wheel?<br><b>Korra:</b> The only thing I know how to drive is a polar bear dog<br><b>Asami:</b> You want me to take you for a spin?<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(eyes wide, excited)</i> Let's do it.<br><br><i>(The view cuts to the starting line, where two Satomobiles are revving their engines. He guns his car forward, but his front wheel collides with the gold car's rear wheel, pushing the red car off balance and into a spin. The challenger falls behind as the gold car continues onward. As she arcs through the air, she deploys large metal wrist blades out of her armor. The view cuts inside the cockpit, where a masked Equalist shifts out of the way of the blade. More blade attacks burst in through the various windows, keeping the driver from doing anything but twisting around in fright. Back outside the cockpit, Lin continues to stab away as the mechatank rolls backwards into some scaffolding.<br><br>The view zooms out from the dusty crash and through the side window of Hiroshi's cockpit. They are pulling at their whips, grunting with exertion, but they're starting to be pulled forward by their quarry. One even carves Earthbending gouges in the floor with his feet, but that fails to keep him in place. The view shifts to one of the Metalbenders' backs, where the spool of metal whip-wire is starting to smoke as the wire is yanked continuously by the struggle. The view cuts to one of the wrangled mechatanks, with two whips wrapped around its left claw. The arm moves around, trying to resist, then locks into place and pauses for a second. Suddenly, electricity emanates from the claw, traveling up the metal wire and shocking the Metalbenders. They all scream and get launched backwards. The mechatank is freed.<br><br>Lin, still stabbing away at her unmoving mechatank target despite having already shattered every window, turns to see what's going on and is immediately struck by one of the projectile grappling-claws. She is thrown off her mechatank, crashes and bounces off the nearby scaffolding, and then is yanked flying into the air by another mechatank. She comes to a hard landing on the floor and bounces a few times.<br><br>Elsewhere, Korra and Tenzin are double-teaming another mechatank. It's pushed up against a while, struggling against continuous fire and air blasts. The view cuts inside the tank's cockpit, where Hiroshi is being bounced around by the attacks. His pince-nez glasses are knocked off his face and fall off camera. Hiroshi growls, and pushes both his control levels forward. Outside, one of the mechatank's grappling-claws shoot forward at Korra, but she dodges with a series of backward flips that carry her out of the claw's continuing path. She Earthbends a chunk of the floor into the air and fires it back at the mechatank, but another claw comes at her from behind and catches her. She is pushed flying into a some of the metal machinery on the far side of the factory, and bounces off painfully.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> Korra!<br><br><i>(As Korra falls, Tenzin shoots out a swirling sphere of air that catches her and lands her softly on the ground. Seeing her safe, Tenzin turns back to the mechatank and dodges another grappling-claw attack. Within his cockpit, Hiroshi works some more levers, and his tank rolls foward while firing its claws again. Another mechatank joins the attack. Tenzin once again dodges all the claws, and jumps into an Airbending move that summons a giant, spinning wind-wheel around him. Tenzin rides it forward like he's surfing and avoids another claw, then leaps into the air. Hiroshi's mechatank stops and fire some new projectile, a metal disc that deploys small, whip-like tendrils. It catches Tenzin as he spins through the air in preparation for another counter-attack, wrapping around and electrocuting him. He lands hard on the floor and stays down.<br><br>Hiroshi's tank comes to a stop, and the front opens into a series of panels that lets the driver climb out. Hiroshi steps down onto the factory floor and looks at his defeated enemies- Lin, Tenzin, Korra. The Lieutenant steps forward to join him.)</i><br><br><b>Hiroshi:</b> Well, I'd say that was a near flawless test run. <i>(turns to the other mechatanks and points at the Benders)</i> Load everyone into the transports and deliver them to Amon!<br><br><i>(The scene jumps to show a pair of trucks now parked amidst the mechatanks. Masked Equalists carry the unconscious Metalbenders to the trucks' cargo-containers. Off to the side, near where Tenzin, Lin, and Korra are lying, a panel of the floor lifts up slightly and scrapes to the side. Bolin and Mako peak out through the new hole in the floor.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> Oh no.<br><br><i>(The Equalists toss another Metalbender into a truck.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> Korra was right! We gotta do something, quick!<br><br><i>(As the Equalists continue their work, the brothers sneak closer, stopping to hide behind a large cylindrical tank. After pausing to make sure they haven't been spotted, they run out to the others. Bolin gets Tenzin and hauls the Airbender up onto his back, audibly struggling with the weight, while Mako lifts up Korra on his own back. Then they both lean down and each grab one of Lin's arms.<br><br>The view suddenly cuts to Hirshi, wearing mechanical gloves that crackle with electricity. The Lieutenant is beside him, fighting sticks at ready.)</i><br><br><b>Hiroshi:</b> Not so fast, boys.<br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(drops Lin, and starts gesturing with Tenzin's arms)</i> Hello, Mr. Sato. Wow. What a really, swell, scary, factory you have here under your giant mansion.<br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(icily angry)</i> Sponsoring our team, supporting the Avatar. It was all just a big cover.<br><b>Hiroshi:</b> Yes. And the most difficult part was watching my daughter... <i>(closes eyes)</i> traipse around with a Firebending streetrat like you!<br><br><i>(Hiroshi sends another shock through his gloves, and steps towards the brothers, but is halted by Asami's voice and turns around with surprise.)</i><br><br><b>Asami:</b> Dad, stop! <i>(closes eyes and turns her head away, then looks back at her father, sad)</i> Why?<br><b>Hiroshi:</b> <i>(sadly)</i> Sweetie, I wanted to keep you out of this for as long as I could, <i>(view briefly cuts to Mako, still holding Korra as she wakes up)</i> but now that you know the truth, please, forgive me. These people, these benders... They took away your mother, the love of my life. They've ruined the world! But with Amon we can fix it, and build a perfect world together. <i>(Asami has a stunned expression, then averts her gaze.)</i> We can help people like us everywhere. <i>(Hiroshi takes off one of his electric gloves, and holds it out.)</i> Join me, Asami.<br><br><i>(Asami just stares, her eyes glistening with unshed tears. She slowly moves towards her father. She looks at the glove with an expression that could be as much fear as wonder, and reaches out a trembling hand. Mako, Korra, and Bolin all watch. Bolin looks crushed. Asami takes the glove, and slips it on. She looks at it on her hand, her expression harsh.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> No.<br><b>Asami:</b> <i>(sad)</i> I love you, Dad.<br><br><i>(Asami closes her eyes and turns her head, then shoves her gloved hand against Hiroshi's chest and hits him with a massive burst of electricity. He screams and then falls. As soon as he's down, the Lieutenant rushes over and tries to attack Asami with his sticks, but she gives a high kick that pushe his first blow out of the way. She stops his second attack by grabbing his wrist, and twists him around in an Aikido move that both brings him to his knees and shocks him with the glove. He collapses to the ground with a scream of his own.<br><br>Mako and Korra stare with stunned, slack-jawed expressions. Two of the mechatanks turn to view the commotion.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> Let's get out of here!<br><br><i>(The group follows Mako into a run. They hop down through the hole Bolin made before. Just as Asami is escaping, leaving only Bolin, one of the mechatanks fires off a series of the electrified bola-disks that had been used to subdue Tenzin. Before the first one lands, Bolin hops down the hole and pulls it shut behind him by Earthbending an adjacent slab of the floor over like a door. The next two disks bounce harmlessly off.<br><br>The scene cuts to outside, where the Metalbender airship is flying away from the Sato estate. Within, Asami watches through the windows as her home shrinks away. She looks devastated, and clutches a pole for support. The camera zooms over her shoulder to show Mako looking at her, with Korra behind him, then continues past them to a bench where Lin is lying. Tenzin stands over her.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(weakly)</i> My metalbenders are on their way to Amon, and it's all my fault. Tarrlok's right, I failed as Chief. First thing in the morning, I'm handing in my resignation.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(urgent)</i> No! You can't give up like this.<br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(weak, but angry)</i> I'm not giving up. <i>(pulls herself up into a sitting position)</i> I'm going to find my officers and take Amon down. But I'm going to do it my way, outside the law.<br><br><i>(Tenzin looks at her, but doesn't react.<br><br>Back with the others, Korra has her own defeated expression. Behind her, Bolin is looking out the window with Pabu on his shoulder. The camera pans to the side to show Mako right next to her.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> I'm sorry I didn't believe you, but Asami's dad being an Equalist is not an easy thing to believe, even now.<br><b>Korra:</b> I know. I'm sorry this whole thing happened.<br><b>Mako:</b> So, does your offer to live at the Air Temple still stand?<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(smiling)</i> Of course it does. And Asami's welcome too.<br><b>Mako:</b> Thank you so much.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(puts a hand on Mako's shoulder)</i> After everything she's been through, she's going to need you, Mako.<br><br><i>(Mako nods, then turns around and approaches Asami. He puts his arm around her, and she shifts to look at him before snuggling against his chest. Korra watches for a moment, then turns away. Outside, the airship approaches the glowing Republic City.)</i><br><br><br><br>[End Credits]<br>

After discovering that her father, Hiroshi Sato, is working with the enemy, Asami turns against him. With the Equalist army growing stronger, who will help the Avatar stop Amon and restore balance to the city?<br><br><br><br><b><u>Act I</u></b><br><br><i>(Episode opens up to the sea looking towards Air Temple Island. Fly, sky bison, fly! <br><br><i>(Naga does not react to Meelo's antics and Ikki continues to chase Pabu around the dock. We can hear them grunting as they walk down the ramp.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> Oh, I thought you were only bringing a few <i>(Korra shrieks on that word as the luggage threaten to topple onto her but the Air Acolytes manage to balance themselves in time.)</i> things? <br><b>Mako:</b> Trust me, <i>(the Air Acolytes re-orientate themselves and they walk towards the island)</i> it could have been worse.<br><b>Korra:</b> No problem. Everyone here wants you guys to feel welcome.<br><br><i>(Cut to the gates of Air Temple Island as Naga chases after Pabu while the rest of the teens and children stroll behind them. Camera cuts to reveal Meelo staring rather adoringly at her with a smile on his face.)</i><br><br><b>Meelo:</b> You're pretty, <i>(reaches a hand upwards)</i> can I have some of your hair?<br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(Camera returns back to the walking trio)</i> Looks like <i>(Asami turns her head back towards Mako)</i> I have some competition.<br><br><i>(Camera pans out to the whole group and Ikki turns back to address the newcomers.)</i><br><br><b>Ikki:</b> And now for the grand tour! <i>(Cut to Ikki's back view as she points to the left and the teens turn their heads towards that direction)</i> The flying bison sleep in those caves down there, <i>(Ikki turns towards the camera and points upwards as the teens look up)</i> and that's the temple Grandpa Aang built, <i>(the girl points to the right and again, the teens look toward the direction she's pointing)</i> and that's the greenhouse where we grow the vegetables we eat! <br><br><i>(The teens turn their heads back towards Ikki and we cut to a close up of Ikki with a wide smile on her face.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(off screen)</i> I have a couple questions. <i>(Ikki drops her smile and turns her attention towards the earthbender. Cut to Bolin who begins to ask his questions rapidly/)</i> Is this an all vegetarian island? <i>(points off screen)</i> Is that where you train airbending? <i>(grabs his shirt)</i> Do we have to wear Air Acolyte clothes? <i>(looks gleefully at Ikki)</i> Do we each get our own sky bison? <i>(points a finger up in the air)</i> And  final question, how many trees  are on this island? <i>(Cut to a side view of Ikki with a finger on chin, deep in thought and she begins to answer back quickly.)</i><br><b>Ikki:</b> Yes, yes, no, no, ten thousand five hundred and fifty-two.<br><br><i>(Cut to a frontal shot of the teens as they blink at her, all dumbfounded.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(awkwardly)</i> So where are we going to be staying? <i>(Camera pans to the left to reveal Meelo standing beside Asami)</i><br><b>Meelo:</b> You're a boy, boys have to stay on the boys' side. <i>(Meelo points off screen)</i><br><b>Jinora:</b> I'd <i>(Mako turns towards Jinora)</i> be happy to show you to the men's dormitory. <i>(Jinora proceeds to walk off screen as Mako follows. Camera cuts to a side view of Korra and the rest of the teens.)</i><br><b>Bolin:</b> I'm a boy! <i>(he proceeds to follow Jinora)</i><br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(turns towards Meelo)</i> Meelo, why don't you go with the boys too?<br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(turns towards Asami and walks backward as he raises a hand in farewell)</i> We shall meet again soon, beautiful woman. <i>(Meelo smiles and runs off screen. Korra turns towards the camera and walks off.)</i><br><b>Korra:</b> Ikki and I will take you to your room this way.<br><br><i>(Asami follows Korra and we cut to what appears to be the women's dormitory. Korra enters the room and slams the door shut before Ikki can enter.)</i><br><br><b>Ikki:</b> Hey!<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(off screen)</i> Run along, Ikki! <br><br><i>(Ikki sighs as her eyes glow white comically and she roars like a tiger as she claws her hand around like a cat. Her eyes stop glowing as she folds her arms and pouts angrily. Cut to the inside of the room with Korra leaning against the door while Asami looks lost in though.)</i> <br><br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(sighs and rubs the back of her head)</i> So... <i>(walks towards Asami)</i> here's your room! <i>(Camera pans across the slightly bare room)</i> I know this is a little rustic compared to what you're used to...<br><b>Asami:</b> <i>(Cut to a frontal shot of the teens)</i> I think it's really charming. <i>(walks towards the window)</i> And the best part about it? Nothing here reminds me of my father. Thank you for your hospitality.<br><br><i>(Her sentence gets interrupted by a few urgent knocks on the door.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> Ikki, I swear, <i>(Korra looks at the door angrily while Asami stares at her, shocked.)</i> if you don't leave us alone I'm gonna- <i>(Cut to the doors as they slide open to reveal Tenzin. Ominous music plays in the background. Camera fades to reveal the crowd in front of the police station has dissipated. Cut to Tarrlok shaking the Fire Nation councilwoman's hand as she walks away with the rest of the council members while Tarrlok bows, smiling. Tenzin walks into screen.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> Tarrlok, <i>(Tarrlok turns his head towards Tenzin)</i> I don't know what you did to get Chief Saikhan in your pocket, but I highly doubt it was legal. <i>(Tarrlok still has a smile on his face)</i><br><b>Tarrlok:</b> Oh, Tenzin. Always the conspiracy theorist. Now that your little Pro-Bending distractions are over, I look forward <i>(raises a hand out)</i> to your return to my <i>(places a hand on his chest)</i>task force.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(Cut back to Korra with her arms crossed)</i> Huh, forget it! Didn't you get the memo from the White Lotus? I'm a spiritual failure too.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(turns his head back to the front)</i> You may have made a connection without realizing it. <i>(Cut to a frontal shot of a mopey Korra)</i> Perhaps, something you mistook as a dream?<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(blinks and replies uncertainly)</i> Maybe... I had a few weird hallucinations... <i>(Cut to Tenzin's back view)</i> but I hardly even remember them.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(He turns towards the camera)</i> And did you see any of the previous avatars in these visions?<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(Camera returns back to Korra)</i> I saw Aang... it seemed like he was in trouble. What do you think it means?<br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(Cut to a side view shot of Tenzin)</i> Hm. I don't know. <i>(strokes his beard as he thinks)</i> But I urge you to meditate on these visions. <i>(Scene changes to a far shot of Oogi flying over the sea towards Air Temple Island)</i> I believe Aang's spirit must be trying to tell you something.<br><br><i>(Fade to evening as the camera points towards Avatar Aang's statue. Camera slowly pans back to reveal Korra staring at his statue. The angle changes to show Korra sitting on a cliff. Cut to a close up of Korra as we see tears streaming down her face. She cries and grabs her head, upset.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(off screen)</i> Korra? <i>(Korra turns her head towards the voice)</i> You out here? <br><br><i>(She proceeds to wipe the tears from her face. Cut to a bush as Pabu's head peeks out and it chirps. )</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(hollers off screen as Pabu climbs onto Korra's shoulder)</i> Kooorrraaa! <i>(Pabu stops in front of Korra and lick the tears off her eyes. I'm the worst avatar ever! I just feel...alone.<br><b>Asami:</b> <i>(Cut to a close up of Asami and Mako)</i> No that's nonsense, you are amazing! <br><b>Mako:</b> Yeah, and remember, Aang hadn't mastered all of the elements when he was battling the Fire Nation. Cut to a frontal shot of the car as it speeds out. At the council meeting, first thing in the morning.<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of Saikhan as he glares, then cut to a medium shot as Korra leans in towards him.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(pointing, then grabbing Saikhan's chin)</i> You're officially the worst Chief of Police ever!<br><br><i>(Tenzin takes Korra by the shoulder and pulls her away.)</i> <br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> Calm down, Korra, I'll get this sorted out, we just need to be patient. <i>(Korra and Tenzin turn to leave. To get to me?<br><b>Tarrlok:</b> I need your answer.<br><b>Korra:</b> No. You might be able to manipulate Chief Saikhan into following you, but it won't work on me.<br><br><i>(Tarrlok stands up and turns around, facing the waterfall.)</i><br><br><b>Tarrlok:</b> You will regret that decision.<br><b>Korra:</b> You need to be stopped! You're just as bad as Amon! <br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of Tarrlok's eyes as they go wide in reaction to Korra's words. Cut to a shot from behind Tarrlok and pan up so we can see his reflection in the water.)</i><br><br><b>Tarrlok:</b> I've tried to work with you, Korra. But you've made it impossible.<br><br><i>(Tarrlok swiftly turns around and throws a blade of water at Korra and cutting his desk in half. Korra dodges the attack. It cuts off some strands of hair and smashes into the bookshelf behind her as she rolls out of the way. Korra earthbends the floor at Tarrlok, knocking him back into the waterfall. She then lunges and shoots two streams of fire from her fists at Tarrlok. Tarrlok waterbends a bubble around himself to block the attack. After the attack stops, Tarrlok begins throwing little shards of ice at Korra in rapid succession. Korra back flips to dodge, and the scene goes into slow motion as it cuts to a close up of her in the air. Korra is pushed back against the wall. She grunts and dodges and deflects the shards with her fists as the scene goes into slow motion and we cut to a close up again. One shard grazes her side and she grunts in pain. Tarrlok continues the hail of ice, and Korra lifts up a large stone slab with earthbending to defend herself. Korra grunts as she swings her arms around, and earthbends the mural behind the waterfall. The mural rotates and catches Tarrlok by surprise, knocking him through the wall. He stumbles over the railing, but catches it before he falls.<br><br>Tarrlok catches his breath, his hair a mess, and looks up at the battle worn Korra as she stands in front of the hole on the wall.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> Still think I'm a half-baked Avatar? <i>(bends the floor and knocks Tarrlok down to ground level. Korra jumps down and creates a shockwave and crater when she lands in front of Tarrlok. Cut to a close up as she pants and stands up)</i> What are you gonna do now? You're all out of water, pal!<br><br><i>(Korra begins to approach Tarrlok as he crawls backward. She raised her palms up and creates flames in each hand. Korra lets out a battle cry as she lunges at Tarrlok. Tarrlok stands and holds his hands out, making Korra stop in her tracks and causing the flames to fly to either side of Tarrlok. Korra grunts in pain a moment, then Tarrlok moves his hands, causing Korra's arms to twist back. She groans in pain as Tarrlok holds his stance, and his hand movements force her to her knees.)</i><br><br><b>Tarrlok:</b> You're in my way, Avatar, and you need to be removed!<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(paralyzed and terrified)</i> You're... you're a... bloodbender?<br><b>Tarrlok:</b> Very observant. <br><b>Korra:</b> Its... not a full moon how... how are you doing this?<br><b>Tarrlok:</b> There are a lot of things you don't know about me.<br><br><i>(Tarrlok twists Korra around before throwing her against a pillar. Cut to Korra as she falls to the floor and looks stunned. Cut to Korra's point of view as she watches Tarrlok approach her before her vision blurs and fades out. Cut to a flashback dream of the close up of Yakone's eyes, then to a shot of Sokka in pain, then to Toph throwing a metal cable out. Cut to a different angle showing the cable headed for Yakone before Toph is blood bent and the cable falls. Cut to a shot of Yakone looking back and chuckling as Aang reaches out towards him, then cut to a close up of Aang paralyzed. The scene fades back to Korra's point of view as she wakes up in the back of a truck, groaning, Tarrlok is about to close the door. Cut to a shot of Korra showing her tied up.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> Where are you taking me?<br><b>Tarrlok:</b> Somewhere where no one will find you. Say goodbye to Republic City, Avatar Korra! You'll never see it again.<br><br><i>(Korra sits up and roars at Tarrlok, breathing fire at him. Tarrlok closes the doors and avoids the fire just in time. Tarrlok slams his fist against the door and walks around to the front. Cut to a close up of Korra's profile.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> You can't do this! Let me out!<br><br><i>(Korra yells as the engine starts and the truck drives off. Cut to a shot of it driving down the city streets, then to a profile shot of Tarrlok, looking grim. Cut again to the truck driving down the streets at night, then tilt up to a shot of the mountains and the crescent moon in the sky.)</i><br><br><br><br>[End Credits]<br>

After Tarrlok arrested her friends, Korra confronted the councilman in his chambers, but the heated argument quickly turned into an all-out bending battle. Desperate to save himself, Tarrlok revealed his ability to bloodbend and took Korra far from Republic City. Will the Avatar's friends find her before it's too late?<br><br><br><br><b><u>Act I</u></b><br><br><i>(The episode opens up to a basement showing a metal box and the lights above the box keeps flickering. Korra's silhouette slowly floats through the doorway. Cut to the top of the stairs as we see Korra's shadow and her feet are slowly levitated into screen. Camera angle changes to  a frontal shot of Korra who is struggling, spasming and appears to be in a lot of pain. He levitates Korra into the box and turns her around to face him. Tarrlok still has an intense look of concentration on his face. Cut to a close up of Korra's face.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(fearful)</i> What are you doing? <i>(Cut to the bottom of the box as we see her feet land on the floor. The camera quickly switches back to the outside of the box as Tarrlok quickly slams the door shut.)</i> TARRLOK! <i>(We return back to the inside of the box as Korra pounds on the door with all her might)</i> You can't keep me in here forever!<br><br><i>(Outside the box, we see Tarrlok ignoring her threats as he casually walks up the stairs. Korra keeps pounding on the box. Cut to the outside of the house as Tarrlok walks towards a blue Satomobile and enters it. The engine starts and he drives the Satomobile off screen. Camera pulls out to show a house out in the snowy wilderness and the Satomobile drives down the track. Cut to another scene of the snowy mountains and it is apparent that the place is deserted. <br><br>Cut to a building on Air Temple Island at sunrise and we hear a telephone ringing. He looks towards the phone and crawls over his father's face to pick him up. Tenzin gets rudely awakened by that. Meelo can be heard picking up the phone. Cut to the front of Meelo's face as he has a candlestick phone in his hand. He holds the receiver up in his ear and the speaker near his mouth.)</i><br><br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(Tenzin can be seen sitting up behind Meelo)</i> Who is this? It's six in the morning. This better be important.<br><br><i>(Tenzin takes the phone from his son and the camera changes angle and we can now see Pema waking up in the background.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> Councilman Tenzin here. <i>(Camera pans to show Tenzin only as his eyebrows raise up with surprise)</i> What?<br><br><i>(Cut to a photographer taking pictures inside City Hall. Camera angle changes to an overhead view of the scene to show the mess Korra and Tarrlok did the night before. A few metalbender cops are on the scene and Chief Saikhan is standing near Tarrlok who is being healed. We can see Tenzin walking through the doors. Cut to a close up of Tenzin walking in and we immediately change to the photographer's point of view through the camera lens as he focuses on an Equalist glove and takes a picture of it. After the flash, the view changes to the broken balcony and the photographer slowly pans his camera down to a bola wrapped around a pillar. Another picture is taken. After the flash, we see Tenzin walking towards Tarrlok as a waterbending healer heals Tarrlok's arm. Saikhan is taking notes.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> What happened? <i>(Tarrlok and Saikhan turn their heads to look at Tenzin)</i> What was Korra doing at City Hall?<br><br><i>(Tarrlok stands up and pull his sleeve down as the healer walk away.)</i><br><br><b>Tarrlok:</b> <i>(calmly)</i> As I told Chief Saikhan, Korra came to my office late last night. She was upset that I arrested her friends. She asked me to release them and... <i>(Tarrlok pauses and the camera quickly cuts to a close up of his face.)</i> that's when the Equalists attacked. <i>(We are shown a sepia toned flashback of Tarrlok placing an Equalist glove on the crater in the ground)</i> I tried to protect Korra. <i>(Tarrlok throws a bola towards the pillar)</i> We were outnumbered. <i>(Tarrlok puts on an electric glove and he activates it, making it spark in his hand)</i> Then I was electrocuted. <i>(He puts the glove to his arm and electrocutes him as he groans in pain. The flashback ends and it fades back to the present time.)</i> When I came to, the police had arrived but Korra was gone. I'm so sorry. <i>(turns his head towards Saikhan)</i> Chief Saikhan, mobilize the entire police force. We have to find the Avatar.<br><br><i>(Scene changes to Lin lying in a hospital bed and the camera slowly pans across the road. The radio buzzes to life off screen.)</i><br><br><b>Radio Broadcaster:</b> We interrupt your regularly scheduled broadcast <i>(Cut to a close up of Lin with her eyes closed as she rests)</i> to bring you this special report. <i>(Lin opens her eyes and turns her head towards the radio)</i> Late last night Equalists attacked City Hall, <i>(Lin sits up with her eyes wide open in shock and she immediately turns up the volume of the radio)</i> subduing Councilman Tarrlok and capturing Avatar Korra. Details are still coming in but--<br><br><i>(Lin turns off the radio abruptly and gets out of bed but it is apparent that she is still injured as she winces and grabs her arm. Cut to a back view of Lin as she looks at her leg and arm guards as well as her main body armor. Cut to the front view of Lin's body as the armor slides down her neck, waist and a belt is fastened around it. Cut to Lin's bare arm as her arm guard flies onto it. She puts on a cloak as it covers the entire screen.<br><br>When the cloak is gone, the scene has changes to Toph's statue outside the police station. It is glinting in the sun. Cut to Asami's back view looking at the door as Lin throws the door aside.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> Hope you got enough beauty rest. <i>(Camera cuts to a close up of Lin's face as she beckons Asami with her head)</i> Come on, I'm busting you out.<br><b>Asami:</b>  <i>(Cut to a happy and smiling Asami)</i> Thanks. <i>(she stands up and walks off screen)</i> I owe you.<br><br><i>(Scene changes once more to Bolin facing the camera and Mako with his back facing his brother. We hear drops of water. Cut to Mako's front view and we can see Bolin standing in front of an urinal.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> Are you done yet?<br><b>Bolin:</b> Cover your ears! I can't go with you listening.<br><br><i>(Mako sighs and cover his ears. The door opens loudly and Mako is startled by the loud noise. A look of relief floods his face.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> Asami!<br><br><i>(Cut to a front view of Bolin as the top half of his face reddens with embarrassment. We can see Asami and Mako embracing.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> Aaaagh! <i>(turns his head towards his brother as Mako and Asami kiss)</i> A little privacy please?<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of the kiss as Asami pulls away and puts a hand on Mako's cheek.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> Are you all right?<br><b>Asami:</b> I'm fine. It's so good to see you.<br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(off screen)</i> Hate to break up your lovers' reunion, <i>(Cut to Lin looking concerned)</i> but Korra's in trouble. Amon captured her.<br><br><i>(Camera angle changes to a frontal view of a shocked Mako with his eyes and brows raised. The camera zooms in slowly on him.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> No. No, she can't be gone.<br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(Cut back to Lin as she turns her head outwards)</i> Come on. We have an Avatar to rescue.<br><br><i>(Cut back to the inside of the cell as Mako and Asami run out. Bolin turns around to join them. Cut to Lin moving her fingers up as we hear a zipper being pulled up. We immediately cut to Bolin making a noise of shock and embarrassment as his hands go down.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(Cut back to Lin as she turns away)</i> Your fly was down. <i>(walk off screen)</i><br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(his cheeks are red)</i> Thanks for catching that.<br><br><i>(Bolin walks off screen and the scene changes to the house back in the snowy mountains. Cut to the box in the basement as we hear pounding against the metal. Cut to the inside of the box as Korra throws her body onto the box, attempting to make the door budge. She grunts and groans.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> Somebody! <i>(pounds on the door with her arm)</i> Help! <i>(her poundings soften)</i> Please! <i>(Cut to a close up of Korra's chin as she pants and sweats drip down her cheek. Camera changes to another angle and it is now facing the door. Korra slides down to the floor against the door and she look tired.)</i> Please.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(Camera slowly zooms in onto Korra and Tenzin's voice is heard as a voice over)</i> I urge you to meditate on these visions. <i>(Korra opens her eyes)</i>  I believe Aang's spirit is trying to tell you something.<br><br><i>(Camera zooms out on Korra already seated in a lotus position and she brings her fists together to meditate. The camera slowly zooms in on her and we are taken to a flashback.<br><br>We see the back of an adult Aang's head. He hears some foot steps behind him and turns his head.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(off screen)</i> What are you doing here, Aang? <i>(Cut to Toph in her metalbender cop armor and she has metalbender cops behind her)</i> I told you I have this under control.<br><b>Aang:</b>  <i>(Cut to a concerned Aang)</i> Under normal circumstances I wouldn't get involved, but if what those victims said is true we're not dealing with a normal criminal. <br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(Cut to a view above Aang's shoulder looking at Toph)</i> Fine. <i>(turns to the side and waves at Aang to follow)</i> Follow me, Twinkletoes. <br><br><i>(Cut to a frontal view of Toph as Aang turns towards her)</i> <br><br><b>Aang:</b> Toph, I'm forty years old. <i>(Toph continues to walk as her cops follow)</i> You think you could stop with the nicknames?<br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(walking nearly off screen)</i> 'fraid not.<br><br><i>(Aang shakes his head and follows Toph. Scene changes to what looks like a fancy restaurant. We see Yakone sitting at a table while a couple of bodyguards stand in front of it. Aang, Toph and the rest of the cops walk into screen.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> It's over. <i>(Cut to a frontal shot of Toph as she points a finger at Yakone)</i> You're under arrest, Yakone. <br><b>Yakone:</b> <i>(Cut to a close up of Yakone with his eyes closed and head down)</i> What is Republic City coming to? <i>(opens his eyes and lifts his head up)</i> Used to be a man could enjoy his lunch in peace.<br><br><i>(Cut to the side of Toph as she metalbends a spool of wire out and it catches Yakone's wrist, making him slightly lose his hold on his chopsticks. You should be in prison.<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of Lin and the teens as Bolin waves sheepishly while Asami smiles smugly. She can track Korra.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(closes his eyes and lowers his head down sadly)</i> I'm afraid her polar bear-dog is missing as well.<br><b>Bolin:</b> Then where do we start?<br><b>Lin:</b> My guess is that the Equalists are hiding underground, <i>(places her arms akimbo)</i> in the maze of tunnels beneath the city.<br><b>Asami:</b> <i>(off screen)</i> Underground. <i>(Tenzin, Mako and Lin look towards her)</i> Just like my father's secret factory. <i>(Cut to Asami with her arms crossed and looking angry)</i> Figures.<br><b>Bolin:</b> Yeah, yeah. <i>(places a hand on his chin)</i> That makes sense. When those chi-blockers had me in their truck, in sounded like we drove into a tunnel.<br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(has a realization and looks a little happy)</i> I know where to start looking. Come on. <i>(The teens run off screen and the camera pans right to Lin and Tenzin)</i><br><b>Lin:</b> Wherever Amon is keeping Korra, I bet that's where my officers are too.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> Let's bring them all home, Lin.<br><br><i>(Scene changes to an overhead view of the city. The camera pans down to an empty yard Oogi flies into screen with the rest on its saddle. The sky bison lands and everyone disembarks. Cut to a back view shot of Mako as he look around and walk down an alley.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> The truck with Bolin took off down this alley. <br><br><i>(Mako turns his head back towards the group and points. She stands up.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> Korra has to be in there. <i>(Cut to the inside of the tunnel looking outwards as Lin gets into a stance.)</i> Somewhere.<br> <br><i>(As he finishes his sentence, Lin raises her arms upwards and the metal grates slide up. Fade to a commercial break.)</i><br><br><br><br><b><u>Act II</u></b><br><br><i>(The episode returns to the group having entered the tunnel and stumbling across four different tunnels heading in various directions. Cut to a close up of Mako who has firebent a small flame in his hand and he is holding it up high to illuminate the area.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> Let's try this way.<br><b>Asami:</b> <i>(steps forward and extends her hand out)</i> And what if Korra's not down there?<br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(a little harsh)</i> Then we pick another tunnel until we find her.<br><br><i>(Mako clenches his fist with determination and proceeds to walk off screen as the rest follow. He seems really worried about Korra.<br><b>Bolin:</b> Yeah, we all are.<br><b>Asami:</b> <i>(turns her head forward quickly)</i> I know, but he's your brother. <i>(turns her head back to Bolin and brings the back of her hand in front of her mouth to whisper)</i> Do you think he likes Korra as more than just a friend? <i>(Cut to a front shot of the pair as Bolin chuckles)</i><br><b>Bolin:</b> What? <i>(swipes his hands in a 'no' gesture and both of them stop walking)</i> No! That's just gossip. Where did you hear that? <i>(points a finger towards Asami)</i> Crazy talk is coming out of your mouth right now. Heh.<br><i>(Bolin puts his hands behind his back and stands suspiciously)</i><br><b>Asami:</b> <i>(puts a hand on Bolin's shoulder)</i> What do you know, Bolin? Come on. Spill it. <i>(Bolin tugs his collar nervously and the camera angle changes to a view above Asami's left shoulder looking towards Bolin)</i><br><b>Bolin:</b> Nothing. I mean... <i>(places a finger to his forehead)</i> there was this one <i>(sticks one finger up)</i> during the tournament when Mako and Korra kissed, but-- <i>(Cut to a close up of Asami looking shocked as the camera zooms in on her)</i><br><b>Asami:</b> They kissed? <br><br><i>(She looks toward Mako sadly and the camera cuts to a back view shot of the pair as we can see the rest of the group walking a little ahead of them.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> Believe me, I was upset over it too, but I'm <i>(places a hand on his chest)</i> over it. I don't think it meant anything. <i>(He places a hand on his waist and looks to the side. Camera cuts to a back view shot behind Bolin looking towards a hurt Asami.)</i><br><b>Asami:</b> <i>(voice breaking slightly)</i> I doubt that.<br><br><i>(Cut to a back view shot of the pair as they walk but Asami turns her head backwards after a couple of steps and we hear the engine of a motorcycle. Cut to a front view overhead shot of the group in the tunnel as we see the headlights of the motorcycle illuminating the back of the tunnel.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> Hide. <br><br><i>(Mako extinguishes his flame and everyone runs towards a pillar. Cut to a close up of the back of the tunnel as two Equalists drive their motorcycles into view and cycle off screen. Cut to a close up of the dashboard of the motorcycle and a hand comes into screen as the Equalist flips the switch in the middle with his thumb. Cut to group hiding behind the pillar looking out at a wall as it flips inwards, revealing a hidden passage and both of them drive in. The wall flips back into place. Cut to a close up of Lin looking shocked at first and then determined as she runs out from behind the pillar and the rest follow. Camera angle changes to a profile shot of the wall as the group stops in front of it.<br><br>Cut to a close up frontal shot of Lin as she closes her eyes and reaches her hand upwards to touch the wall off screen. We are then shown Lin's hand as it rubs the wall. She then pauses in the middle and she rotates her hand to the right. Cut to the back of the wall as we can see a red wheel valve turning and two metal columns sliding out from the side. We return back to a back view shot of the group as Lin pushes her palm upwards and the wall flips upwards. Lin then gestures into the passage and the group runs in as the wall flips shut.<br><br>Scene changes to the inside of the secret Equalist base and we can see three motorcycles and two metal trucks in the foreground and a group of Equalists in the background loading things into a tram. Cut to them looking towards Amon as they stand up and Amon carries Tarrlok on his shoulders.)</i><br><br><b>Amon:</b> I'll take care of him. You four retrieve the Avatar. Don't underestimate her. <i>(Cut to a close up of Korra's blinking eyes.)</i> Electrocute the box to knock her out before you open it.<i>(Korra's eyes move to the side and her expression changes to fear.)</i><br><b>Lieutenant:</b> <i>(off screen)</i> My pleasure.<br><br><i>(Cut to the top view of the box as Korra look up with desperation. Cut back to the inside of the box as we hear footsteps walking down the stairs. Korra looks at her arm band and touches it. Cut to a shot of the basement as the Equalists stop in front of the box and wait for the Lieutenant who is still walking down the stairs. As he steps off the last step, he takes out his kali sticks.)</i><br><br><b>Lieutenant:</b> It's payback time.<br><br><i>(Cut to the bottom of the box as he jabs his kali sticks sharply on the box and proceeds to electrocute the box. Korra is heard screaming off screen. We cut to a shot inside the box as it glos with electricity. Korra's knees are bent and not touching the floor of the box. The camera pans upwards to show that Korra has looped her arm band on the top part of the box and she is hanging all her weight on the band. She continues to feign groaning in pain. Cut to a close up of Korra as she looks up and the camera pans upwards to her arm band acts as an insulator against the electrical current. The lamp above the box begins to move and swing around from the nearby current. Cut to the outside of the box as the lamp bulb blows and the Lieutenant stops electrocuting. Korra can be heard falling to the floor of the box. The Lieutenant steps away from the box.)</i><br><br><b>Lieutenant:</b> Open the box. <i>(Two Equalists walk towards the box. Cut to the back view of the Equalist as he opens the door. The camera pans downwards to Korra who is faking unconsciousness.)</i> Tie her up.<br><br><i>(As soon as he finishes his sentence, Korra aims her foot towards the camera and firebends. Cut to a full view of the basement as flames fill up the basement, knocking an Equalist backwards. Cut to a profile shot of Korra as she swipes the flames aside. Camera angle changes to the back of Korra looking over her shoulder towards the Equalists. An Equalist gets back on his feet and throws a bola towards Korra. Camera angle changes to a frontal shot of Korra as she drops and rolls, dodging the bola as it hits the box behind her. She slams her fist into the floor and the floor begins to quake and roll. The Equalists are thrown off balance. Cut to a close up of a scared Korra as she runs off screen.<br><br>Scene changes to the outside of the house as Amon loads an unconscious Tarrlok into the back of a truck. Cut to the inside of the truck looking out at Amon as he is about to close the doors. He hears a sound and look back towards the house. Cut to front door as Korra bursts open the door and time slows down. Korra opens her eyes and she is clearly frightened. Cut to Amon staring back at Korra. Cut to a back view shot of Korra's legs as she lands on the snow. Cut to a profile shot of Amon as he begins to make his move. Cut to a close up frontal shot of a frightened Korra and camera angle changes to her profile shot. She moves her hands backwards and bends the snow over her head into spikes towards Amon. Cut to the ground in front of Amon as the spikes land in front of him. Cut to a close up of Amon as he dodges the spikes and makes a run towards Korra. The impact of the spikes stirs up the snow and Korra immediately makes a run for it. Amon pops up from behind the snow cloud and chases after Korra.<br><br>Cut to Korra's back view as she jumps down a slope and Amon runs into screen. Cut to the top of the slope looking upwards as Amon slides into view. Cut to an overhead view of Amon looking down the slope as Korra slides down the slope, leaving a snow cloud behind her. Cut to a frontal shot of Amon as the Lieutenant and the Equalists reach Amon.)</i><br><br><b>Amon:</b> I thought I told you not to underestimate her.<br><br><i>(The Lieutenant moves back slightly and we cut back to a profile shot of Korra as she looks backwards. She look to the front and the camera zooms out to show her snowboarding down the slope. Cut to a frontal shot of Korra as she dodges a couple of rocks in the snow. However, she trips over a tree root and she gasps as she is throw onto her back and continues sliding down the slope. She comes to a stop and hits a tree trunk as snow falls onto her face. Cut to an overhead shot of an unconscious Korra and the camea zooms out slowly as the snow keeps falling heavily.<br><br>Cut to the snowy ground as a white paw steps into screen. Naga's head enters the screen as she bends down to sniff the ground. Camera cuts to the back of Korra's head looking towards Naga and the polar bear dog runs towards her master. Naga makes a small whine and licks Korra's face. Cut to a close up of Korra as she stirs.</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> Naga, <i>(Camera zooms out to a profile shot of them as Korra sits up)</i> you came looking for me. <i>(Korra pets Naga and her mount licks her in return.)</i> Good girl.<br><br><i>(Korra pets Naga some more and nuzzles her pet. Cut to a shot of the snowy hills as Naga slowly treks her way across the snow. Korra lays down on the saddle. Camera pans upwards to reveal Republic City in the background quite a distance away.<br><br>Scene changes back to Republic City as the camera looks up at Oogi's underbelly as it flies through the sky. Cut to a close up of Tenzin as the group survey the ground below them. Naga howls off screen)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> That sounds like Naga. <i>(Tenzin steers Oogi towards the howl and the sky bison flies off screen. We cut to Naga walking down the streets as Oogi flies out from behind a building.)</i> Down there.<br><br><i>(Naga senses Oogi and turns around as the sky bison touches down. Cut to Korra on the saddle as she stirs.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(off screen)</i> Korra! <i>(Cut to a back view of Korra as Tenzin and Lin walk run towards her)</i> Oh, thank goodness.<br><b>Lin:</b> Where's Tarrlok? <i>(Mako runs towards them)</i> How did you get away? <i>(Mako pushes Tenzin and Lin aside)</i><br><b>Mako:</b> Give her some space.<br><br><i>(Cut to a profile shot of the entire scene as Mako carries Korra in his arms as everyone look at her sadly. Cut to a close up of Asami looking at Mako a little hurt and confused. Cut to a slightly overhead shot of Mako and Korra.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> I was so worried. Are you all right?<br><b>Korra:</b> I'm fine. I'm glad you're here.<br><br><i>(Korra closes her eyes and rests her head against Mako's shoulder. Cut to a frontal shot of Mako as he smooths Korra's hair. )</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> You're safe now.<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of Korra's face as she closes her eyes as she can finally take a rest. Cut to an overhead shot of the whole scene as the camera slowly zooms out.)</i><br><br><br><br>[End Credits]<br>

Suddenly, Jinora swoops out of the sky on her glider.)</i><br><br><b>Jinora:</b> Stay away from my Dad's ex-girlfriend. <i>(She airbends the Lieutenant onto a nearby roof.)</i><br><b>Lin:</b> Jinora, you shouldn't be out here!<br><br><i>(Ikki joins the fray, riding on an air scooter.)</i><br><br><b>Ikki:</b> Get off our island! <i>(She knocks over Equalists using the scooter like a pinball.)</i><br><b>Lin:</b> Girls, you need to go back inside this instant!<br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(jumping off a roof into a group of Equalists)</i> Taste my fury! <i>(He farts in the face of one of them.)</i><br><b>Lin:</b> Meelo, be careful!<br><br><i>(The warning is unnecessary, as Meelo handles the Equalists in his own spastic way.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> Never mind.<br><br><i>(The conflict is over. Lin, the kids, and the Lotus sentries survey their captives.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(to the sentries)</i> Take these Equalists and lock them in the temple's basement. <i>(to the kids)</i> Nice work, kids.<br><br><i>(Oogi lands in the courtyard, piloted by Tenzin and bearing Team Avatar on his back. The children run to their father.)</i><br><br><b>Jinora:</b> Dad!<br><b>Tenzin:</b> Oh thank goodness you're all right.<br><b>Meelo:</b> We caught the bad guys.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(to Lin, outraged)</i> You let them fight? Do you realize what could have happened?<br><b>Lin:</b>  I would have been toast if not for your kids. You should be proud. You taught them well. <i>(Tenzin gazes proudly at his martial offspring.)</i> Go on, be with your wife.<br><br><i>(In the hallway, Tenzin can hear a baby crying. He runs to the bedroom.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> Pema!<br><br><i>(Pema is lying in bed, holding their newborn.)</i><br><br><b>Pema:</b> Tenzin.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(sitting beside her)</i> I'm here, Pema.<br><b>Pema:</b> Our new son.<br><b>Tenzin</b> <i>(taking the infant in his arms and gazing down fondly)</i> Well hello. <i>(to his children, who have followed him)</i> Come, meet your new brother.<br><b>Meelo:</b> A brother? Well it's about time.<br><b>Ikki:</b> Welcome! I'm Ikki and this is Jinora and Meelo. We have a super-great family and we're so happy that you're a part of it.<br><b>Jinora:</b> What're you going to name him? Can I pick?<br><b>Pema:</b> We already chose a name. <br><b>Tenzin:</b> Rohan.<br><br><i>(Korra, Team Avatar, and Lin have entered the room.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> I'm so sorry to interrupt but more airships are coming.<br><b>Ikki:</b> Everything's not going to be fine, is it, Daddy?<br><br><i>(Tenzin looks apprehensively at his family. The scene switches to the courtyard. Tenzin, Lin, and Team Avatar watch two Equalist airships flying in to renew the attack on the island.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> What do you want to do, Tenzin?<br><b>Tenzin:</b> I need to protect my family and get them as far away from this conflict as possible. If Amon got his hands on my children... I hate to even think of it.<br><b>Lin:</b> If you're leaving, then I'm going with you.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> But--<br><b>Lin:</b> No arguments. You and your family are the last airbenders. There's no way in the world I'm letting Amon take your bending away.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> Thank you, Lin. Korra, I want you to leave this island and hide for the time being.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(indignantly)</i> I'm not giving up.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> I'm not asking you to. I sent word to the United Forces. They will be here soon. And once my family is safe, I will return. With the reinforcements, we can turn the tide in this war.<br><b>Korra:</b> What you're saying is... we need to be patient. <br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(kindly)</i> You're learning well.<br><br><i>(The courtyard. Three sky bison bearing airbenders, air acolytes, and Lin, wait to take off. Team Avatar, Naga, and two Lotus sentries are bidding them farewell. Tenzin hugs Korra.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> Stay safe, Korra.<br><b>Korra:</b> You too.<br><b>Lin:</b> Tenzin, if we're leaving, we better do it now.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> Oogi, yip yip.<br><br><i>(The sky bison take off. Two Equalist airships break away and begin following them. Another airship joins the attack on the island. Equalists descend on a zip line and confront the group. The sentries assume defensive postures.)</i><br><br><b>White Lotus Guard:</b> <i>(to the kids)</i> Go. We'll hold them off.<br><b>Korra:</b> Everyone, climb on! <i>(the kids mount Naga)</i> Let's go girl. <br><br><i>(Naga gallops off across the island. The Equalists and the sentries begin battling.<br><br>The kids seem to be getting away when the Lieutenant suddenly emerges nearby, sliding down a cliff towards them.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(calling out in warning)</i> Moustache guy!<br><br><i>(Naga leaps into the air to meet him in his descent, and with one swipe of her paw sends him flailing down onto the beach far below.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> Nice one, Naga.<br><br><i>(Naga continues on, plunging off a pier into the bay. Korra waterbends a protective bubble around them and they begin swimming towards Republic City. The scene shifts to Lin and the airbenders, who are desperately trying to flee from the airships, to no avail.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> They're gaining on us!<br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(flicking the reins)</i> Faster, Oogi!<br><br><i>(One airship shoots out a line with a net at the end, trying to capture the group. Lin destroys it with one of her own metal lines. As she sees their flight is hopeless, she tethers herself to a second line shot out from the airship and casts a wistful glance back at the airbender family. Her face hardens with determination.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> Whatever happens to me, don't turn back.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(turning towards her)</i> Lin, what are you doing?!<br><br><i>(Running down the length of Oogi's tail, Lin leaps into the air. Retracting her metal line, she pulls herself up onto the roof of the airship. She metalbends a hole in the roof and pulls a large section free. An explosion occurs and the airship begins to sink out of the sky. As it does, Lin runs across the roof, propelling herself with metalbending onto the roof of the second airship. As she begins a similar demolition, Equalists emerge from a hatch in the roof and fling bolas around her, trapping her. She falls to the ground and is electrocuted. The airship veers away with its captive as the airbenders look on, stunned.)</i><br><br><b>Meelo:</b> That lady is my hero.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> Yes, she is.<br><br><i>(They fly on, safe for now. The scene shifts to the mouth of a sewer giving onto the bay, where the kids stand, about to flee into hiding. Air Temple Island is visible, and Korra stands, sadly gazing at the besieged temple. Mako comes up to her.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> Korra, we should get moving.<br><br><i>(They head into the sewers, Mako's arm around Korra. Asami, with a sour look at them, follows. Later that night, it is raining on a conquered Air Temple Island. Lin is forced to her knees before Amon, surrounded by his forces. She glares up at him defiantly.)</i><br><br><b>Amon:</b> Tell me where the Avatar is and I'll let you keep your bending.<br><b>Lin:</b> I won't tell you anything, you monster.<br><b>Amon:</b> Very well.<br><br><i>(With no further ceremony, he unbends her. She slumps to the ground.<br><br>The scene shifts to the deck of a ship, on the open ocean. Daytime. A young officer in a red coat stands, looking out to sea. Another officer, bearded, dressed in gray with an Earth Kingdom insignia on his cap, comes up to him.)</i><br><br><b>Bearded Naval Officer:</b> General, I just received a wire from the Avatar. She says Amon and his forces have gained control of the city. How do you want to respond?<br><b>Young General:</b> <i>(voiced by Dante Basco)</i> Tell her we will be arriving in three days time and that I look forward to winning back Republic City, together.<br><b>Bearded Naval Officer:</b> As you wish, General Iroh.<br><br><i>(Avatar fans everywhere swoon. The bearded officer heads off to relay this order. The camera pans back to reveal General Iroh's ship to be but one of a United Forces naval flotilla, steaming towards Republic City.)</i><br><br><br><br>[End Credits]<br>

The Lieutenant and his chi blockers invaded Air Temple Island, and forced Tenzin and his family to flee. In the daring escape, Lin Beifong sacrificed herself and saved the airbenders. But, she was captured and Amon took her bending away. Now, Team Avatar is in hiding as they await help from General Iroh and The United Forces.<br><br><br><br><b><u>Act I</u></b><br><br><i>(The episode opens up to multiple Equalist airships patrolling the sky just above City Hall and the camera slowly pans to reveal numerous mecha tanks on the city square and on the pathways.)</i><br><br><b>Hiroshi:</b> It is a glorious day, my Equalist brothers and sisters. Amon has torn down the tyrannical bending government. <i>(The camera cuts to the probending arena where construction cranes can be seen re-building the glass roof. Multiple Equalist banners adorn the outside of the building.)</i> He has declared bending illegal <i>(The scene changes to a side view shot of Avatar Aang's statue a large Amon mask has been put on top of Aang's face. An Equalist banner hangs from his airbending staff. The camera swiftly pans to the front of Aang's statue and slowly pulls away from it to show the bay shrouded in thick fog.)</i> and  he has the Avatar on the run. <i>(Scene changes once again to Hiroshi where he is seen giving a speech. The Lieutenant and a chi blocker are standing behind him.)</i> Our great leader has a vision for the future, <i>(Camera switched to the back of Hiroshi's head and we can see a crowd listening to his speech. Several chi blockers line up as a perimeter around the crowd)</i> one day soon bending will no longer exist and we will live in a world everyone is finally equal! <i>(Hiroshi punches his fist into the air and the camera cuts again into the crowd looking up at Hiroshi.)</i>The United Forces are on their way right now to try and stop that dream <i>(The camera slowly pans down to two chi blockers standing behind the crowd)</i> but we will prevail! <br><br><i>(Hiroshi opens both his arms out with confidence and the crowd cheers and raises their arms up in support. The female chi blocker turns towards her partner and nods as they both turn their backs on the crowd and walk away. The camera changes to some shrubs and bushes as the chi blockers make their way through the foliage. They walk towards a giant rock and the female chi blocker earthbends the rock as both she and her partner run and jump into the hole. As they descend, the rock moves back into position. <br><br>The camera cuts to Mako and Korra in chi blocker outfits but without their masks. It was the two chi blockers we saw earlier. They are walking down a metal and somewhat rusty corridor.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b>: Can you believe Hiroshi? "The Avatar is on the run". I'm not running from anyone. <i>(Korra rolls her eyes)</i> Let's go back up there <i>(Korra pauses in her tracks and Mako stops as well)</i> and knock some heads, <i>(Korra punches her fist into her palm)</i> they'll never know what hit 'em. <i>(She turns around as the camera cuts to the opposite side of the corridor.)</i><br><b>Mako:</b> Relax, <i>(Korra continues to walk away but slowly as she listens to Mako)</i> General Iroh's coming with an entire fleet of battleships. <i>(Korra stops walking and raises her eyebrows.)</i> Then Amon <i>(Korra pulls back in defeat and frowns as his words make sense)</i> will be the one who's running.<br><b>Korra:</b> I hate this being patient stuff. <br><br><i>(Korra rolls her eyes and turns back to continue their journey down the corridor and Mako follows.<br><br>Cut to Bolin and Asami sitting on crates as they watch Pabu look at a sprig of leaves in Bolin's hand. He moves it up and down as Pabu performs a backflip. Pabu then crawls up Bolin's leg and onto his shoulder as Bolin and Asami turn their heads towards the left of the screen. The camera cuts to Asami and Bolin walking towards Korra and Mako and there are shabby tents set up in the background.)</i><br><br><b>Asami:</b> You two were gone a while. <i>(She crosses her arms)</i><br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(Camera cuts to the front of Korra and Mako as Mako replies defensively)</i> We were doing reconnaissance. <br><b>Asami:</b> <i>(Camera cuts to the front of Asami and Bolin)</i> Whatever. <i>(Asami glances away angrily as Bolin looks at her with concern.)</i><br><b>Hobo:</b> <i>(The park hobo from the first episode suddenly zooms into view)</i> Welcome back! <i>(Cut to the front of Korra and Mako as the hobo happily makes his way in between them and he clutches his jacket happily as he dances)</i> Hope you worked up an appetite 'cos dinner is served. <br><br><i>(He extends his arms out and pull Mako and Korra closer to him. Cut to a pot of orange-brown gruel as the hobo stirs it and ladles the contents into a bowl.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(voice over)</i> Thanks so much for letting us <i>(Camera pans out to the group sitting around a log that is used as a makeshift table. The hobo offers the bowl to Korra and she accepts it.)</i> hide out with you the past few days. <br><b>Hobo:</b> Honoured to oblige. <i>(He picks up an empty bowl on the table and offers it to Bolin as he ladles the gruel into the bowl.)</i> My associates and I heartily oppose <i>(Bolin supports the bowl with both hands)</i> Amon's so called "Equalist policies". <i>(The hobo is done ladling and Bolin brings the bowl towards himself. The hobo extends his arms outwards.)</i>We got benders and non-benders living together <i>(The camera cuts through the living space of the hideout and various make shift tents are seen.)</i> down here, but do you see us fightin'? No siree. <i>(Cut back to the hobo as he hugs himself)</i> We figured out how to harmoniously co-exist. <br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(Cut to the front of Bolin and Asami who gives Bolin a weird look)</i> You are a wise <i>(Bolin bows to the hobo)</i> and noble hobo. <i>(He spoons up the gruel into his mouth)</i> Mmm... This is <i>(He brings the bowl up towards the hobo. Asami stirs the contents of the bowl.)</i> the best tasting street gruel I've ever had! <i>(Asami lifts the spoon up from the bowl and stares at it)</i> Seriously. <br><b>Hobo:</b> <i>(Cut to the front of the hobo as he replies enthusiastically)</i> I culled it from the finest dumpers the city has to offer. <br><b>Asami:</b> <i>(The camera cuts back rapidly to Asami who already has the spoon in her mouth. Her eyes close and opens back comically with small beady eyes as the top half of her face turns green.)</i> Blergh. <br><br><i>(She spits the gruel back into the bowl and coughs. Cut to the back of Asami's crate as she puts the bowl down on the floor. Pabu runs towards the bowl and squeaks he licks the gruel like a cat.<br><br>Scene changes to what is presumed to be night and Bolin and Asami are asleep on the floor in their sleeping bags. Pabu is sleeping above Bolin's head. Camera pans to the left to show Korra resting on a sleeping Naga's side. Cut to a close up of Korra to reveal that she is wide awake. She is back in her usual outfit.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(off screen)</i> Can't sleep <i>(Korra turns her head towards Mako)</i> either? <br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(Camera angle changes to show Mako walking towards Korra)</i> No, I have this <i>(Camera angle changes to the front of Korra as Mako takes a seat beside Korra)</i> awful pit in my stomach. <br><b>Mako:</b> Me too.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(Cut to a close up of Korra again)</i> It's so crazy. <i>(She shrugs)</i> A few months ago I was in the South Pole practicing for my firebending test, and now I'm in the middle <i>(turns to Mako)</i> of an all out war. <br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(Cut to Mako as he looks to the side)</i> I know. We didn't even know each other then. And now, I can't imagine <i>(smiles)</i> my life without you <i>(Cut to Korra as the camera slowly zooms in on her face as her mouth is slightly agape.)</i> in it. <i>(Cut back to Mako as the camera slowly zooms in on him)</i> You're the most loyal, brave and selfless person I've ever known.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(Cut back to Korra as she gives him a soft smile)</i> I think you're pretty incredible too but <i>(her head bends down)</i> you already knew that. <i>(Her eyes glances to the side towards Mako, Soft music plays in the background as the camera cuts back to the front of the couple looking at each other fondly for a few seconds. Korra interrupts the moment by turning her head away right as Mako leans in.)</i> I should probably try to get some sleep. <br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(Cut to the front of Mako as he glances to the side, a little bit disappointed)</i>Me too. Good night. <i>(He stands up and walks away from Korra)</i> <br><b>Korra:</b> Good night.<br><br><i>(Korra leans against Naga with her eyes wide open as she has a worried expression on her face.<br><br>Cut to a tower on Air Temple Island at night as a couple of Equalist airships patrol with their searchlights on. The camera slowly pans down to Amon standing still as The Lieutenant brings a blindfolded metalbender cop towards Amon. The Lieutenant roughly shoves the cop down on his knees and the cop groans. The cop appears disoriented.)</i><br><br><b>Amon:</b> <i>(Cut to the side of the cop as Amon walks towards him)</i> You will now be cleansed of your impurity. <i>(Amon walks behind the cop and the camera cuts to the front of the cop who begins to breathe in a panicked manner. Cut to the front of the cop as Amon's thumb descends on the cop's forehead. Korra, Bolin and Asami walk into view. Cut to the outside of the tunnel as Mako leans against the side and looks out carefully.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> Coast is clear. <br><br><i>(He waves a hand and beckons the team to follow him. Bolin gasps and turns the telescope around and he through it the wrong way.)</i><br><b>Bolin:</b> Whoops. <br><br><i>(He flips the telescope the right way around and cut back to his point of view. Amon had to know we were coming, <i>(Cut to the back of Iroh's head as the camera pans to the left to show a relatively empty bay)</i> so why aren't we meeting any resistance? <br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(Camera cuts rapidly to Korra)</i> Wait a second. Cut to the front of Mako as he puts the telescope up to his eye.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(voice over)</i> What now?<br><br><i>(The camera cuts up close to a building and zooms in on a figure in the sky at the back of another building in the foreground. The planes are all adorned with Equalist symbols on their wings. More planes fly into view. The camera pans to the side to show how vast the Equalist forces are. As her body heads towards the camera, the screen fades black to a commercial break.)</i><br><br><br><br><b><u>Act II</u></b><br><br><i>(Scene returns back underwater as the camera points towards two ships. Bombs keep dropping into the water. Korra swims into screen and heads toward one of the ships. Cut back to the surface where a plane flies by and drops a torpedo. The camera follows the torpedo down into the water and flies off screen. They continue to spasm and the camera returns to Noatak as he raises his head upwards. The camera cuts back to the dogs as they are levitated into the air and continue to let out helpless whines. Noatak gasps while Yakone smiles insanely. The wolves are slowly set back on the ground and they bow down to Noatak one by one. Camera zooms out to the trio.)</i><br><br><b>Yakone:</b> <i>(Cut to Yakone and Tarrlok who is looking rather shocked.)</i> That's the way it's done. <i>(turns his body and continues to chide his son)</i> That's what you need to strive for. <i>(Yakone walks off followed by Noatak)</i><br><b>Tarrlok:</b> Even though Noatak was my father's favorite, <i>(Noatak pauses in his steps and camera cuts to Tarrlok looking in awe at his brother)</i> it wasn't any easier for him. <i>(Cut to a profile of Noatak looking rather darkly at the ground and casting a glance at his brother)</i> He carried the burden of all Yakone's expectations and demands. <i>(He turns his head back forward and continues to walk on. Cut to a snowy cliff at sun set as Noatak sits on the edge of it.)</i> Something changed <i>(Tarrlok walks into screen and looks out at his brother)</i> in Noatak over the years. <i>(Cut to a front view of Noatak looking rather stony.)</i> The loving brother I once knew became cold and detached. <i>(Cut to Noatak's profile as lightning strikes in the background. Camera fades to a snowy tundra in the middle of a blizzard. We can see Tarrlok standing on one side and Yakone and Noatak standing on the other.)</i> Our father pushed us to extremes and one day, <i>(Cut to a close up of the scene as the wind blows their ponytails around)</i> he made us bloodbend each other.<br><b>Yakone:</b> <i>(Cut to Yakone looking at Tarrlok and then looking to Noatak)</i> Noatak, go. <br><br><i>(Cut to Noatak as he takes in a deep breath and his eyes expand with concentration. Camera zooms out to Tarrlok's back view as he starts to spasm and he makes groans of pain. Cut to Tarrlok's front view as he looks frightened at his brother. He is brought down to his knees and his body is forced to straighten up as he continues to cry out in pain. Cut to Noatak looking at his brother coldly and narrowing his eyes. Cut back to Tarrlok as his upper body is bent further backwards and Tarrlok continues to moan in agony. The camera pans out to show the entire scene.)</i><br><br><b>Yakone:</b> <i>(Cut to a close up of Yakone smiling with approval as he looks at Tarrlok.)</i> Excellent. <i>(His eyes glance towards Noatak and he exhales, releasing his hold on his brother. Cut to Tarrlok's back view as he drops forward. Cut to a close up of him looking at his brother with disbelief as he gasps to catch his breath. We are brought to his point of view and his vision is blurry.)</i> Tarrlok, <i>(he turns his head towards his father)</i> your turn.<br><b>Tarrlok:</b> <i>(Cut to show the entire scene)</i> No, <i>(stands up)</i> I won't do it. <br><b>Yakone:</b> <i>(Camera cuts to Yakone looking furious)</i> Bloodbend your brother, Tarrlok! <br><b>Tarrlok:</b> <i>(Cut to Tarrlok as he clutches his stomach)</i> That felt awful, I don't want <i>(shakes his head)</i> to do that to anyone! I never want to bloodbend again. <br><b>Yakone:</b> <i>(Cut to a close up of Yakone as he still looks furious)</i> You're a disgrace, a weakling! <i>(takes a step forward to his son and the camera zooms)</i> I'll teach you a lesson you insubodinate...<br><br><i>(Yakone pauses in his steps and lets out a cry of pain as his head is brought slightly backwards. Cut to Tarrlok looking shocked as Noatak steps angrily into screen and stands protectively in front of his brother. )</i><br><br><b>Noatak:</b> Stay away from him. <i>(Cut to an overhead shot of the scene as Yakone's upper body is bent backwards and he continues to spasm)</i><br><b>Yakone:</b> <i>(struggles to talk)</i> How dare you bloodbend me! <br><b>Noatak:</b> <i>(Cut to a close up of Noatak looking nonchalant)</i> What are you going to do about it? <i>(He brings his head up and down)</i>  You're the weak one. <i>(We cut to Yakone being brought on his knees. His upper body then bends backwards, as he continues to yell in pain. Cut to a wide shot of the scene as Noatak takes a step towards his father.)</i> You always say bloodbending is the most powerful thing in the world but it isn't. The Avatar is. He took your bending away. <i>(Cut to a front shot of Noatak as he makes a realization)</i> What could be more powerful than that?<br><b>Yakone:</b> <i>(Cut to a close up of Yakone as he looks furious. His body continues to spasm uncontrollably.)</i> I made you what you are. You're mine.<br><b>Noatak:</b> <i>(Cut to a view behind Yakone's shoulder as Noatak looks on angrily while Tarrlok is in shock)</i> We're your sons, not your tools of revenge. <i>(swipes his arm to the side)</i> Let's go. We can run away from him. Forever.<br><b>Tarrlok:</b> <i>(Cut to Tarrlok as he looks sad and shocked)</i> Run away? But what about mum? We can't <i>(shakes his head)</i> just leave her. <br><b>Noatak:</b> <i>(Cut to a close up of Noatak as he looks darkly at his brother)</i> I was right about you. You are a weakling. <br><br><i>(Cut to Tarrlok as he looks hurt by his brother's words. Camera pans out to the brothers looking at their father and Noatak takes a step backward and runs away)</i><br><br><b>Tarrlok:</b> Noatak! <i>(Cut to a close up of Tarrlok pleading with despair as his hand is stretched outwards)</i> Don't leave, please! <i>(Cut to a slightly overhead view as Noatak runs further away.)</i> Noatak! <i>(Cut back to the village as Yakone's wife collects the laundry from the front of the tent. Cut to a view over her shoulder as she takes down another garment to reveal only Tarrlok and Yakone walking towards their house)</i> My father and I searched for days but <i>(Cut to a front shot of Tarrlok's mother as she smiles and steps under the laundry line to wave to her family)</i> we never found a sign of Noatak. <i>(Cut to Yakone and Tarrlok looking rather dejected)</i> We thought he perished in that storm. <i>(Cut to Tarrlok's mother again as she looks puzzled)</i> My mother was never the same <i>(Her eyes widen with realization that Noatak is gone and her facial expression changes into despair)</i> after the loss of my brother. <i>(Cut to a bowl of soup with Tarrlok's reflection in it. The camera pans up to reveal more dishes of food on the table. Tarrlok looks a little sad and he look up.)</i> My father stopped training me. <i>(Cut to Tarrlok's point of view as he looks at his parents)</i> With Noatak gone, <i>(Yakone stands up and walks away, leaving his food untouched as his wife looks on)</i> his hopes for revenge with it and <i>(Cut to a shot of the tent looking at the dining table)</i> he passed away <i>(Yakone walks off screen while his wife look down sadly)</i> a few years later.<br><br><i>(Cut to Tarrlok's profile as he looks at his mother and then looks down sadly. Camera fades to present day with Tarrlok's head in the same position. Cut to Mako and Korra as they look shocked.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(look down sadly)</i> That's one of the saddest stories I've ever heard. <br><b>Tarrlok:</b> <i>(off screen)</i> Avatar Korra, <i>(Cut to Tarrlok sitting dejected in his cell as the camera zooms in slowly)</i> I am truly sorry for all that I did to you. I thought I was better than my father, but his ghost still shaped me. That's how he has been able to challenge any bender. <i>(Cut to the couple's back view)</i><br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(walks to the right)</i> So much for our ambush. We know the truth about him.
