Gun and Korra stand in front of the throne.)</i><br><br><b>Gun:</b> Your Majesty, <i>(cut to a close up of the pair)</i> the Avatar has returned with the tax payments. <br><br><i>(Camera changes to a close up of the queen who looks very relieved.)</i><br><br><b>Queen Hou-Ting:</b> Finally. Secure it in the vault.     <br><br><i>(View switches to a frontal view of Gun and Korra with the former speaking while bowing.)</i><br><br><b>Gun:</b> It's being done as we speak.          <br><b>Korra:</b> So now, Your Majesty, if I could start meeting <i>(Gun looks towards her with a shocked expression)</i> some of the airbenders here in the city.           <br><br><i>(Cut back to the Queen who is bored but attempts to look innocent.)</i><br><br><b>Queen Hou-Ting:</b> <i>(shifts her eyes around and places her hands together)</i> The Dai Li thoroughly searched the city, but it seems your <i>(gestures her hand towards Korra)</i> reports were incorrect. There are no airbenders in Ba Sing Se. So you can gather your little band and <i>(makes a shooing gesture with her hand)</i> be on your way tomorrow.  <br>             <br><i>(View changes to an area slightly behind the throne looking at Korra and Gun.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> You make me do your dirty work extorting your own citizens <i>(cut to a close up of a visibly angry Korra)</i> for your stupid palaces and topiaries, and then you just want to send me away? <i>(cut to a close up of Hou-Ting with one hand on her chin, judging Korra quietly)</i> We're not going anywhere until we find some airbenders! We know there are some here!  <br><br><i>(Angle switches to a side view of the throne room.)</i><br><br><b>Queen Hou-Ting:</b> <i>(points to Korra)</i> Get her out of my sight!     <br><br><i>(Korra turns and walks away as Gun follows. She turns back suddenly to point at the Queen. Gun is startled and falls flat on his butt.)</i><br> <br><b>Korra:</b> This isn't over! I'm going to find the airbenders!         <br><br><i>(The Avatar storms out loudly with her boots beating against the floor. <br><br>Location changes to the apartment complex at night and we can hear crickets chirping.)</i><br><br><b>Chow:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> You know, San would have been <i>so</i> proud of you guys. <i>(cut to the inside of the apartment as Bolin continues to rapidly stuff his face with more food)</i> Traveling the World with the Avatar, he would have loved that.       <br><b>Mako:</b> We actually need to get back to the Avatar in the Upper Ring.<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of the brothers with Mako explaining the situation with a smile on his face.)</i><br> <br><b>Mako:</b> We're supposed to be helping her find airbenders <i>(Bolin nods)</i> in Ba Sing Se.         <br><br><i>(Camera focuses on the rest of the family as they gasp and one child hides behind his father's shoulder. Cut to an aerial view of the room as there is silence and the brothers are confused.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> What? <i>(looks around worriedly)</i> What happened?         <br><br><i>(Cut back to Chow who relents and tells the tale.)</i><br><br><b>Chow:</b> One of our neighbors started airbending about a week ago. A couple days later, two Dai Li agents come out of nowhere and snatch him up. <i>(View returns back to the siblings. Mako takes the information seriously while Bolin is in disbelief.)</i> No one's seen him since.    <br><br><i>(Cut to Tu who is leaning against the wall and looking out of the window.)</i><br><br><b>Tu:</b> They say the Earth Queen's locking <i>(Yin looks at her grandson fiercely)</i> all the airbenders up somewhere and using them for experiments.     <br><b>Yin:</b> Tu! <i>(stands up)</i> Don't talk <i>(cut to a close up of Yin as she looks shocked)</i> like that about Her Majesty. <i>(She turns around and the camera pans to the side of a portrait of the Earth Queen hanging on the wall. Yin blows a kiss towards the picture and places her palms together to pray.)</i> Long may she reign.       <br><br><i>(View returns back to Mako and Bolin as they look a little weirded out.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> We have to get back to the Upper Ring and tell Korra. <br><br><i>(Mako stands up and Bolin grabs some more food in his hands.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> I hope Kai is okay.      <br><br><i>(Location changes to a random street as a rich man gets his robes blown up by a gust of wind coming from off camera. Cut to the man's point of view as his robes drift down to reveal Kai who picks up his fallen hat.)</i><br><br><b>Kai:</b> Here sir, let me help you.  <br><br><i>(Kai lifts the hat up with a smile. View changes to a dark alley as Kai walks into it, happily bouncing a sack of coins in his hand. Suspicious music plays. He stops in his tracks and his eyes widen. Cut to his point of view as there is a Dai Li agent waiting for him at the end of the alley. Cut back to Kai as sweat forms on his face and he looks behind. The camera pans to the side to reveal a second agent behind the boy. He turns around and looks atthe agent. Kai looks to the side for a few seconds before looking forward and sprinting off screen. Both agents earth bend their rock finger gloves at the boy. Cut to Kai jumping on a crate to reach the top of a fence and the rock hands grasp his wrists and pulls him away from the wood, making him sort of float in the air.)</i><br><br><b>Kai:</b> Hey! What's going on? <i>(he throws the sack of money to the ground)</i> I didn't do anything! <i>(cut to the bag of money crashing to the ground as the gold spills out)</i> I'm with the Avatar!          <br><br><i>(Location changes to a dark place with concrete. A door slides open to reveal the silhouettes of the Dai Li agents. They toss a shadow inside and Kai appears on screen soon after as he rolls and tumbles onto the floor. His clothes are gone and he now wears a prisoner's outfit. Cut to the Dai Li agents as the one who speaks looks at Kai harshly while the other one smiles.)</i>  <br><br><b>Dai Li Sergeant:</b> Welcome to Her Majesty's army, <i>(View changes to the back of the agents' heads looking into the prison cell. There are other people of various ages wearing the same outfit as Kai scattered throughout the cell.)</i> First Airbending Regiment. From now on, <i>(cut back to both of the agents)</i> you live to fight <i>(he begins to slide the door close)</i> for the Earth Queen. <br><br><i>(Cut to Kai looking at the door in despair. The left side of his face is already in the dark but the right is still illuminated. As the door quickly shuts, the light disappears and his right pupil dilates in the dark from the change in lighting. The camera slowly zooms in as Kai is in shock.)</i><br><br><br><br>[End Credits]

Meanwhile, Mako and Bolin met their long lost relatives who told them that Dai Li agents have been rounding up airbenders for the Queen's army. And at a prison in the North, Tonraq and Lord Zuko prepare for Zaheer's imminent attack.<br><br><br><br><b><u>Act I</u></b><br><br><i>(Episode opens to a frontal shot of P'li who stares and exhales angrily at the camera. Change to a side view shot of the scene as Zuko's dragon lands with a roar, sending snow bouncing up.)</i><br><br><b>Tonraq:</b> Did you see Zaheer?<br><b>Lord Zuko:</b> The only thing I saw was a snowstorm heading our way. <br><br><i>(Zuko glances behind him and camera pans to a cloud of smoke and snow at the nearby hills. Cut to Tonraq who looks serious.</i><br><br><b>Tonraq:</b> That's not a snowstorm. That's him.<br><br><i>(Tonraq frowns and runs off-screen. Cut to the "snowstorm" and camera manages to move past it, revealing a figure standing atop a vehicle, making spirals of air around the truck. Cut to Ghazan in the driver's seat as the windshield wipers do their work. Camera pans upwards to show Zaheer waving his arms around to keep up the illusion of a storm. Cut to a side view of the cloud as the truck surges forward. Camera now focuses on Zaheer who jumps off the vehicle followed by Ming-Hua. They hit the ground running. Cut to Tonraq and the other three running to confront the duo.)</i><br><br><b>Tonraq:</b> I put you away once Zaheer, and I'm gonna do it again.<br><br><i>(Tonraq jumps up and waterbends at Zaheer. Camera pans out as Zaheer slides down on the ice to avoid the attack while the others keep running forward. Tonraq bends a pillar of ice but Zaheer cartwheels to the side. The Chief then sends dual water spirals at Zaheer who leaps over Tonraq and the latter turns to face him. Cut to a close up of Zaheer as he bends backwards and an arc of water sails past his head. Zaheer runs forward and camera pans out as he airbends, knocking Tonraq off his feet.<br><br>Cut to the twins as they are mirror images of each other. They send ice off-screen before kicking up some more ice and shooting them forward rapidly. Cut to a frontal shot of Ming-Hua as she side steps the ice and casually looks behind. She continues to run forward. The twins perform some bending movements and camera pans out to show that they created ice spikes from the ground to prevent Ming-Hua from advancing. Ming-Hua jumps into screen and uses her tentacle arms to grab a hold of the top of the ice spike. Cut to a profile panning shot of Ming-Hua as she swings herself effortlessly across the spikes. Cut to the back of the twins as Ming-Hua lands and waterbends an ice column which Desna dodges but Eska is knocked aside. Soon after, they are partially encased in separate blocks of ice.<br><br>Cut to Ming-Hua as she leaps into the air and her tentacles form an ice drill which tunnels into the chasm. View changes to the inside of the prison as the waterbender easily breaks through. Cut to a view of the chasm as the camera follows Ming-Hua who is free falling. She grabs onto a metal structure to dodge a fire attack from a White Lotus guard. She jumps down on top of the guard, knocking him out. Camera changes angles to the front of the prison cell. The remaining guard begins to water bend but Ming-Hua shoots out her tentacle, throwing the guard against the wall and encasing him fully in ice. <br><br>Cut to P'li inside the prison cell looking a little frightened as she has heard the commotion. Camera changes angles to the back of the cell looking at the door. Water fills the prison doors and camera zooms in, showing the liquid turn into ice, pushing the door out of its hinges. The ice turns back into water and retreats. The door gives a whine as it drops down. Ming-Hua casually strolls in. Cut to a view behind Ming-Hua walking into the cell.)</i><br><br><b>P'Li:</b> Ming-Hua.<br><br><i>(Camera focuses on a close up of Ming-Hua.)</i><br><br><b>Ming-Hua:</b> Let's get you out of here.<br><br><i>(She proceeds to tear through the various chain links holding P'Li captive with waterbending. Korra walks towards them and stands in the middle.)</i> What's going on? <br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(addresses Tenzin)</i> I just got word from Lord Zuko and Tonraq. <br><b>Korra:</b> Why is Lord Zuko with my Dad?<br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(still ignores Korra and talks to Tenzin)</i> Zaheer and the others have escaped.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(surprised)</i> How is that possible?<br><b>Lin:</b> Because Zaheer is an airbender now.<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of Tenzin as he is in shock.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> No.<br><br><i>(Camera angle changes back to the previous view of the trio.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> Alright, <i>(thrusts both hands out in irritation)</i> hold on. <i>(turns towards Lin)</i> Will you quit ignoring me and tell me <i>(turns to Tenzin)</i> what's going on? <i>(raises both arms in confusion)</i> Who's Zaheer? <i>(turns to Lin and back to Tenzin)</i> Why is my life in danger? <br><br><i>(Lin and Tenzin glance at each other silently. Cut to an over the shoulder shot of Korra looking at Tenzin.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(relents)</i> Shortly after we found out you were the Avatar, Zaheer and three others attempted to kidnap you. Luckily, your father, Lord Zuko, Chief Sokka, and I were there to stop them. <i>(Cut to Korra who is in disbelief)</i> We apprehended the criminals and locked them away in prisons designed to impair their abilities. <br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(looks down as the answers click in her head)</i> So that's why you and my Dad sheltered me away. <br><br><i>(Cut to Lin, Tenzin, Bolin, and Asami listening  to the news.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> It was for your own safety. <br><br><i>(Mako steps forward)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> Why were they <i>(Korra, Lin, and Tenzin turn towards the firebender)</i> trying to kidnap Korra?<br><b>Lin:</b> We spent thirteen years interrogating them, but they never broke. To this day, no one knows what their motive was. <i>(takes a step towards Korra)</i> Now we need to get you back to Republic City where I can protect you. <br><br><b>Korra:</b> No. <i>(Tenzin turns towards his student)</i> I'm not running. <br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(closes her eyes to calm herself)</i> Korra, you don't understand. <i>(opens her eyes to look back at the Avatar)</i> These criminals are like nothing you've ever faced before. <br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(Cut to Korra who is serious)</i> Look, I'm not a little kid any more. You don't need to protect me. I came here for one thing, to find airbenders, and I'm not leaving without them.<br><br><i>(We cut back to Lin)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> Fine. Let's get them and get out of here. Where are they?<br><br><i>(Camera angle changes back to a close up of Korra)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> In a military compound, <i>(her expression changes to anger)</i> and we're busting them out. <br><br><i>(Cut to commercial break.)</i><br><br><br><br><b><u>Act III</u></b><br><br><i>(Episode returns to the walls outside the construction site at night as two guards patrol the perimeter. One of them holds a lamp in hand as Jinora waits for them at the corner. Cut to a close up of the guards as they spot Jinora. Camera pans left as the girl gives a wave.)</i><br><br><b>Jinora:</b> Hi. <br><b>Earth Kingdom Guard #1:</b> Hey, what are you doing here?<br><b>Earth Kingdom Guard #2:</b> Ah, it's just that little airbender girl who came with the Avatar. <i>(arms akimbo)</i> You shouldn't be walking around here all alone.<br><b>Jinora:</b> I'm not alone. <br><br><i>(Points off screen and camera pans to the side to reveal, Korra, Mako, Bolin, Tenzin, Bumi, and Bum-Ju all in battle ready positions. Camera pans up to reveal the guards tied up and unconscious as Jinora scurries away.<br><br>Cut to a wide shot of what appears to be the foyer of the compound. Tenzin peeks out from the entrance and sneaks in followed by the others in one straight line. They run towards an opening in the wall. Cut to two openings in the wall as Bolin is the last to run to safety to the opening on the left. Two Dai Li agents walk down the stairs on the opening to the right. They pass by the adjacent opening. Cut to Tenzin and the others pressed up against the wall in the stairwell. Silhouettes of the agents pass by them without any fanfare. Cut to the back of Tenzin's head as he watches the Dai Li walk away. He turns back to the rest of the party. Bumi and Bolin are each carrying a suitcase slinged on their shoulders.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> Bumi and Korra, you two will come with me to find the airbenders. <i>(Camera angle changes to the opposite view facing the rest of the crew.)</i> You three find Kai. We'll meet on the surface shortly. Radio us if anything goes wrong. <br><br><i>(Tenzin turns away and we cut to the other side of the foyer facing the opposite corridor and a shot of the stairs. Jinora, Mako, and Bolin run along the corridor while the other three rush down the stairs.<br><br>Location changes to the inside of a dormitory and the doors open to reveal Korra and Tenzin. Light streams into the room. Cut to Yung and the other airbenders asleep in their bunks which are just holes in the stone wall. Who are you?<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot from behind Yung looking at the duo.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(calmly and quietly)</i> I'm the Avatar. And I'm getting you all out of here. <br><br><i>(Cut to an aerial view of the room.)</i><br><br><b>Yung:</b> We're leaving? Where are we going?<br><b>Tenzin:</b> Everyone, please. <i>(raises both arms up to soothe them)</i> You must stay calm and quiet if we want this to work. <br><br><i>(Several of the airbenders have gotten out of bed. We return back to Yung.)</i><br><br><b>Yung:</b> What to work? We're sneaking out? <br><br><i>(Cut back to Korra and Tenzin as the former takes a step forward.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> Yes, and we must leave <i>now</i>.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> We're going to get you away from the Earth Queen and out of the city.<br><br><i>(We return back to an aerial view of the room again as Tenzin turns away and flees while the airbenders follow them. We need to get him.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> We're already taking care of it.<br><br><i>(Camera pans down to reveal Bumi crouched down with the suitcase open which is a radio communications device. He speaks into the receiver.)</i><br><br><b>Bumi:</b> <i>(whispers)</i> Tough Sight, this is Papa Bear. The Breezies are in the hole, cue the Balloons!<br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(off-screen over the radio)</i> What? Are you in trouble? <br><b>Bumi:</b> <i>(exasperated)</i> No, we got the airbenders and we're headed out. Bring the airships! <i>(he puts the phone down and hugs himself sadly)</i> No one likes code names any more.<br><br><i>(Cut to Lin inside her police airship with a radio in hand.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> Copy that. Asami and I are on our way. <br><br><i>(She puts the receiver back and we cut to the outside as Asami's airship takes off the ground followed by Lin's aircraft. Cut to Kai's point of view looking up at the brothers.)</i><br> <br><b>Mako:</b> C'mon. We're getting you out. <br><br><i>(Jinora walks into view)</i><br><br><b>Jinora:</b> Kai! <br><br><i>(She squeezes past the brothers and camera angle changes to Kai who stands up. Jinora throws her arms around his neck and plants a kiss on Kai's cheek. The boy blushes and has a goofy expression of happiness. Cut to a side view of Mako not looking amused and Bolin behaving like a happy gossip girl.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> Whoa oh!! Tenzin is not <i>(clasps his hands together and looks at his brother)</i> going to be happy about this.<br><b>Mako:</b> Then don't tell him. <br><b>Bolin:</b> How can I not? This is too juicy! <br><br><i>(Mako looks to the side in annoyance. And running away. <i>(Cut to an area behind Kai looking at the brothers as they glare at him sternly)</i> And getting you stuck on that train.  <br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(bends down to hug the boy)</i> Aww, we can't stay mad at you. <br><b>Mako:</b> Yes, we can. I have a lot of money in that wallet. <br><br><i>(Jinora comes into frame.)</i><br><br><b>Jinora:</b> Guys, come on!<br><br><i>(They leave the cell and camera angle changes to the corridor of the detention area as the four of them round the corner and come to a sudden halt. They have a right to choose their own paths. <br><br><i>(View changes to a frontal shot of the queen who continues to walk forward with a serious expression on her face.)</i><br><br><b>Queen Hou-Ting:</b> <i>These airbenders</i> are Earth Kingdom citizens and I am their Queen. <i>(she stops walking)</i> Taking them will constitute an act of war. <i>(Camera changes to a shot from behind the agents as it pans through the group)</i> If you disobey me, I will bear down on you with the entire force of my kingdom! <br><br><i>(We return back to Korra again)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> They're leaving with me.<br><b>Queen Hou-Ting:</b> No, they're not! <br><br><i>(Cut to a profile shot of the queen. She turns away and swipes her hand out. Camera pans back as the agents fire out the rock hand gloves. Cut to Korra as the new airbenders retaliate by bending gusts of wind. The rock gloves collide against the air and shatter. View changes to the back view of the agents as they are assaulted by the fierce winds. Cut to a Dai Li agent gritting his teeth. A woman climbs up. Camera pans out to Korra, Tenzin, and Yung holding the fort with more airbending. Behind them, Bumi oversees the airbenders' escape.<br><br>Location suddenly changes to the inside of the detention area as rock hands fly towards Mako and Bolin who dodges them. Bolin presses one hand on the ground and kicks the side of the wall, sending the agent to the other part of the corridor. Camera pans up to Kai and Jinora who loom over him.)</i><br><br><b>Kai:</b> I guess I am as good as I thought.<br><br><i>(Location changes to inside of an airship hangar bay as the airbenders are safely on board. Cut to an area behind Korra looking out as a Dai Li agents earthbends a tall pillar of rock to jump upwards to get Korra. She punches a stream of air, knocking him out. Cut to a profile shot of Tenzin as the ships move away, leaving Oogi behind.)</i> <br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(whistles at his bison)</i> Oogi!<br><br><i>(Oogi flies towards the duo. Cut to Korra as the first rock sails past them harmlessly.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> Where are the others? <br><br><i>(The second rock passes by over Korra's head but she doesn't take notice of it.)</i><br><br><b>Bumi:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> We need <i>(Cut to Bolin, Mako, Jinora, and Kai running down the stairs)</i> heeeeeelp!<br><br><i>(Camera pans out to the temple as various Dai Li agents pop up from behind the building on tall earth columns. Cut to the agents as they earthbend in sync, pulling their arms back and forth to shoot out small pellets of rock. Cut to the four members of the party as they run for their lives with the pellets hitting the ground just behind their feet. View changes to Korra as she steers Oogi back. Ah choo! <i>(shakes her head around)</i> Get this fur off of- AH CHOO!<br><br><i>(The sound effect of a balloon deflating is heard and the Queen's head dress flops down on her forehead. We can relocate you somewhere safe <i>(view changes to behind the airbenders looking at Tenzin)</i> or you can come with me to the Northern Air Temple to live in peace and train as Air Nomads. <i>(Switch to a close up of Yung with the rest of the airbenders listening intently)</i>You are no longer anyone's <i>property</i>. Lin's airship heads to the left while Asami's airship heads off to the right. They fly in separate directions until they are just off-screen.)</i><br><br><br><br>[End Credits]

First, President Raiko banished her from Republic City, then The Earth Queen declared her an an enemy of the kingdom after Korra rescued a group of airbenders from Ba Sing Se. And now Korra has learned that Zaheer and his fellow criminals are after her. With Tenzin busy bringing the new recruits to the Northern Air Temple, Korra's protection now rests in Bei Fong's hands.<br><br><br><br><b><u>Act I</u></b><br><br><i>(Episode opens up to Naga leaping in the air and catching a ball with her mouth. Behind her, scenic hills can be seen. Naga returns the ball to her master and Korra uses airbending to fling it far away.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> While you're playing fetch, four of the most dangerous criminals in the world are hunting you down. We should get moving.<br><b>Korra:</b> Relax, we just got here. Besides, no one knows where I am right now except us. <br><br><i>(Naga returns and drops a ball to Lin's feet. Korra pets her beloved mount.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> I think she wants you to throw it for her.<br><br><i>(Lin looks down at the ball and it is covered with drool and grass.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> I'll pass, thanks. <br><b>Asami:</b> We just got a call on the radio about another airbender!<br><b>Korra:</b> Finally! Where are they?<br><b>Mako:</b> A city called Zaofu, <i>(Lin is visibly uncomfortable)</i> the home of The Metal Clan.<br><b>Korra:</b> You know the place?<br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(crosses her arms uneasily)</i> Er, never been. But I <i>don't want</i> you going there. I'd rest a lot easier if you were back safe in Republic City. <br><b>Korra:</b> Sorry, but if there's an airbender in Zaofu, then that's where we're going next. <br><br><i>(Lin glares to the side. Naga bends down and nudges the ball to Lin with her nose. The metalbender regards the polar-bear dog for a moment before bending out her cable, slapping it against the ball as it punctures and deflates. Naga looks down at the deflated ball and lowers herself down, pawing at it, attempting to roll it on the ground. She makes a sad whining noise and her tail sags.<br><br>Cut to an aerial view of the plains with the airship flying through the clouds. As the clouds past, a huge gleaming city made entirely out of metal in the shape of a lotus flower is seen. There are smaller metal flowers around the city too. Cut to the dashboard of the ship as all four teenagers look out the windows.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(excitedly)</i> Wow, wow, WOW! An entire city made of metal! Oh hoho! You should be right at home, Bei Fong.<br><br><i>(Lin is seated on a bench far away from the windows with her arms crossed. Naga and Pabu are near her.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> Hmm...<br><br><i>(Korra regards Lin sadly. Camera pans out to the landing pad of the city. A metalbender bends a string of cable out and it loops itself around a hook under the airship. Two more metalbender guards bend an intricate flight of metal stairs connecting to the airship. Cut to the inside of the ship as Bolin runs enthusiastically. The rest of the team follows after him with Lin still seated in the background.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> Yeah! <br><br><i>(Asami stops and turns to Lin)</i><br><br><b>Asami:</b> Aren't you coming? <br><b>Lin:</b> What's there to see? It's metal, big whoop. Just find the airbender and let's get moving. <i>(points to the team)</i> And don't tell <i>anyone</i> I'm here. <br><b>Korra:</b> Why not? <br><b>Lin:</b> I don't need to explain myself to you, just <i>do</i> what I say. <br><b>Korra:</b>  Fine. <i>(rolls her eyes and walks away)</i> You got it, Chief Crankypants.<br><br><i>(Outside, the team walk up to a man in green and yellow robes flanked by guards.)</i><br><br><b>Aiwei:</b> Avatar Korra, it is an honor to meet you. <i>(bows with his hands clasped)</i> My name is Aiwei. <br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(returns the bow)</i> Thanks for having us. <br><b>Aiwei:</b> Is this everyone? <br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(looks behind)</i> Yup! <i>(looks back at Aiwei)</i> Just us. So, can I meet the new airbender?  <br><b>Aiwei:</b> <i>(speaks a little stiffly)</i> Of course. <i>(gestures his palm out)</i> Right this way.<br><br><i>(They step onto a platform and the guards bend the gates up containing the Earth Kingdom symbol before bending downwards, sending the platform down. It is a giant elevator. Cut to an aerial view of the landing bay as the platform can be seen traveling down the side of tall metal structure.<br><br>Location changes to Air Temple Island. Cut to the inside of the dining hall as Ikki and her brother Meelo show new airbenders around.)</i><br><br><b>Ikki:</b> And this is the Air Acolyte dining hall where everyone eats. <i>(Daw stops eating and puts his utensils down)</i> And this is Daw, he's a new airbender too, <i>(he airbends himself upwards)</i> like you guys. <br><b>Daw:</b> <i>(bows down)</i> It's so nice to meet you! On the left, there is another black and white photo but this time, it shows Su, her husband, and their five children. On the right, there's a black and white photo of a baby.)</i> It took me a while but, I finally realized what I was looking for was a family. So I bought this plot of land, found a brilliant architect who later became my husband and created a place I could truly call home. <br><b>Korra:</b> It sounds like you created a perfect life here.<br><b>Su:</b> <i>(speaks sadly)</i> Almost. I always wanted Lin to be a part of it but I gave up hope long ago of her ever coming around.<br><br><i>(Korra glances to the side sadly too. <br><br>Scene changes to Opal practicing her airbending on a small pavilion. Cut to a frontal shot of Opal in her stance.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> Hey, <i>(Opal steps to the side to reveal Bolin standing at an archway behind her)</i> little lady. <i>(Bolin walks up to the pavilion and he attempts to flirt but he speaks in an off putting sultry voice.)</i> Wow, you really blowing me away with your airbending. Whoosh.<br><br><i>(Bolin starts to use his hands to fly and makes flying noises. Cut to Opal who isn't amused and she frowns.)</i><br><br><b>Opal:</b> Why are you acting weird?<br><b>Bolin:</b> Why are <i>you</i> acting weird?<br><b>Opal:</b> <i>(turns away from Bolin)</i>  I don't like how you're talking to me.<br><br><i>(The girl starts to walk off. Bolin is hurt and realizes his mistake.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b><i>(chases after her)</i>  Look, I'm sorry. Just stop trying so much, just be yourself.<br><b>Bolin:</b> Huh. Be myself. Yeah, I guess I could give that a shot.<br><br><i>(The young teens stare at each other quietly. Cut to a close up of their face very close to each other but in the background, we can see an outline of Korra.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> Ahem. <br><b>Opal:</b> Oh. The wisest airbender who ever lived.<br><br><i>(Foot steps can be heard)</i><br><br><b>Kya:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> Ikki. <i>(Cut to Kya at the doorway)</i> You should be in bed. Come on.<br><b>Ikki:</b> <i>(waves goodbye to Zaheer)</i> Night.<br><b>Zaheer:</b> Good night.<br><br><i>(Kya waits for her niece to leave the room.)</i><br><br><b>Kya:</b> <i>(turns towards Zaheer and furrows her brows in suspicion)</i> You seem to know <i>a lot</i> about airbender history for someone who <i>just</i> got airbending. <br><b>Zaheer:</b> <i>(his facial expression is calm)</i> I've always admired the culture. <br><b>Kya:</b> And you moved through those gates like a natural. <i>(raises her brows)</i> Where did you say you were from?<br><b>Zaheer:</b> A small village up North. You probably never heard of it. <br><br><i>(Cut to a side view shot of the two as they stare at each other in silence. Kya jumps out of the window with both arms covered with water, similar to how Katara used to fight.)</i><br><br><b>Kya:</b> <i>(waterbends her "arm" towards Zaheer)</i> I need some help!<br><br><i>(She manages to grab a hold of Zaheer and the glider before jumping down into the pond below and slamming him into the water. The waterbender is enraged and she uses the water to propel herself forward. Kya rolls along the ground.<br><br>Zaheer runs towards his glider and attempts to pick it up but he is interrupted by a stream of fire hitting the ground beside the glider. Then she shoots out a double spiralled water attack at Zaheer but he side steps it easily. You're never gonna change. <i>(Lin turns away from Korra)</i> You're always going to be a bitter, lonely woman. <br><br><i>(Cut to a back view of Lin as Korra turns and leaves the room, slamming the door shut off-screen. Meanwhile, Zaheer infiltrated Air Temple Island looking for the Avatar. After battling with Kya, he escaped and is now a wanted man in Republic City!          <br><br><br><br><b><u>Act I</u></b><br><br><i>(Episode opens up to a scenic view of Zaofu in the morning as a flock of doves fly past. Lin stops her car and gets out, running after the two suspects who are attempting to flee from their busted ride. Lin metalbends her cables out and grabs the two teenaged boys by their angles, making them trip and fall onto the screen. The wire spools on Lin's hips spark with friction.)</i><br><br><b>Young Su:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> Leave them alone!       <br><br><i>(Lin is surprised by the familiar sounding voice. Cut to the damaged Satomobile as Su clambers out of the driver's seat with sweat on her face. She looks at her sister uneasily. Cut to Lin with her eyes wide with shock.)</i><br><br><b>Young Lin:</b> Su?              <br><br><i>(Camera zooms in on young Lin's face and it flashes white. We are back to the present and Lin is visibly uncomfortable. She gasps and sits up, bending all the needles off her body. The needles fly around blindly in the room, breaking the mirrors, picture frames, and vases as they make contact. Cut to a profile shot of Lin who is drenched with sweat as she pants to catch her breath. She begins to slide off the table.)</i><br><br><b>Acupuncturist:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> Wait! <i>(he pops into frame and we can see three stray needles on his almost bald head)</i> Leaving in the middle of a session could make you sick.<br><br><i>(Cut to a frontal shot of Lin as she staggers towards the door.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> I'm done here.<br><br><i>(She grabs the doorway and grunts before forcing herself to carry on walking. Lin is obviously not feeling well. Cut to commercial break.)</i><br><br>          <br><br><b><u>Act II</u></b><br><br><i>(Episode returns to Lin back in her own guest house where she is seated on a chair with a hand on her head. The door opens and it catches her attention. Young Su's voice begins to speak.)</i><br><br><b>Young Su:</b> Are you gonna <i>(switch to Lin's point of view where her vision is hazy and she sees a younger form of her sister standing at the door)</i> stay in your room feeling sorry for yourself all day? <i>(Cut to Lin looking confused and she blinks)</i> You owe Opal an apology... <br><br><i>(The voice and form switches to Korra and it appears Lin was hallucinating.)</i>  <br>   <br><b>Korra:</b> For the way you treated her last night. <i>(Korra looks concerned)</i> Are you okay? <i>(walks towards Lin)</i> You don't look good.      <br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(stands up)</i> I'm fine.  <br><br><i>(As she reaches the entrance, she grabs the door unsteadily and grunts before walking off.<br><br>Cut to the acupuncturist who is re-arranging his needles. The door behind him suddenly opens to reveal Lin. The Chief loses her balance and grabs another door beside her.)</i>         <br><br><b>Lin:</b> What did you do to me?     <br><b>Acupuncturist:</b> I tried to <i>warn</i> you. <i>(walks to Lin and begins to support her)</i> Come with me. <i>(aids Lin to the treatment table)</i> Let's go finish the session. <i>(Cut to an overhead shot of Lin as she lays on the table and grits her teeth)</i> Just relax and breathe.   <br><br><i>(The needle makes contact at the Yintang acupoint again. Camera flashes white to Lin's memory where a younger version of herself slams against the getaway vehicle, denting it.)</i>  <br><br><b>Young Lin:</b> So you're robbing stores with the Terra Triad now? <br><br><i>(Cut to a wide shot of the scene as the sisters confront each other in the middle of the road. Su's accomplices sit quietly at the side, watching the commotion.)</i>      <br><br><b>Young Su:</b> I didn't steal anything! I just drove the car. I owed my friends a favor, it's not a big deal.      <br><b>Young Lin:</b> I'm not letting you get away with this.       <br><b>Young Su:</b> <i>(laughs)</i> Oh. What are you going to do, officer, arrest me?  <br><br><i>(Su dismisses her sister and turns her back to walk off.)</i>     <br><br><b>Young Lin:</b> Don't even think about taking one more step!       <br><br><i>(Su is surprised at Lin's threat and she looks a little serious but continues to walk on anyway. Lin metalbends a cable from her hip and it catches Su's right wrist. The younger teen is enraged and she springs out a hidden knife from an arm gauntlet in her left hand, cutting the cable. The action slows down as the cable flies back to Lin and it makes contact with her with a loud smack and a bright flash. Lin is seen clutching the right side of her face and yells in pain. Cut to Su who stares dumbfounded at what she has done. Camera flashes back to Lin in the present with her eyes closed but she still twitches from the agonizing memory.<br><br>Location changes to a bridge in Republic City where the vehicles are held up by a police road block at the end on both sides of traffic. Cut to a police officer stepping up to the delivery man's truck and he visibly has cold sweat on his face.)</i>  <br><br><b>Police Officer:</b> Good afternoon. Where are you off to today?   <br><b>Delivery Man:</b> I, uh, got a delivery to make in Bao Yu. <i>(Cut to the inside of the truck as he reaches over to the passenger seat to grab a small set of documents. We can see that behind him, Ming-Hua has a sharp ice spike pressed onto his abdomen.)</i> I should be back later today. <br><br><i>(The delivery guy hands over the papers to the police officer outside the window.)</i>         <br><br><b>Police Officer:</b> You all right?        <br><b>Delivery Man:</b> Yeah, just a little tired. <i>(tugs on his shirt)</i> One more pickup, then I'm clocking out.     <br><b>Police Officer:</b> I thought you said you had a delivery.       <br><b>Delivery Man:</b> <i>(realizes his mistake)</i> Did I?        <br><b>Police Officer #1:</b> <i>(takes a step backwards as his colleagues head to him for back up)</i> I'm gonna need you to step out of the vehicle <i>(Cut to the inside of the truck as Zaheer and company overhears the conversation)</i> and open the back of the truck.  <br><br><i>(Cut to the outside of the truck as the delivery man gets out and slams the door shut behind him. He takes a few steps as he glances behind him. Then he bolts away and a second officer chases after him.)</i>      <br>        <br><b>Police Officer #2:</b> Hey, get back here!    <br><br><i>(The first officer senses that something is up and runs to the back of the truck.)</i>   <br><br><i>(Tense music plays and the officer lays a tentative hand on the handle of the door. He tugs it down and before he can open it, Zaheer airbends the door open, pushing the officers off their feet.)</i>  <br><br><b>Zaheer:</b> Let's get out of here!  <br><br><i>(Ming-Hua is at the driver's seat now and starts the engines, breaking through the barricade. Police sirens are heard and five police mobiles chase after them. P'li firebends with her mind, taking out two of the cop cars while the remaining three drive around the attack and continue the pursuit. P'li takes out one more vehicle while Ghazan bends a small portion of the bridge into lava. The last two cars drive into the lava and are trapped. Cut to Ming-Hua as she glances at the side mirror and then looks forward to continue driving.<br><br>Location changes to a meteorite perched on a pedestal in Zaofu. Whistling can be heard and Bolin comically stands up, continuing to casually whistle as he glances to the side to make sure no one sees him. He takes the meteorite in his hand and steps backwards. Then he puts one leg forward and begins to press against the rock really hard as he makes all sorts of groans and grunts, trying his very best to metalbend. He changes his position to the horse stance and repeats the procedure again to no avail.)</i>    <br><br><b>Opal:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> Hey, Bolin! <br><br><i>(Bolin is startled and looks to the side to reveal Opal standing a short distance away from him.)</i>         <br><br><b>Bolin:</b> Opal! <i>(hides the meteorite behind his back)</i> Oh, wow. You really know how to sneak up on someone.           <br><b>Opal:</b> What are you doing?      <br><b>Bolin:</b> Oh, nothing, you know, <i>(steps closer to the pedestal)</i> just- Just thinking <i>(places the meteorite back onto the pedestal)</i> about my body and mustaches that I might have in the future.  <br><br><i>(The metal chunk falls down to the ground anyway.)</i>         <br><br><b>Opal:</b> You're acting weird again.  <br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(relaxes his posture)</i> Sorry. I wasn't really thinking about all my mustaches. I'm just- I'm just frustrated. I've been trying to metalbend, and I can't figure it out. Don't tell anyone, okay?    <br><b>Opal:</b> Why not?        <br><b>Bolin:</b> Because it's- it's embarrassing. This isn't the first time I've tried. I mean, I've been wanting to metalbend ever since I heard about Toph. <i>(Opal walks towards Bolin)</i> Your grandmother is my biggest hero.       <br><b>Opal:</b> <i>(lays a hand on Bolin's shoulder)</i> My Mom grew up learning from Toph. Just go train with her. Stop being so scared.      <br><b>Bolin:</b> You know what? Maybe I am scared, but what about you? <i>(Opal removes her hand)</i> I know that you want go to the Northern Air Temple to train with Tenzin, but you haven't done it because you're afraid too.      <br><b>Opal:</b> <i>(turns away from Bolin and looks out at Zaofu)</i> You know what? You're right. I don't want to leave my family and disappoint my Mom.  <br><br><i>(Camera pans out to an aerial view of the two teens with a beautiful shot of the city in front of them.)</i>   <br><br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(nudges her playfully)</i> Look at us... Talking about our feelings, <i>(gives Opal a one-arm hug)</i> supporting each other.     <br><b>Opal:</b> <i>(embraces Bolin)</i> It's nice.     <br><br><i>(Location changes back to Lin on the treatment table once again. Cut to an overhead shot of Lin and the camera zooms in on her face once again before flashing white to reveal young Lin with a bandage on her cheek while young Su has her arms crossed and she glares at her sister. Both are seated in front of a desk. Footsteps sound and the back of someone's armor is seen. Cut to a frontal shot of an older Toph.)</i>     <br><br><b>Toph:</b> What were <i>(points to Su)</i> you thinking?! And what were <i>(gestures a palm to Lin)</i> <i>you</i> thinking? <i>(puts her hand behind her back)</i> You two have put me in an <i>impossible</i> position!      <br><b>Young Lin:</b> You're mad at me? <i>(turns to glare furiously at Su)</i> She's the one who was running around with criminals! <br><b>Young Su:</b> This is all your fault!       <br><b>Young Lin:</b> I was doing my job!      <br><b>Toph:</b> Ugh, all right, enough! <i>(The sisters cross their arms and Toph places a hand on her head)</i> Here's what we're going to do. <i>(gestures to her younger daughter)</i> Su, you need to leave the city as soon as possible. <i>(crosses her arms)</i>   <br><br><b>Young Su:</b> <i>(leans forward with surprise)</i> What? Where am I supposed to go?      <br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(gestures to Su again)</i> You'll go stay with your grandparents. <i>(extends her hand out towards her older daughter)</i> Lin, give me the arrest report.     <br><br><i>(With the report in hand secured with a paper clip, Toph tears the document in half.)</i>     <br><br><b>Young Lin:</b> <i>(shocked)</i> Mom, what are you doing? You can't cover this up. There were witnesses.      <br><b>Toph:</b> I'm the Chief of Police! I can't have a daughter in <i>jail</i>.            <br><b>Young Lin:</b> So, once again, Su gets to do whatever she wants, and there are no consequences.        <br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(sighs with both hands on her head)</i> This is our only option.    <br><br><i>(Camera flashes back to the present with the acupuncturist watching over Lin. He begins to metalbend all the needles off her body.)</i><br><br><b>Acupuncturist:</b> You're going to feel a bit fragile, <i>(sends the needles off-screen)</i> so it's probably best if you take it easy for a little while.<br><br><i>(Lin sits up.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> I don't need to rest. I need to do something I should've done a long time ago. <br><br><i>(With perspiration still on her body, she begins to walk out of the room.<br><br>Scene changes to an aerial shot of the metalbending training courtyard. Su is seated on a little earth bench observing Korra with a hunk of meteorite "floating" in her hands and the Avatar changes the shape into a pentagon.)</i>       <br><br><b>Su:</b> Congratulations. You're the first metalbending Avatar.   <br><br><i>(Korra smiles and stops metalbending, allowing the meteorite to rest on her hip. Footsteps are heard and camera pans right to Bolin as he walks and stops next to Korra.)</i>   <br><br><b>Bolin:</b> So, um... I've been thinking, and I'd like to try to learn metalbending. <i>(Su stands up and heads to Bolin)</i> I mean, I'm sure you have a waiting list or something, like, a couple years, so...   <br><b>Su:</b> <i>(rests a hand on Bolin's shoulder reassuringly)</i> Let's get started.  <br><br><i>(The camera shakes and it pans out to the ground and the metal plates on the dirt behind them quaking. The meteorites fall off their podiums. Cut to Lin who is panting but visibly angry. Cut back to Su with the two teens behind her.)</i>     <br><br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(whispers to Korra)</i> I think Lin is mad about something.   <br><br><i>(They both look to Lin and camera cuts to the Chief.)</i>    <br><br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(continues to pant)</i> Su, it's time we talk.  <br><br><i>(Cut to commercial break.)</i>  <br><br><br><br><b><u>Act III</u></b><br><br><i>(Episode returns to a side view shot of the sisters in a stand off.)</i><br><br><b>Su:</b> After thirty years, you're finally ready to talk?  <br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(walks closer to Su)</i> When we were in Mom's office that day, you <i>could</i> have taken responsibility for what you did, but instead you stayed quiet and let Mom throw her whole career away.  <br><b>Su:</b> Mom didn't throw her career away. She retired the next year. She was a hero.         <br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(incensed)</i> You think she <i>wanted</i> to retire? She was so guilt-ridden about what she did to protect you, she didn't feel worthy of her badge.  <br><b>Su:</b> Look, I admit that I was not a perfect kid and I've made some mistakes in the past, but-                <br><b>Lin:</b> You made some mistakes?     <br><b>Su:</b> Lin, Mom and I already talked about this years ago and worked things out. If you had gotten together with us like we'd asked, you would know that I'm a different person now. I've <i>been</i> a different person for a long time.        <br><b>Lin:</b> You think just because you live in a big, fancy house and have a chef who cooks you fancy food, that you're a different person? Maybe you can fool everyone else, but you can't fool me. I see right through you.    <br><b>Su:</b> You know what, Lin? You're the one who hasn't changed. You're still a bitter loner who only cares about herself. No wonder Tenzin ended things with you years ago.       <br><br><i>(Lin stomps her food and sends a chunk of earth at Su who lifts her hand up and it collides against her fist into small pieces.)</i><br><br><b>Su:</b> Okay, I guess this is how it's going to be.  <br><br><i>(Su earthbends a trail towards Lin, disrupting the metal plate Lin is standing on and causing the various meteorites to fall. Su also sends three meteorite chunks at her sister. Lin is thrown backwards and she does a roll before standing up and running towards Su. The Chief punches the ground to send a series of earth columns at her sister but Su lifts a metal plate up from the ground to shield herself. Su chucks the metal plate at Lin but the older woman jumps over it and lands on the ground. Lin proceeds to earthbend small pieces of earth up and sends it to Su who dodges from side to side. Cut to Korra and Bolin who are observing from the sidelines. As they talk, the earth continues to rumble around them.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> Should I stop them?    <br><b>Bolin:</b> You don't have any siblings. Fighting is all part of the healing process.<br><br><i>(Su cartwheels into screen and a wall of earth chases after her. Cut to Su's sons and husband walking up to a nearby pavilion to see what's going on.)</i> <br><br><b>Wei:</b> <i>(hollers)</i> Go, Mom!       <br><br><i>(Su spins around in a circle and dodges a rectangular piece of earth and she runs off to the side. Lin stomps the ground and metalbends Huan's Harmonic Convergence sculpture at Su who catches it just in time with her own bending. Su sends it crashing into a wall.)</i>       <br><br><b>Huan:</b> <i>(gasps)</i> My sculpture!  <br><br><i>(He runs to his smoking sculpture and the smoke clears to reveal an artistic mess.)</i>        <br><br><b>Huan:</b> <i>(places a hand on his chin)</i> Actually, it looks kind of better now.<br><br><i>(Su earthbends three metal plates on the ground and directs them at her sister who punches the first two away but is hit by the last. Lin grabs the plate and tosses it behind her. The Chief proceeds to chuck more rocks at Su who continues to duck and weave around. Lin earthbends a sizeable chunk or earth and throws it at Su who metalbends the wall behind her around herself in a protective circle. She metalbends the other part of the wall and slams it into Lin who is thrown back into the pavilion her nephews and brother-in-law are standing on. Cut to Lin who is visible exhausted and pants for a while before frowning.)</i>       <br><br><b>Su:</b> <i>(walks across the bridge towards the pavilion)</i> You got it out of your system?       <br><b>Lin:</b> Not quite yet!        <br><br><i>(Lin earthbends the stairs behind her and hovers it over her head. In response, Su earthbends a huge boulder above her own head too. Cut to a side view shot as they run towards each other and Opal lands in the middle of the two women and airbends both chunks of rocks away. )</i><br><br><b>Opal:</b> <i>(raises voice)</i> What are you two doing?! You're sisters! Why would you want to <i>hurt</i> each other?       <br><br><i>(Cut to Su who pants for a bit before looking to the side sadly. Cut to Lin who is trying to catch her breath but her eyes roll backwards and she starts to faint. Camera switches to her point of view looking at her niece and sister as her vision begins to black out. Cut to an overhead shot of Lin who is about to fall into the ground but Korra slides in and catches her body just in time.<br><br>Camera fades to an overhead view of Su's home. Cut to Korra, Mako, and Bolin who are standing outside standing along the corridor outside Lin's guest room.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> Uh... who's gonna knock?    <br><br><i>(Korra pushes Bolin towards the door and he prevents himself from crashing into it.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> Oh! No, no, no, no, no, no. Not me. <i>(walks backwards)</i> You're the Avatar. Why can't you do it?      <br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(uncertainly)</i> Uh, I can. But I just thought that you-             <br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(walks towards the door)</i> I'll do it. <i>(He knocks on the door and leans his body against it to listen for any noise inside the room)</i> Uh, Chief, you've been sleeping for sixteen hours. We just wanted to make sure that you're okay.              <br><br><i>(The door opens and Mako falls into the room. Cut to Mako on the ground looking up and the camera pans up to reveal Lin dressed in Zaofu robes. She stretches and yawns.)</i><br><br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(walks out of the room with a smile)</i> Good morning.     <br><br><i>(Korra and Bolin stare at the Chief with surprise. Mako stands up and he is bewildered too.<br><br>Scene changes to a glass of green juice being placed in front of Lin. Camera pans up to Lin who looks at the drink suspiciously.)</i>     <br><br><b>Lin:</b> What's this?          <br><b>Chef:</b> <i>(leans against the table with one hand)</i> I call it the kalenutsco. It's a mixture of kale, coconut water, and walnuts.  <br><br><i>(Lin takes the glass and chugs the whole beverage down quickly.)</i> <br><br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(smiles at the chef)</i> Not bad. <br><br><i>(Foot steps are heard and Lin turns her head towards the door of the dining room. Cut to the doorway with Opal looking in and she proceeds to walk off.)</i>             <br><br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> Opal, don't go. <br><br><i>(Opal stops and pulls back. Cut to Lin who stands up and gestures to the seat beside her)</i> <br><br><b>Lin:</b> Please, sit down. I want to talk to you.   <br><br><i>(Lin sits down. Cut to Opal who is a little taken aback and her expression changes to pensive sadness. She walks in and take a seat diagonally across from her aunt.)</i>  <br><br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(apologetic)</i> Look, I'm just not really comfortable talking about these kinds of things, and, well... I wanted to say I'm sorry about the other night.     <br><b>Opal:</b> It's okay.          <br><b>Lin:</b> Your mother and I have a complicated relationship and-<br><b>Opal:</b> It's probably difficult for you to be here.       <br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(gives a smile to her niece)</i> You're a smart young woman and an excellent airbender. I think it would be a wonderful opportunity for you to train with the other airbenders at the Northern Air Temple. <br><b>Opal:</b> There's a part of me that wants to go, but I don't want to upset my Mom.        <br><b>Lin:</b> When I was younger, all I wanted to do was please my mother. I became a Police Chief because I thought it would make her happy, <i>(furrows her brows sadly)</i> but it didn't. You <i>need</i> to make decisions based on what <i>you</i> want. Don't make the same mistakes I did.<br><br><i>(Opal smiles before standing up and to give her aunt a hug which Lin reciprocates.<br><br>Scene changes to the inside of a room and the door opens inwards to reveal Opal.)</i>     <br>        <br><b>Opal:</b> Mom? Dad? <i>(Cut to an area behind Opal looking into the room where her parents are drinking tea.)</i> Can I talk to you? <br><br><i>(Opal walks in and closes the door behind her.<br><br>Scene changes to a statue of Toph and a flock of birds fly past. Camera pans down to reveal Lin looking up at her mother's sculpture. Cut to an overhead view of the sisters as Su walks towards Lin.)</i>         <br><br><b>Su:</b> Opal has decided to go to the Northern Air Temple. I'm guessing you had something to do with her decision.    <br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(softly)</i> Well, I was just-     <br><b>Su:</b> It's okay. <i>(smiles at Lin)</i> I'm glad she was honest with me. I want her to do what makes her happy. <i>(looks a little downcast)</i> Mom gave us too much freedom, but I feel like I've made the mistake of giving Opal too little. I think it's time I let her choose her own way. <i>(closes her eyes for a moment before opening them)</i> I'm sorry I gave you such a hard time when we were younger. I can't imagine what my life would've been like if Mom hadn't sent me away, if I had stayed in the city.  <br><b>Lin:</b> <i>(dryly)</i> You'd probably be in prison.              <br><b>Su:</b> <i>(chuckles)</i> You're probably right. Mako told me that you're an excellent Police Chief. Republic City is lucky to have you. I know Mom is proud. <br><br><i>(Lin looks down for a short while and turns back to Toph's statue. Cut to a close up of the statue's face. Camera pans out to the sisters again looking at the figure.)</i><br><br><b>Su:</b> Can we move on? I'd love for you to be a part of my life again. There's plenty of space for you in the house, <i>(Cut to a frontal shot of the siblings)</i> and the kids would love having their aunt around. <i>(Lin looks at her sister)</i> I do need a co-director for my new dance performance.  <br><b>Lin:</b> Whoa. <i>(raises two hands up and pushes down)</i> Slow down. <i>(gives Su a smile)</i> How about for now, I just promise not to show up at your house and attack you again.          <br><b>Su:</b> Deal.  <br><br><i>(Su extends a hand out and we cut to a close up of a handshake. Camera focuses on Lin who is genuinely relieved and happy.<br><br>Location changes to a road near some hills and a grass plain. Camera pans right to the delivery truck and Zaheer's team hiding behind some rocks.)</i> <br>        <br><b>Ming-Hua:</b> We should've grabbed one of those cops. <i>(Cut to a close up of Ming-Hua, Ghazan, and P'li huddle around a fire.)</i> Maybe they know something about where the Avatar is hiding.              <br><b>Ghazan:</b> She could be anywhere.  <br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of P'li.)</i><br>  <br><b>P'li:</b> We'll find her. <i>(She looks behind at Zaheer who is meditating. View changes to a frontal shot of Zaheer in the lotus position.)</i> It's just a matter of time.   <br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of Zaheer's face.)</i><br><br><b>Zaheer:</b> <i>(opens his eyes)</i> She's with The Metal Clan.  <br><br><br><br>[End Credits]

Thanks to the energy shift during Harmonic Convergence, certain people have acquired airbending abilities, including Bumi, Kai, and Opal. But although the new recruits show a lot of promise, they still have a lot to learn. So while Korra remains safe in Zaofu, Tenzin has brought the airbenders to the Northern Air Temple to begin their training.    <br><br><br><br><b><u>Act I</u></b><br><br><i>(Cut to a scenic view of a grass plain with hills and the Northern Air Temple in the background. Various colorful spirits mingle and fly about.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> His pupils once again pleaded with their master <i>(Camera cuts to a close up of the air temple)</i> to eat something, but he refused, <i>(Cut to Tenzin who tells the story excitedly)</i> just like he had each day the entire summer. <i>(Cut to the new airbenders as most of them are not paying attention except for two students)</i> Instead, he simply meditated, getting his nourishmen from the universe. Tenzin walks up to them.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> Actually, the plural of "bison" is "bison."    <br><br><i>(Camera cuts to a close up of the group of adult bison.)</i> <br><br><b>Kai:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> Whoa!              <br><b>Daw:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> Cool!            <br><b>Yung:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> Wow, look at that. <br><br><i>(We return back to Kai and the others on the balcony)</i>     <br><br><b>Kai:</b> Can we ride those?  <br><b>Tenzin:</b> No, that's a wild herd. You just got here.          <br><b>Female New Airbender #1:</b> When's dinner? I'm starving.          <br><b>Yung:</b> Can I change out of my robe now? It's itchy.           <br><b>Kai:</b> This is just as bad as the Earth Queen's prison.  <br><br><i>(Cut to Tenzin who has a hand on his face)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(swipes his hand aside angrily)</i> I'm tired of all this complaining! <i>(turns to his children)</i> Jinora, take over.          <br><b>Jinora:</b> <i>(raises an eyebrow)</i> Does this mean <i>(smiles)</i> I'm the master now?       <br><b>Tenzin:</b> Yes. Just lead them through some basic exercises.  <br><br><i>(Tenzin stars to walk off but is stopped when his daughter speaks up)</i><br><br><b>Jinora:</b> Well, since I'm a master, <i>(takes a hopeful step towards her father)</i> when do you think I can get my tattoos?           <br><b>Tenzin:</b> What brought this on?   <br><b>Jinora:</b> I was just talking to Kai, and he was <i>asking</i> me, so-      <br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(interrupts)</i> Kai! <i>(Tenzin points to the airbenders and Jinora is taken aback)</i> What does he know <i>(Kai comically slides and hides behind Yung as the airbenders watch the quarrel)</i> about when you should get tattoos?! The answer is no! You're just a little girl.      <br><b>Jinora:</b> I'm not a little girl anymore! I can airbend just as well as you. I know everything about our <i>culture</i> and history, <i>(frowns)</i> and I have a stronger connection with the spirits than you ever will. <i>(shoves her father in the legs and he steps aside)</i> Lead your own class!  <br><br><i>(Tenzin is slackjawed at her outburst.)</i>    <br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> Ikki, Meelo, you're up. <i>(Cut to the younger siblings as they look excited. Meelo has a devilish look)</i> Just lead them through the Ba Gua circle.       <br><br><i>(Meelo grins and slides in front of the students)</i><br><br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(points to his right)</i> Look to your left! <i>(the airbenders turn their heads in that direction)</i> Look to your right! <i>(He points to his left and the airbenders do the same.)</i> One of those people will not make it out of here alive.     <br><br><i>(Peaceful music plays and we cut to an aerial view of the wild bison herd flying above the watering hole. Camera pans down to Jinora looking at them from the balcony ledge. Kai walks up to Jinora.)</i> <br><br><b>Kai:</b> Sorry if what I said got you in trouble with your Dad.         <br><b>Jinora:</b> It's not your fault. <i>(turns around and leans against the ledge)</i> He just can't believe that I'm grown up now and I don't need him telling me what to do like one of his recruits.       <br><b>Kai:</b> I know <i>(smiles)</i> something that'll cheer you up.     <br><br><i>(Cut to the plains below as both children fly down on their gliders and land on the ground. Jinora looks around with a puzzled expression on her face. Cut to an aerial view of the empty plains.)</i> <br><br><b>Jinora:</b> Where did all the spirits go?    <br><b>Kai:</b> <i>(Cut to a close up of Kai)</i> Where are the babies?     <br><br><i>(A device is fired and a net envelopes Jinora. She screams and Kai turns around. Using his glider, he airbends at the person who fired the net gun. A wall of earth appears in front of Kai and he turns around to see two more people behind him with net guns. Kai is obviously cornered and one of the captors fire a net to Kai.<br><br>Scene changes to an aerial view of a campsite. Cut to the wheels of a truck as Jinora and Kai are tossed down on the ground, still in their nets. They grunt from the impact. View changes to a back view of a man seated in front of a fire and wearing a pelt of baby bison fur.)</i><br><br><b>Bison Rustler Leader:</b> What are these kids doing in my camp?           <br><br><i>(View changes to a close up of two bison rustlers.)</i><br><br><b>Bison Rustler:</b> We caught them sneaking around. We thought they might tell someone we're here. <br><br><i>(Camera zooms in on the leader's back.)</i>   <br><br><b>Bison Rustler Leader:</b> They're those new airbenders. Must be living up at the temple. <i>(stands up and turns around to order his crew)</i> Hurry up and gather the rest of the gang, and let's get out of here before someone comes looking for these kids. <i>(Cut to a close up of Jinora and Kai who look uncertain and worried)</i> We'll take them to Ba Sing Se with the rest of the fresh meat.          <br><br><i>(Camera slowly zooms in on the duo and we cut to commercial break.)</i><br><br><br><br><b><u>Act III</u></b><br><br><i>(Episode returns to a scenic view of the air temple. Cut to Tenzin meditating in a room.)</i><br>       <br><b>Tenzin:</b> Tattoos. How can she think. <i>(inhales sharply)</i> Focus. Breathe. <i>(inhales)</i> Bumi ruins everything. Inhale. <i>(inhales again)</i> Focus.             <br><br><i>(Pema walks in and takes a seat beside her husband.)</i><br><br><b>Pema:</b> Taking a little break from teaching?         <br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(opens his eyes)</i> I failed. Bumi quit, and the rest of the airbenders want to go home. Can't they see that I'm trying to rebuild an entire culture?          <br><b>Pema:</b> You know, just because these people can airbend, <i>(raises one eyebrow slightly)</i> it doesn't automatically make them Air Nomads.      <br><b>Tenzin:</b> Tell me about it.       <br><b>Pema:</b> I remember when <i>(gestures to herself)</i> I moved out of my parents' house to become an Air Acolyte. That first night, I was <i>so</i> scared and lonely, <i>(cringes)</i> and the bed was so hard.    <br><b>Tenzin:</b> It's actually better for your back. <i>(Pema gives him a glare)</i> Sorry.             <br><b>Pema:</b> The point is, <i>(softens her expression)</i> I really wanted to be there, but it still took time for me to adjust and feel like I was a part of it all. These people are probably feeling the same way. You have to be patient.     <br><b>Tenzin:</b> Now I know how Korra feels when I'm talking to her. <i>(he kisses Pema on the cheek and rests a palm on her face)</i> Thank you, Pema.    <br><br><i>(Cut to the courtyard outside where Bumi are talking to two airbenders. Tenzin steps out and noticing his brother, he walks towards him.)</i>    <br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> Bumi, <i>(his brother glances at the side casually)</i> I want to apologize for losing my patience.     <br><b>Bumi:</b> <i>(crosses his arms)</i> I'm not talking to you.   <br><br><i>(He turns and walks away as Bum-Ju chirps on his shoulder.)</i>    <br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> Hey, get back here! <br><br><i>(Bumi walks off-screen and Tenzin looks back at Yung.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(sighs)</i> Where's Jinora?         <br><b>Yung:</b> I saw her fly off on her glider with her boyfriend.       <br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(surprised)</i> What? Her boyfriend?! <i>(storms off)</i> Kai.      <br><br><i>(We return back to campsite and the bison rustler leader walks up to a truck where they have locked the baby bison up. He slames a fist on the truck to intimidate the baby and it whines sadly.)</i>        <br><br><b>Jinora:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> How can you steal <i>(camera pans up to reveal Jinora locked in a cage above with another calf.)</i> these bison? They're endangered.       <br><b>Bison Rustler Leader:</b> That's why they're worth so much. The Earth Queen and her fancy friends pay <i>big</i> money for bison steaks and other weird meat. <i>(smiles evilly)</i> I even heard she ate her Dad's pet bear.       <br><b>Jinora:</b> You're disgusting.           <br><br><i>(The leader walks away with another smile. Kai is shown in the adjacent cage next to her and he is also locked up with a calf.)</i><br><br><b>Kai:</b> Hey, do that spirit beaming thing <i>(Jinora hugs her legs)</i> you did to find me. Go to the temple for help.      <br><b>Jinora:</b> I can't, I'm all cramped in here, and I need quiet and time to focus. <i>(widens her eyes in realization)</i> But maybe I can send a message. <br>      <br><i>(Cut to a close up of Jinora as she closes her eyes and concentrates.)</i>       <br><br><b>Jinora:</b> <i>(whispers)</i> Spirits, I need your help.   <br><br><i>(The same bird spirit from earlier appears in front of her with a squeak. Jinora opens her eyes and looks up. The spirit gives a series of chirps.)</i>   <br><br><b>Jinora:</b> Go find Bum-Ju. Tell him we're in trouble.      <br><br><i>(The bird spirit flies out of the cage and we cut to an overhead view of Bumi seated in the courtyard talking to Bum-Ju.)</i><br><br><b>Bumi:</b> No, I don't think I should apologize. Tenzin just wants to boss everybody around. I'm too old for that.    <br><br><i>(Bum-Ju sits up and chirps and thrills.)</i><br><br><b>Bumi:</b> Well, let's face it. I'm just not cut out to be an airbender.  <br><br><i>(Bum-Ju waves its arms and continues to squeak.)</i>        <br><br><b>Bumi:</b> Well, that's your opinion.  <br><br><i>(Bum-Ju gives a sad chirp and rests its head on its hands sadly. The bird spirit appears out from the bushes behind them and flies towards Bum-Ju. It lands with a squeak and Bum-Ju's ears raise up and the rabbit spirit looks at the new friend. The bird chirps and Bum-Ju squeaks. Then the bird flaps its wings up and down hurriedly as it continues to chirp urgently. Bum-Ju immediately clambers onto Bumi's lap and rests its paws on his owner's chest, thrilling out loud.)</i><br><br><b>Bumi:</b> Wait, did Jinora send this spirit? <i>(picks Bum-Ju up worriedly)</i> Is she in trouble?      <br><br><i>(Bum-Ju gets out of Bumi's grasp and begins to fly away with its ears. Bumi and the bird spirit follow shortly after. Cut to Meelo instructing the new airbenders in balance by making them stand on one leg.)</i>    <br><br><b>Bumi:</b> <i>(runs in)</i> Jinora's in trouble! We have to go get her.     <br><b>Yung:</b> How do you know?          <br><b>Bumi:</b> Bum-Ju's friend told me.      <br><b>Otaku:</b> <i>(surprised)</i> You are able to communicate with the spirits?           <br><b>Bumi:</b> More or less. I get the gist. <i>(waves his hand)</i> Let's go!   <br><br><i>(Bumi turns and is about to run when Daw interrupts, making him pause in his step.)</i>            <br><br><b>Daw:</b> Shouldn't Master Tenzin be dealing with this? <i>(rubs his head nervously)</i> I don't want to get into trouble.      <br><b>Bumi:</b> Master Tenzin isn't here. It's up to us. Ikki and Meelo, grab some bison. Airbenders, move out! <i>(punches a hand in the air)</i>     <br><br><i>(Scene changes to an aerial view of the watering hole and the bird spirit followed by two bison fly towards the location. The bison land quietly on top of a cliff. Cut to Bumi's point of view looking at the rustlers through a telescope.)</i><br><br><b>Bumi:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> Bison rustlers. <i>(moves telescope's view to the kids)</i> They've got Kai and Jinora locked in crates. <i>(Cut to a frontal shot of Bumi, Daw, and Yung laying on their stomaches to do reconnaissance)</i> Looks like they're getting ready to leave. We'll have to move fast.    <br><b>Daw:</b> I don't know if I'm ready to get in a fight with some bison rustlers. <i>(hugs himself)</i> I can tell without the telescope that they're <i>mean</i>-looking.      <br><br><i>(View changes to a slight overhead shot of the airbenders and Bumi stands up to address his fellow friends.)</i><br><br><b>Bumi:</b> Listen, this is what we've been training for.    <br><b>Daw:</b> We haven't been training that long. <i>(stands up)</i>             <br><b>Bumi:</b> That's not important now. Remember how we persevered together on the obstacle course?<br><b>Otaku:</b> <i>(dryly)</i> You actually quit.      <br><b>Bumi:</b> Well, I'm not quitting now. <i>(An airbender behind Otaku stands up)</i> I know we've had a tough time, me more than anyone. <i>(Camera pans across the airbenders as they all stand up)</i> But we're airbenders, and there aren't many of us, so we've got to stick together. They've got two of our own in cages out there, and we're not leaving until we bring them home.       <br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(stands in front of his uncle and raises his fist)</i> Leave no airbender behind!  <br><br><i>(Cut to a rustler lowering the bars of the cage and locking up a calf inside. He walks away and Kai seizes the chance by lockpicking the lock with two short twigs.)</i><br>       <br><b>Kai:</b> In, down, and... twist.         <br><br><i>(The cage is unlocked and the lock falls. Kai opens the cage up with an audible twang and he jumps out of the truck. The baby bison that was with Kai drops to the ground, helpless. Kai climbs onto the truck to reach Jinora.)</i>    <br><br><b>Jinora:</b> Free the bison first.     <br><br><i>(A hand reaches in and grabs Kai, hauling him up in the air.)</i><br><br><b>Bison Rustler:</b> Hey, what are you doing out? <br><br><i>(Kai grabs the rustler's arm and airbends himself down to the ground, throwing the much bigger man off his feet. The rustler slams into his colleague and two more rustlers rush at Kai. The airbenders run out of their hiding spots to assist their friend and it catches the attention of the rustler leader and his lackeys. As the airbenders surround the poachers, they airbend at the bad guys and the rustler leader earthbends up a column of dirt to protect himself from the wind.<br><br>With them distracted, Kai takes the opportunity to airbend at the leader but he dodges and earthbends a snake trail at Kai, knocking the boy off his feet. Cut to a side view shot of the airbenders continuing their air attack. Daw steps into frame and airbends too. Camera suddenly changes angles to a frontal shot of Daw and the frame rate slows down drastically. A net is deployed behind Daw and it is about to snare him. Cut to a profile shot of Daw as the back of his head tingles. We return back to a close up of Daw as he turns around and ducks. The net passes harmlessly above his head. Frame rate returns back to normal as Daw airbends at the poacher who attempted to trap him.<br><br>Cut to the poacher leader and his grunts hiding behind their earth shields. The leader stands up and sends heaps of earth at the airbenders who side step. Meelo jumps over the earth and lands in front of the leader who attempts to earth spike him but the little boy levitates himself in the air and sends an air blast at the man, knocking him to the ground. In the background, Ikki comes with back up on an air scooter and the two older female airbenders jump off the airball and airbends at another rustler who is knocked back into the column of earth behind him.<br><br>Cut to Bumi who lets out a battle cry and the airbenders charge forward. Scene changes to an aerial shot of Meelo jumping up to avoid an attack by a rustler and airbends the man forcefully away. In the background, the airbenders run in to help while in the foreground, the rustler leader runs off-screen. We cut to the truck as the leader climbs into the driver's seat and drives off, leaving Kai behind.)</i><br><br><b>Jinora:</b> Kai!             <br><br><i>(Kai grabs his glider and flies after the fleeing vehicle. Cut to Tenzin on Oogi's back and three adult bison swoop past Oogi, startling Oogi and his rider.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(squints)</i> What's going on down there?  <br><br><i>(Cut to an aerial view of Kai's glider tailing the truck.)</i><br><br><b>Jinora:</b> Kai, help!          <br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(shocked)</i> I'm coming, Jinora.     <br><br><i>(His expression changes to anger and he flies off-screen. Cut to the trees on the side of the road and the camera follows the chase scene. Camera angle changes to a frontal shot of the truck as Kai manages to catch up to the truck. He grabs onto the side and jumps into the open window of the driver's seat, using airbending to hit the leader's face. The truck swerves unsteadily before gaining momentum. Shadows of the adult bison loom over the vehicle as it resumes its course. We cut to the inside of the truck as Kai is pinned down by the leader with one hand. A bison appears in the window behind him.)</i> <br><br><b>Bison Rustler Leader:</b> <i>(looks out of the passenger seat's window with surprise)</i> What the- <br><br><i>(We see that it is Tenzin who is outside the window and he slams Oogi against the truck. The truck attempts to slow down and Kai escapes out of the window and climbs on Oogi. A mother bison lands in the path of the truck and airbends with her tail. The leader screams and the air attack hits the truck and sends the leader tumbling along the ground. He rolls towards Oogi and the other adult bison which glare at him. Cut to Kai who is enraged and he disembarks from Oogi. He is followed shortly after by Tenzin.)</i><br><br><b>Bison Rustler Leader:</b> You got me. <i>(stands up)</i> I- I give up. <i>(raises his arms in surrender)</i>         <br><br><i>(Kai walks towards him and uses his glider to airbend the leader into the front of the truck. The leader grunts in pain as he lands on the ground and he struggles to get up.)</i>   <br><br><b>Kai:</b> <i>(furiously storms towards the leader)</i> You think you can kidnap Jinora and all these baby bisons?!     <br><br><i>(He uses his glider to bring the leader up in the air and airbends again to slam the man into the truck once more. Kai is about to perform another attack when Tenzin grabs the glider.)</i> <br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> Kai! That's enough. <i>(the leader moans in pain)</i> An airbender never attacks a defenseless opponent. <br><br><i>(There is a pause as we cut to Tenzin who looks serious at first but softens his expression.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(smiles at Kai)</i> But that was very good technique.  <br><br><i>(Cut to a scenic view of the watering hole in the evening and the wild bison herd gather around the pond. Spirits fly by as well. Cut to the cages of the truck as the leader is tied up and inside the compartment. The bars slams down and a hand engages the lock. Cut to Bumi and two other airbenders looking smug.)</i>    <br><br><b>Bumi:</b> Maybe you boys haven't heard, but there's some new airbenders around these parts. And you never mess with an airbender's bison.  <br><br><i>(Camera pans out to the rest of the poachers locked up in the small cages. They walk away. Cut to Daw rubbing his scalp and talking to his friends. Tenzin observes the speech as he walks past behind Daw.)</i>    <br><br><b>Daw:</b> Without my shaved head, I never could have dodged that net. I really felt it coming at me. You guys should totally get shaved.   <br><br><i>(Bumi walks towards his brother)</i>        <br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> I'm proud of you. Your connection with the spirits and natural leadership... You remind me of Dad.      <br><b>Bumi:</b> <i>(remorseful)</i> I'm sorry I've been causing you so much trouble. I guess I was just scared of not being able to measure up as an airbender. You know, even though I'm Aang's son, I never really felt like I was part of the Air Nation before. <br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(places a hand on Bumi's shoulder and smiles)</i> You are now.         <br><br><i>(Wistful music plays and we cut to a shot of Tenzin's three older children and Kai playing with the calves. The mother bison gives Jinora a lick and she giggles in happiness, petting the bison's snout.)</i><br><br><b>Kai:</b> They're so friendly now.      <br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(walks in)</i> The bison are the original airbenders. They recognize their own kind.       <br><br><i>(He bends down to Jinora's level and his daughter runs to him, throwing her arms around his neck. Tenzin returns the hug. Kai watches the reunion with a smile in the background.)</i>  <br><br><b>Jinora:</b> I'm sorry for running off.  <br><b>Tenzin:</b> We're just lucky no one was hurt.        <br><br><i>(Jinora pulls away from the hug)</i><br><br><b>Jinora:</b> I know.              <br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(smooths Jinora's fringe affectionately)</i> But I also realize that perhaps I was too harsh with you.       <br><b>Jinora:</b> Does that mean I can get my airbender tattoos?      <br><b>Tenzin:</b> It's hard for me to believe that my little girl has grown up enough to have her tattoos. But I promise I'll think about it. Fair enough?       <br><b>Jinora:</b> Yeah.             <br><b>Kai:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> Jinora, look! They're flying!       <br><br><i>(Cut to a view of the calves as they float upwards. One baby bison is visibly confused at what is happening. Then we cut to an overhead shot of the calves as they slowly get used to it and they fly even higher. Camera focuses on the father-daughter pair.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> I guess everyone is growing up.    <br><br><i>(Camera pans out to the bison calves with them wiggling their legs and tails adorably.)</i> <br><br><br><br>[End Credits]

We can see Bolin standing in front of Wei.)</i>    <br><br><b>Bolin:</b> Hang on, <i>(holds a meteorite in his hands)</i> I think I got it. Let me just try this.   <br><br><i>(He groans and presses the rock as hard as he can but it falls out of his palms.)</i>   <br><br><b>Bolin:</b> No? Okay, maybe if I- <i>(two metal plates bend up and smack him on either side)</i> ow!      <br><br><i>(Cut to Wei with his arms raised in a bending position.
