Tenzin swiftly avoids the blast by standing on one leg and bending back in a T-shape position in the same pose as Aang in the opening sequence. As he does that, he shoots a stream of air from his fingers, sending Zaheer back. Tenzin runs up to Zaheer and jumps up to land a finishing blow. As he jumps, P'li combustion bends the mountain beside Tenzin, knocking him off course down to the courtyard below.<br><br>Cut to Tenzin who cushions his fall with airbending and his robes are now singed. He lands on the ground in a bending pose but he gets hit by a stream of water and a slab of rock from off-screen, making him fall to the ground. Tenzin stands up and spins around in a circle to avoid small ice spheres. One ice orb shatters against his outstretched palm. A small chunk of rock hits him when he's distracted and another ice ball along with an additional rock strikes him. A gust of air from off-screen knocks him to the ground.<br><br>View switches to Tenzin sliding along the ground in front of Ming-Hua as Ghazan and Zaheer surround him. Cut to a haggard Tenzin as he struggles to stand and camera quickly pans out to him sending blasts of air in all three directions, catching the Red Lotus members by surprise. He forms a protective shield of air around him but P'li strikes him from the airship. Cut to a pillar as Tenzin slams against it and falls to the ground. Tenzin places a hand on the wall and slowly stands up. Cut to a close up of Tenzin as he groans with pain and grabs his shoulder with one hand. One of his eyes is bruised. Zaheer steps into frame and we cut to an overhead view of the Red Lotus having Tenzin surrounded.)</i><br><br><b>Zaheer:</b> Give up. It's over.<br><br><i>(Cut to a profile shot of Tenzin's bruised face.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> As long as I'm breathing, <i>(opens his eyes to look at Zaheer)</i> it's not over.<br><br><i>(Camera pans out and Tenzin weakly attacks Zaheer who avoids the shot. Zaheer retaliates by air blasting Tenzin back to the pillar. Cut to a close up of Tenzin as he pants. View changes to Zaheer as he narrows his eyes. Cut to the back of the courtyard with the Red Lotus far behind in the background. Camera slowly pans left towards a wall as the Red Lotus members take turns to attack Tenzin who doesn't fight back and grunts with each hit. As the camera finally hits the wall, we can't see the showdown any more but we can hear Tenzin let out a cry of pain.<br><br>Scene changes to a close up of an unconscious Kai and a bison tongue enters the frame to lick his face. Kai stirs and opens his eyes.)</i><br><br><b>Kai:</b> Whoa! <br><br><i>(Camera zooms out quickly to reveal Kai hanging upside down with one of his legs stuck in between a pair of tree branches. We can see a curious baby bison flying beside him. The bison flies down off-screen and Kai slowly sits up to grab the branch, freeing his leg. He drops down and camera pans down to him landing on the baby bison's back.)</i><br><br><b>Kai:</b> <i>(rubs the bison's head affectionately)</i> Thanks, buddy. Yip-yip.<br><br><i>(The calf turns around and flies away from the camera, off into the distance)</i><br><br><br><br>[End Credits]<br>

View changes to Mako landing in a big pond under the cavern. He looks around and bends a stream of fire from his hands to illuminate the area. We don't have anything left.<br><br><i>(A couple of the bandits start to search through the broken cabinets. I want to help, but if the governor wants us gone, <i>(looks downcast)</i>there's- there's nothing I can do. <i>(Opal steps back and Bolin leans in to embrace her)</i> I'm sorry- <i>(his girlfriend shoves him away)</i> Hey! Camera pans out to Lefty with supplies on its back and Opal and Kai are on the ground talking to the farmer.)</i><br><br><b>Farmer:</b> Sorry we couldn't give you more, that's all we could spare.<br><b>Opal:</b> <i>(cut to a close up of Opal as she gazes up at the supplies)</i> Every little bit helps. <i>(looks to the farmer)</i> Because of you and the other farmers around here, we have more than enough food to feed the town until we can get some reinforcements.<br><br><i>(Opal and Kai do the kung fu bow and the farmer returns the gesture. )</i><br><br><b>Kai:</b> Thanks.<br><br><i>(Camera pans across more farmers harvesting their crop in the fields. But it does seem like he found his calling, doesn't it? He loves helping people.<br><b>Opal:</b> <i>(looks away)</i> Maybe, it's just- he's changed a lot since he's been around her.<br><b>Kai:</b> <i>(smiles)</i> He's growing up.<br><b>Opal:</b> I just hope we're not growing apart. <i>(Kai stops smiling and there is an awkward silence between the duo)</i> Speaking of long-distance relationships, how are you and Jinora doing?<br><b>Kai:</b> Actually, we're doing fine. <i>(the roar of an airplane engine is heard and both of them look around)</i> You hear that? <br><br><i>(Cut to a view behind Lefty as a plane rapidly flies up from the clouds and quickly glides towards the air bison. )</i><br><br><b>Kai:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> It's more bandits! <br><br><i>(Cut to a bandit on the wing of the plane and he fires a grappling hook off-screen. Everyone thought she was still recuperating, but six months ago, Korra left home and hasn't been seen since. Even Chief Tonraq was shocked to learn that his daughter's whereabouts are unknown. Will you please go see Katara?<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(closes her eyes)</i> All right. <i>(opens her eyes)</i> I'll go.<br><b>Senna:</b> <i>(switch back to a frontal shot of the two again)</i> You're going to get through this. <i>(Korra looks at her mother and Senna hugs her daughter)</i> Oh, I love you so much.<br><br><i>(Korra rests a hand on Senna's arm. She closes her eyes and a tear slides down her cheek. <br><br>Scene changes to Katara in her healing hut and we see Korra in a pool of glowing water in front of the old woman.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> <i>(waterbends the liquid in the healing pool)</i> The poison did a lot of internal damage.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(cut to a close up of Korra completely submerged in the water, save for her head which is above the surface)</i> Can you fix it?<br><b>Katara:</b> <i>(switch to a close up shot of Katara as she continues to move her arms around)</i> I can help guide your healing process, <i>(stops bending and the water pool stops glowing)</i> but whether you get better or not is up to you. <i>(Return back to a despondent Korra as she stares blankly into the water. Camera pulls out to show both Korra and Katara.)</i> I know what it's like <i>(sympathetic)</i> to go through a traumatic experience, and I promise you, if you dedicate yourself to getting better, <i>(gives a small smile)</i> you'll recover stronger than ever.<br><b>Korra:</b> That's what I want, <i>(looks up at Katara desperately)</i> more than anything.<br><b>Katara:</b> Then try something for me. <i>(presses her fingers together in a triangle)</i> Concentrate <i>(gazes down into the water)</i> on your big toe. <i>(Korra looks down and camera cuts to a shot of Korra's right foot in the water)</i> Visualize it moving. <i>(switch to a shot of Korra in deep concentration)</i> Breathe. <br><br><i>(Korra closes her eyes and exhales, visibly relaxing. She opens her eyes and camera returns back to a shot of her foot. Her big toe starts to twitch for a second before slowly pulling away from its neighboring digit. Cut back to a surprised Korra.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(looks up at Katara with a smile)</i> Did you see that? <i>(cut to the old waterbender as she smiles at the Avatar fondly)</i> It worked!<br><br><i>(Scene fades to Katara guiding Korra through her rehabilitation at a set of parallel bars on the other side of the healing hut. Naga is behind Korra and is curled up and asleep.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> The mind can be a powerful ally <i>(switch to a close up of Katara as she looks at her student)</i> or your greatest enemy. <i>(encouragingly)</i> Now, I want you to try taking <i>(cut to Korra as she looks down at the floor nervously with her hands gripping the bars on both sides)</i> a step.<br><br><i>(Korra perspires and hesitates, her breathing speeds up. Cut to Korra's point of view as she grunts and moves her left foot slightly, a little unsure. Cut back to close up of Korra's face.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(gasps as her eyes widen in fear and she tenses up)</i> Ah! <i>(The camera flashes white to Korra tied up at the Red Lotus hideout and she screams in pain when the poison is forcibly pushed into her body. Camera flashes again and we return back to the present as Korra is shellshocked and her hands are off the bars. She falls down onto the wooden floor.)</i> Ugh!<br><br><i>(Naga looks up and lets out a worried whine.)</i><br><br><b>Katara:</b> <i>(off-screen, reassuringly)</i> You're okay. <i>(Korra grabs her head in fear and we cut to a full shot of her on the ground as Katara kneels down and rests a hand on the young girl's head to comfort her)</i> Your body thinks it's still in danger, but you're safe here. <i>(Naga walks into frame and looms over Korra)</i> Use your mind to overcome the pain. <i>(Korra looks up)</i> Try again. <br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(rests her elbows on the floor but still grabs her head)</i> I'm done for today.<br><br><i>(Scene changes to Korra in her bedroom at night with Naga resting at the foot of the bed. Korra is looking down at a piece of parchment in her hands.)</i><br><br><b>Asami:</b> <i>(narrates her letter)</i> "Dear Korra, I miss you. It's not the <i>same</i> in Republic City without you. How are you feeling? <i>(cut to a close up of gloomy Korra)</i> Things are going well here. I just got a big contract to help redesign the city's infrastructure, so I'll be keeping pretty busy for awhile."<br><br><i>(Scene fades to Korra reading letters on her bed again but this time, there is a tall stack of notes on the bedside table.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(narrates his letter)</i> "Hey, Korra. So, I'm not very good at writing letters. It's 2:15 in the afternoon. Weather is fair. Chance of snow showers later today. Bei Fong has me staking out the Red Monsoon hideout, you won't believe what's going down."<br><br><i>(Scene fades again and there are much more letters for Korra on the bedside table as she reads her friend's notes with a sorrowful expression on her face.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(narrates his letter)</i> "My dearest, Avatar Korra. I set off on the morrow with some trepidation, <i>(cut back to Korra still looking sombre)</i> but I am eager to offer any aid I can in stabilizing the Earth Kingdom!"<br><br><i>(Korra narrows her eyes sadly and camera cuts to a floating letter falling down to the floor strewn with more notes from Korra's friends. Switch back to Korra as she looks regretful.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> That came out wrong. <i>(rests a palm against her head)</i><br><b>Katara:</b> <i>(return back to Katara)</i> It's all right. <i>(sets her tea cup down before standing up and walking towards Korra)</i> Let your anger and frustration <i>flow</i> like water.<br><br><i>(Cut to a full body shot of Katara and Korra as the former stands in front of the latter.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> I am trying to understand why this happened to me. <i>(pushes her arm away from her forehead)</i> But nothing makes any sense. <i>(leans back in her wheelchair, dejectedly)</i> I'm tired, Katara. I'm so tired.<br><b>Katara:</b> <i>(kneels down and gives the Avatar a smile)</i> Korra, I know you feel alone right now, but you're not the first Avatar who's had to overcome great suffering. <i>(furrows her brows slightly)</i> Can you imagine how much pain Aang felt when he learned that his <i>entire</i> culture was taken from him?<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(cut to Korra as she looks down, ashamed)</i> That must have been so awful.<br><b>Katara:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> But he never let it destroy his spirit. <i>(Korra looks up at Katara, a little confused and we switch to a profile shot of the two)</i> He chose to find meaning in his suffering, <i>(rests a hand on Korra's hands)</i> and eventually found peace.<br><b>Korra:</b> And what am I gonna find if I get through this?<br><b>Katara:</b> <i>(switch to a close up of a worried Katara)</i> I don't know, <i>(smiles up at Korra)</i> but won't it be interesting to find out? <br><br><i>(Cut to the parallel bars as Korra grabs them and supports herself. Cut to a profile shot of the scene as Korra is three-quarters of the way through. Cut to a frontal shot of Korra as she opens her eyes. You look great.<br><b>Korra:</b> I feel great. <i>(grabs Tenzin's hands)</i> Come on. <i>(pulls him towards the screen)</i> I want to show you how much better I'm doing. <i>(Korra and Tenzin run off-screen)</i><br><br><i>(Scene changes to a shot of the arena where Korra showcased her firebending talent in the very first episode of the series. Camera pans across the three firebender guards as they get into position. Cut to Korra in her training gear as she punches out two blasts of fire, followed by a roundhouse kick which is also sent out as a stream of fire.<br><br>Cut to the guards as one quickly ducks to avoid the first blast while the second attack gets intercepted by the next guard and the fire dissipates. We cut to a back view shot of Korra's head as she slices through her hair, leaving her with a short bob haircut. Stray strands of cut hair fall down.<br><br>Cut to commercial break.)</i><br><br><br><br><u><b>Act III</b></u><br><br><i>(Episode opens to a back view shot of Korra with a green winter coat on, walking through a snowy tundra in a blizzard. She stops and gazes up at the orange Northern Spirit Portal in the distance before continuing her journey. <br><br>Scene changes to the portal from inside the Spirit World and Korra walks through the portal. Cut to a view of the Tree of Time as various spirits linger on its branches and a spirit whale 'swims' in the air behind the tree. Korra walks into frame and stops. <br><br>Camera fades to Korra, with her winter coat off, seated in the lotus position with her eyes closed as she meditates inside the Tree of Time. Camera pans across Korra peacefully concentrating. Cut to a close up of the light spirit who is at first shocked but then smiles and turns around. Switch to a view from the outside of the Tree of Time.)</i><br><br><b>Light Spirit:</b> <i>(beckons the other spirits)</i> Everyone, come here! It's the Avatar!<br><br><i>(The spirits start to fly towards the tree and we cut to a close up of the mouth of the tree as the spirits gather. A snail-like spirit stops beside the bean spirit.)</i><br><br><b>Skeptical Spirit:</b> You sure? <i>(looks towards the light spirit)</i> I don't sense any Raava energy around her. Besides, she's not dressed like the Avatar. <i>(cut to a close up of Korra)</i> And doesn't the Avatar <i>(Korra frowns)</i> have ponytails?<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(opens one eye)</i> Do you mind? <i>(closes her eye)</i> I'm trying to concentrate here. <i>(return back to a view from the mouth of the tree)</i> And, yes, I am the Avatar. I'm just wearing different clothes and I cut my hair.<br><b>Light Spirit:</b> <i>(glances over to the skeptical spirit)</i> See? <i>(it jumps into the tree)</i> I told you guys it was her. <i>(the other spirits follow)</i> How come you've been away so long?<br><br><i>(The spirits gather in front of Korra and the bean spirit eagerly runs up to Korra, touching her leg with its little arms.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> I was hurt pretty bad awhile ago, and lost touch with my Avatar Spirit.<br><b>Skeptical Spirit:</b> <i>(to the light spirit)</i> No wonder I couldn't feel Raava's energy.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(looks a little dismayed)</i> I came to the Tree of Time hoping to reconnect with Raava and turn on the Avatar State again. But it's not working. <i>(the bean spirit clambers onto Korra's lap)</i> The last time I was here I saw all sorts of visions. Now I don't see anything.<br><b>Light Spirit:</b> Maybe we can help you get better.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(cut to a profile shot of Korra)</i> I'm sorry, <i>(picks up the bean spirit and gently lowers it on the ground in front of her)</i> but for years people have been saying <i>(stands up and grabs her bag)</i> they can help me get better. <i>(walks off)</i> Nothing's worked. <i>(turns around to face the spirits)</i> I need to figure this out on my own.<br><br><i>(Korra leaves the Tree of Time as the spirits watch her walk away. <br><br>Scene fades to Korra's boat sailing the seas somewhere near the Northern Water Tribe. Please give Naga <i>(camera zooms in on Korra as she shields her eyes with her arm and looks up)</i> a big hug for me. Love, Korra."<br><br><i>(Cut to a back view shot of Korra and the camera pans up to reveal Raava looming at the top of a sand dune.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(cut back to a surprised Korra)</i> Raava? <i>(runs up the side of the dune)</i> Raava!<br><br><i>(She struggles a bit but gains momentum to climb up. When she reaches the top of the dune with a smile on her face, the happy expression disappears and we cut to an aerial view of the desert to show Korra alone in the vast expense of sand. Frame rate returns back to normal as Korra slowly stands up and backs away from the phantom.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> You're just in my mind. <i>(cut to a close up of phantom Korra)</i> You're not real.<br><br><i>(The phantom narrows her eyes before moving her arms in a circle, punching fire blasts out from both fists towards Korra. Meanwhile, after wandering the World trying to heal herself, a spirit led Korra to The Swamp, where she met Toph Bei Fong. Will this earthbending master be the key to Korra regaining her Avatar mojo?<br><br><br><br><b><u>Act I</u></b><br><br><i>(Episode opens up to a shot of City Hall in the background with a group of leaf spirits chasing each other in the foreground.)</i><br><br><b>Wu:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> So then the crowds are gathered, <i>(the camera focuses properly on City Hall and we can see a stage and a couple of huge crates in the area in front of the steps of City Hall)</i> all excited to see <i>my</i> coronation, <i>(camera zooms in to Wu talking excitedly to Mako while a metalbender cop is reading a parchment behind the prince and President Raiko is talking to two cops in the background)</i> when all of a sudden, these boulders come rolling through. <i>(cut to a close up of Mako looking bored while Wu starts to gesticulate)</i> And guess what pops out of 'em? Earthbender dames! These gals start banging the boulders like drums and sing the song of my royal lineage. It's the most dynamite six-hour show you've ever seen in your life.<br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(cut to Mako who looks a little worried)</i> Shouldn't you be getting ready to... I don't know- rule the whole nation?<br><b>Wu:</b> <i>(switch to a profile shot of the two with the crates which are flattened bleacher seat columns in the background)</i> Now, now, now. They say she's throwing some of her dissenters into prison camps.<br><b>Raiko:</b> <i>(camera returns back to a shot of the trio)</i> Well, she'll be stepping down tomorrow. <i>(Mako looks at the President)</i> We can worry about correcting any of her mistakes after that.<br><b>Mako:</b> And <i>(the two leaders turn to him)</i> you're not worried about her handing power over to Prince Wu?<br><b>Raiko:</b> When Kuvira started cleaning up the Earth Kingdom, <i>(furrows his brows slightly)</i> she knew her position wasn't permanent. <i>(looks to the prince)</i> She gave me her word that she'd step down.<br><br><i>(Cut to the prince as bends down and moves his knees in and out quickly repetitively. I guess I can help.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(jumps with glee)</i> Thank you! <br><br><i>(Korra spreads her arms open in an attempt to embrace Toph but before the Avatar can take a step, Toph raises her arm up and earthbends up a wall of earth, causing Korra to smack right into it.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> Nah-ah-ah-ah. <i>(Korra falls backwards, off-screen)</i> You want to hug something, <i>(bends the wall back down to the ground)</i> go hug a tree. <i>(cut to a close up of Toph as she grins)</i> We're here to work.<br><br><i>(Scene changes back to the hotel Prince Wu is staying in. Ha-ha! <i>(slaps her hands on her knees)</i> I would have <i>(chuckles)</i> destroyed you!<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(drops her arms in dismay)</i> I just don't understand why <i>(Toph stands up and walks away)</i> I can't get back to my former self. It's like... I'm a step slower. <i>(Korra follows after Toph)</i> I'm tentative. I'm out of sync. <i>(switch to a slight overhead shot of teacher and student)</i> I just can't get back in the groove.<br><b>Toph:</b> Probably carrying around that metal doesn't help.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(raises an eyebrow)</i> What metal?<br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(turns towards Korra)</i> The little bits of metal poison stuck in your body. <i>(switch to a full body shot of Toph as she chuckles)</i> Are you trying to tell me you can't feel metal in your own body? <i>(frowns)</i> You really are the worst Avatar ever.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(cut to a surprised Korra)</i> I thought Su got it all out.<br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(cut to a profile shot of Toph)</i> No, my girls never really picked up metalbending all that well, if you ask me.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(switch to a full body shot of the two)</i> That's been <i>(climbs up the root)</i> my problem this entire time! <i>(grabs Toph by the shoulders)</i> I gotta get it out. <i>(speaks excitedly to Toph)</i> You can get it out for me, right?<br><b>Toph:</b> Who do you think you're talking to? <i>(places a hand on Korra's face and shoves her off the root)</i><br><br><i>(Scene changes to the Little Ba Sing Se Fashion Mall. Camera zooms in on one of the streets in the Lower Ring of the mall.)</i><br><br><b>Wu:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> Once we're done with these, we can go into the Middle Ring and I'll let you pick out some new suits. <i>(cut to a close up of Wu and Mako seated at a table in the street, drinking their smoothies)</i> Then we'll hit the boutiques in the Upper Ring for me.<br><br><i>(Wu slurps his drink noisily and a couple of girls in Kuvira shirts walk past, catching Wu's attention. The prince spits out his juice onto Mako and stands up, knocking his chair backwards. Cut to back view shots of the girls as Wu runs up to them.)</i><br><br><b>Wu:</b> Where did you <i>(the girls turn around)</i> get those shirts?<br><b>Girl 1:</b> <i>(turns to Girl #2)</i> Aces, right? <i>(Girl #2 nods)</i> Kuvira is my hero. <i>(clasps her hands together)</i><br><b>Girl 2:</b> They're selling them over there. <i>(points to an area behind Wu and the royal turns around)</i><br><br><i>(Camera zooms in on a shop filled with Kuvira supporters. Cut to Wu, annoyed as he tugs on his hair and runs off. Cut to a close up of the Kuvira shop as one of the shop owners hands a pamphlet to a customer.)</i><br><br><b>Wu:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> You can't sell that <i>(the Kuvira supporters glance towards Wu with disdain)</i> junk in here! <i>(switch to a view from behind the supporters looking at Wu as he runs down the street)</i> This is the little Ba Sing Se fashion mall, <i>(cut to a close up of Wu as he stops)</i> and I'm the little King <i>(points a finger down)</i> here! Respect the brooch!<br><br><i>(Return back to the shop as the supporters boo at Wu.)</i><br><br><b>Kuvira Supporter #4:</b> Stop it, little King! <i>(boos)</i><br><br><i>(Cut to an aerial view of the street as Mako quickly runs up to Wu.)</i><br><br><b>Wu:</b> I am the glorious defender!<br><br><i>(Camera returns back to the ground as Wu raises his arm up, preparing to throw his cup. Mako tries to stop him but the prince hurls his smoothie cup off-screen.)</i><br><br><b>Kuvira Supporter #5:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> I'm covered in juice! <i>(Wu raises a hand to his mouth in an 'oops' gesture)</i> Get him!<br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(grabs Wu's elbow)</i> We need to get you out of here.<br><br><i>(Mako tugs Wu away and exciting drum chase music plays as the two run down the street with the supporters hot on their tails. Cut to a tracking shot of the fleeing pair and camera pans left to the supporters who are running after them. Cut to Mako as he flings Wu behind him and bends fire towards the camera. Switch to a shot of the Kuvira supporters as the fire creates a temporary barricade on the street and the supporters flinch from the flames as they are unable to pursue. <br><br>Cut to a view of the street as a passer-by glances at the fire before returning to his book. Camera pans left to reveal Mako and Wu hiding out in an alley. The bodyguard grabs Wu by his cravat and tugs him off-screen. As the prince is dragged away, we see a defaced poster of him on the wall. <br><br>Scene changes to a royal pavilion. The elevator dings and the doors slide open to reveal Wu and an annoyed Mako.)</i><br><br><b>Wu:</b> Ooh! <i>(steps out of the elevator)</i> It's destiny! <i>(cut to a shot of the royal palace replica in the fashion mall)</i> Look where we are, Mako... the royal palace. <br><br><i>(Wu enters the frame and runs towards the structure. Cut to the entrance as Wu runs inside, rudely interrupting a photographer who was going to take a picture of a mother and daughter posing next to a statue of Bosco the Bear.)</i><br><br><b>Wu:</b> The throne! <i>(Switch to the inside the palace to reveal a buffet restaurant with patrons carrying trays of food. Wu runs in and shoves them, causing the dishes of food to fall on the ground as he heads towards a throne on the stage.)</i> Out of my way!<br><br><i>(Cut to a child seated on the throne with a crown on his head and a sceptre in his hand. A hand reaches for the sceptre and tugs it.)</i><br><br><b>Kid:</b> Hey! <i>(camera changes to a full view of the throne as the child struggles against Wu's force while the boy's mother stands in the background, aghast)</i> It's my birthday!<br><b>Wu:</b> <i>(successfully tugs the sceptre away from the boy)</i> It's my coronation day! <i>(grabs the robe from the mother's arms)</i> You'll have another birthday next year, <i>(jabs the kid out of the throne with the sceptre)</i> but I'll never have this day <i>(grabs the crown from the kid's head as the mother frowns with disapproval and leads her son away)</i> back again! <i>(puts the crown on his head and sits on the throne)</i> Never! <br><br><i>(Wu cries to himself as he drapes the robe over his shoulders. Cut to a view of the back of the throne as Mako slowly climbs up the steps leading to the stage. The mother continues to throw dirty looks at Wu.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> Okay, you're losing it.<br><b>Wu:</b> <i>(cut to a shot of the throne and Wu has tears in his eyes)</i> This is the worst day of my life! <i>(sobs pathetically)</i><br><b>Mako:</b> Why? Do you really <i>want</i> to be the King? <i>(switch to a close up of Mako with a raised eyebrow)</i> I mean, Kuvira might be a power-crazed dictator, <i>(furrows his brows)</i> but at least she spent the last few years working hard to make the Earth Kingdom somewhat better. If you were an Earth Kingdom citizen, <i>(cut to a shot of a despondent Wu)</i> do you think you're the kind of person you want as your King?  <i>(Wu looks up at Mako like a sad little boy)</i> What have you ever done for your people? <i>(cut back to Mako as he looks away)</i> I'm sorry. <i>(return back to a full view of the throne)</i> That was out of line.<br><b>Wu:</b> No. You're right. <i>(Mako bends down to Wu's eye level)</i> No one ever talked to me like that before. I guess I'm just a joke who got what he deserved. <br><br><i>(Mako looks out of the restaurant and we cut to his point of view as we see Kuvira supporters standing outside the restaurant. Cut back to a shot of the throne as Mako is a little alarmed.)</i><br><br><b>Mako:</b> Let's get you out <i>(stands up)</i> of here and back to some place safe.<br><b>Wu:</b> <i>(looks at Mako)</i> Carry me?<br><b>Mako:</b> <i>(deadpans)</i> No.<br><br><i>(Scene changes to an overhead shot of Korra laying down on the rattan bed in Toph's swamp home. Toph is standing on a small rocky platform beside the bed.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> Okay. If you want me to bend out this metal, you need to relax.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(cut to a close up of Korra with her eyes closed but she's frowning)</i> I am relaxed.<br><br><i>(Switch back to a view of Korra and Toph.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> Ha! Seriously? <i>(Korra continues to frown)</i> Your body is like a twisted tree trunk.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(lifts her back off the bed and opens her eyes)</i> Just do it! I'm ready! <i>(closes her eyes and leans back on the bed)</i><br><br><i>(Cut to a frontal shot of Toph as she cracks her fingers and pops the joints in her neck. She raises her arms up and we return back to a shot of Korra on the bed as Toph reaches towards Korra's feet and does a pulling motion, similar to what Su did to remove the poison three years ago. As Toph's hands passes over Korra's knees, the Avatar sits up and grabs her calf, grunting in agony.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> It wouldn't hurt if you would just relax! Stop fighting me!<br><b>Korra:</b> I'm not fighting! <i>(plops back down on the bed)</i><br><br><i>(Toph cracks her shoulder joints and does the pulling motion once again. Cut to a close up of Korra's face as she furrows her brows with worry and her eyes tremble behind her eyelids. Camera flashes white to a memory of Korra in the Avatar State with a bubble of vacuum around her head. Camera flashes to Zaheer clenching his hands. <br><br>Cut back to Korra as she opens her eyes and screams, turning on her side and clutching her abdomen.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> All right, that's it. <i>(Korra sits up on the bed)</i> You're going to have to do this yourself. <i>(cut to a close up of Toph)</i> Clearly, you want to keep the metal in there.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(switch to Korra turning around to face Toph)</i> What do you mean? <i>(frowns)</i> Why would I want <b>poison</b> inside me?<br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(return back to a shot of Toph as Korra looks at her from the side)</i> I don't know. <i>(raises an eyebrow)</i> Maybe so you have an excuse not to go back to being the Avatar. <i>(arms akimbo)</i> If you don't get better, you can't do your job, so you don't have to worry about getting hurt again.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(lets out a frustrated sigh)</i> What? That's ridiculous.<br><b>Toph:</b> Whatever. <i>(turns away)</i> When you want it out, <i>(lowers the rocky platform back to level ground)</i> you can bend it out. <i>(walks away)</i> I can't deal with <i>all</i> your issues for you.<br><b>Korra:</b> Wait! <i>(Toph stops in her tracks)</i> What am I supposed to do now?<br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(frowns)</i> How should I know? Ask the spirit that brought you here. <i>(climbs onto a raised platform and sits down)</i> The good news is, if you're looking for a place to hang where no one will bother you, <i>(cut to Korra looking downcast)</i> you picked the best swamp in the World!<br><br><i>(Scene changes to beautiful view of Air Temple Island in the evening.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> This is a mission of the utmost importance <i>(cut to a shot of Tenzin's back as he is standing in the meditation pavilion, looking out into the sea)</i> Conflict is coming to the Earth Kingdom, and we need to find the Avatar. <i>(turns around to face the camera)</i> Can I count on you three <i>(camera pulls out to reveal the backs of Tenzin's three oldest children)</i> to bring Korra home?<br><br><i>(Cut to a frontal shot of the children as Meelo stands with his hands on his hip, looking rather serious. He is standing in the middle of the line up.)</i><br><br><b>Meelo:</b> You can count on one of us. <i>(gestures to his sisters behind him)</i> I don't know about these two ladies. <i>(Jinora and Ikki glare daggers at Meelo as he puts his hands back down on his hips)</i><br><br><i>(Location changes to a rail track as Kuvira's train passes by. Cut to the inside of the train to reveal a machine with a wide space in the middle. Zhu Li's hand enters the screen and slots the spirit vine, now inside a canister, into the wide space. We can see probes sticking into the vine. Cut to the control panel as Zhu Li adjusts the dials on the panel, causing some bulbs to switch on and flash white. She then pushes a lever upwards and camera pans out to a full view of the intricate machine in one of the train cars. Varrick, now wearing goggles, stares down at the vine. We can also see Kuvira standing on the second floor looking down at the machinery.)</i><br><br><b>Kuvira:</b> <i>(cut to a close up of Kuvira)</i> From now on, developing this technology is your number one priority.<br><br><i>(Cut to Varrick with oddly colorful goggles as he bends down and touches the canister with the spirit vine inside.)</i><br><br><b>Varrick:</b> This is going to change everything.<br><br><br><br>[End Credits]

So Tenzin tasked Jinora, Ikki, and Meelo with finding the Avatar. Unbeknownst to the kids, Korra found refuge in The Swamp with Toph, who discovered there was still metal poison in her body. But when Toph tried removing it, Korra resisted. Will the airbender kids find the Avatar and help her return to action?<br><br><br><br><b><u>Act I</u></b><br><br><i>(Episode opens to a shot of an air bison and some airbenders in the courtyard on Air Temple Island. Meelo then throws the other bag up, making it land in the saddle.)</i><br><br><b>Pema:</b> <i>(turns towards her husband)</i> Tenzin, are you sure you can't go with them?<br><b>Ikki:</b> <i>(in the background as she jumps off the saddle and chases after her brother)</i> Meelo! <i>(both children run off-screen)</i><br><b>Tenzin:</b> Raiko asked me to stay here and help figure out a diplomatic solution to this Kuvira problem.<br><b>Ikki:</b> <i>(pops out in front of her parents and leans against the railing)</i> Mom, we'll be fine. <i>(Meelo pops out with Poki and leans against the railing too)</i> Grandpa Aang and his friends were around our age when they traveled the World.<br><br><i>(Switch to an opposing shot and we can see that Pema has a sack of food on the railing. Jinora walks into frame to join her siblings.)</i><br><br><b>Pema:</b> Well, at least I won't have to worry about you <i>(pats the food sack)</i> starving out there.<br><b>Meelo:</b> Mom, we're going to be in the wild, <i>(turns away from Pema slightly and raises an arm out)</i> living off the land. We don't need your food. <i>(Meelo jumps off the railing and turns his back towards Pema, crossing his arms as Poki chirps)</i><br><b>Pema:</b> <i>(reaches into the rucksack)</i> But I made your favorite treat. <i>(pulls out a package wrapped in a leaf)</i><br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(turns towards his mother)</i> Sweet buns with happy faces on them? <i>(Pema nods and we cut to her point of view with her hand extended out)</i> Well, <i>(walks towards Pema)</i> I guess we're not officially on the road yet.<br><br><i>(Leans against the railing and takes the leaf wrapper into his hand. He then loosens the string that is tied around the leaf with his teeth, revealing a bun with orange-brown icing on it. Poki steps onto the railing with a chirp and he looks at the food.)</i><br><br><b>Meelo:</b> Aw, this one is smudged. <i>(shows the bun to Pema and a bit of the eyebrow and smiling mouth is smudged)</i> I can't eat this.<br><b>Pema:</b> <i>(switch to a profile shot of Pema with her son)</i> You know, sometimes, <i>(gently pokes Meelo on the nose)</i> things get smudged in the wild.<br><br><i>(Cut to a hand pulling on a rope containing the sack of sweet buns, fastening it securely. Switch to a full shot of the air bison and Tenzin's family as Jinora jumps off the saddle and lands in front of her father, cushioning her fall with airbending. In the background, Ikki and Meelo are hugging their mother before pulling away. Ikki then bends down and gives her youngest brother, Rohan, a hug as well. Jinora embraces her father.)</i><br><br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(pulls away from the hug)</i> Were you able <i>(Meelo and Ikki propel themselves up into the saddle with their airbending)</i> to get a read on Korra yet?<br><b>Jinora:</b> No, but once we're further out, I'll be able to hone in on her spiritual energy. <i>(Pema walks into frame)</i> We should be able to find her within a few days. <i>(Jinora embraces her mother)</i><br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(angles his head upwards to the saddle)</i> Good luck, and be careful. Remember, Jinora's in charge.<br><br><i>(Switch to a shot from behind Tenzin's back as he looks up to the saddle. Jinora has propelled herself up onto the bison's head with airbending and she takes the reins.)</i><br><br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(standing up in the saddle with his arms akimbo)</i> I answer to no man <i>(turns to Jinora)</i> or girl, even if she does <i>(draws an imaginary line across his forehead)</i> have tattoos.<br><b>Tenzin:</b> <i>(sternly)</i> Meelo...<br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(puts a leg on the saddle and points to the front)</i> Now, let's move out, soldiers.<br><b>Jinora:</b> <i>(sighs)</i> Pepper, <i>(tugs on the reins)</i> yip yip.<br><br><i>(Pepper grunts and flies off-screen. Tenzin turns to the side as he watches his three oldest children leave. Pema enters the frame and looks at them worriedly. Tenzin looks at his wife and we switch to back view shots of the couple as Pepper flies off into the sky. The airbending master places a reassuring arm on Pema's shoulder and pulls her in slightly as they watch their children go.<br><br>Scene fades to Pepper flying across some hills. Scene fades again to Pepper landing on a small outpost above a rocky column. Meelo quickly jumps off the saddle and cushions his fall with airbending. )</i><br><br><b>Meelo:</b> Finally! <i>(cut to a frontal shot of Meelo as he grabs his groin and runs off-screen)</i> I've been holding my pee for an hour.<br><br><i>(Switch to another view of the little outpost as Jinora walks around and observes the spirits lounging on the roofs of the small towers on the outpost. She then takes a seat in front of a tower and we cut to a close up profile shot of her as she closes her eyes.)</i><br><br><b>Ikki:</b> <i>(pokes her head around the corner of the tower behind Jinora)</i> If you get through to Korra, tell her I said hi.<br><br><i>(Ikki moves away and Jinora opens her eyes before closing them again. Ikki peeks around the corner once more.)</i> <br><br><b>Ikki:</b> Do you feel anything yet?<br><br><i>(Jinora lets out a frustrated groan and Ikki moves away before appearing out of the corner again with her hands on her hips.)</i><br><br><b>Ikki:</b> What's taking so long?<br><b>Jinora:</b> <i>(opens her eyes, visibly annoyed)</i> Ikki, I can't <i>concentrate</i> if you keep talking. <i>(switch to a frontal shot of the sisters and we see a group of raccoon-like spirits flying in the background)</i> Why don't you go play with one of those spirits?<br><br><i>(Ikki sighs and moves away slightly, leaning against the tower. Meelo runs into frame.)</i><br><br><b>Ikki:</b> <i>(to Meelo)</i> Jinora's spirity powers are broken, and she doesn't know where Korra is.<br><b>Jinora:</b> <i>(opens her eyes)</i> My powers are not broken. I just need more than two seconds <i>(switch to a close up of Ikki and Meelo)</i> and some quiet.<br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(Poki climbs onto Meelo's shoulder)</i> While you try to pull yourself together, Poki and I are going to go into town and find out if anyone's seen Korra.<br><b>Ikki:</b> Sounds like a good plan to me.<br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(points a finger up)</i> Enough chit chat. <i>(cut to Meelo's point of view, looking at a confused Ikki)</i> You can hold the picture <i>(unfurls a parchment)</i> of Korra I drew.<br><b>Ikki:</b> <i>(surprised)</i> Wow! <i>(takes the drawing into hand and we switch to her point of view looking at a very realistic drawing of Korra)</i> I didn't know you could draw. <i>(pulls down the portrait slightly)</i><br><b>Meelo:</b> You don't know a lot of things about me, sister. Let's roll. <i>(runs off-screen)</i><br><br><i>(Switch to a scenic shot of the outpost as Meelo jumps off the pillar and opens the wings off his glider suit to head towards the town in the background. Ikki follows suit. <br><br>Cut to a street inside the town as Ikki and Meelo approach an elderly woman in front of a fruit stand. Cut to a frontal shot of the old lady.)</i><br><br><b>Meelo:</b> Have you seen <i>(points to the portrait of Korra that Ikki is holding)</i> this woman?<br><b>Elderly Woman:</b> Well, aren't you an adorable little thing?<br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(flexes his arms slightly)</i> I'm not adorable. I'm dangerous.<br><b>Elderly Woman:</b> <i>(pinches Meelo's cheek)</i> Dangerously cute with those cheeks. <i>(walks away)</i><br><b>Ikki:</b> Aww...<br><b>Meelo:</b> This never happened. Let's split.<br><br><i>(Scene fades to Pepper flying across a grass plain in the evening. Scene fades to a man with a nose ring and multiple piercings on his ear.)</i><br><br><b>Seedy Guy:</b> The Avatar? <i>(switch to a full shot of the man with Ikki and Meelo standing in front of him in what appears to be a tavern)</i> We still have one of those? <i>(places his tanker on the counter)</i> Haven't seen her, kid. Sorry. <br><br><i>(The kids walk off dejectedly as Meelo groans with frustration.)</i><br><br><b>Meelo:</b> Man!<br><br><i>(Scene fades to night and the kids are around a campfire. Jinora reaches into the sack of food and throws sweet buns to her siblings. <br><br>Scene fades to Meelo peeking out from a rooftop. Camera pans down to a beautiful girl selling orange flowers on the street. Meelo opens his glider suit and quietly floats down towards the girl. A passer-by walks past and when he clears the frame, Meelo has tucked the wings of his suit and is standing beside the unsuspecting girl.)</i><br><br><b>Meelo:</b> Can I trust you? <br><b>Tuyen:</b> I guess so.<br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(cut to a close up of the two as Meelo bends down and whispers)</i> I'm on a top secret mission to find the Avatar. <i>(lifts Korra's portrait and the girl looks at the picture)</i> Have you seen her?<br><b>Tuyen:</b> I haven't, sorry. Top secret mission, huh?<br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(stands up)</i> Yeah, it's been pretty dangerous. <i>(camera pulls out to full body shots of the two)</i> I've seen <i>(rolls the parchment)</i> some things.<br><b>Tuyen:</b> <i>(intrigued)</i> Really? <i>(stands)</i> What kind of things?<br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>Crazy</i> things.<br><b>Tuyen:</b> Cool.<br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(tucks the scroll behind his back)</i> I'm Meelo. What should I call you, <i>(takes a step suavely towards the girl)</i> other than, beautiful?<br><b>Tuyen:</b> I'm Tuyen. Nice to meet you.<br><b>Ikki:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> Ooh! <i>(Meelo and Tuyen look up and camera pans upwards to reveal Ikki eavesdropping on them from the roof)</i> Meelo found a girlfriend.<br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(cut to a slight overhead shot of Meelo and Tuyen)</i> Go away, Ikki!<br><br><i>(Switch to a back view shot of the duo as Ikki lands in front of them and cushions her fall with airbending.)</i><br><br><b>Ikki:</b> Jinora's been looking for you. We're moving on.<br><b>Tuyen:</b> Looks like you got to get back to your mission. <i>(hands an orange flower to Meelo)</i> Good luck, Meelo.<br><br><i>(The young boy takes the flower and Tuyen walks away, rubbing Meelo's hair affectionately as he blushes. Cut to a close up of Meelo as he gives a goofy, lovesick smile. Camera pans to the side to reveal Ikki who is also smiling at the cute sight.)</i><br><br><b>Meelo:</b> Thanks a lot, Ikki. You drove away the love of my life!<br><br><i>(Location changes to the fishing village Korra visited six months ago. It is evening now. But that doesn't explain why they keep haunting me.<br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(cut to a close up of Toph)</i> Because you need to face your fears. <i>(turns her head towards the Avatar and camera switches to a shot of Korra)</i> You can't expect to deal with future enemies if you're still fighting the old ones. <i>(Korra looks to the side)</i><br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(accepts Toph's words)</i> Maybe you're right, <i>(turns to her teacher)</i> but how am I supposed to move on?<br><br><i>(Return back to a full body shot of the two.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> Boy, you Avatars <i>(sticks a finger into her ear)</i> sure need a lot of hand-holding. <i>(stands up)</i> Get up. <i>(walks away)</i> We're going to the Banyan Grove Tree.<br><br><i>(Cut to Korra who looks confused a first but she pushes herself off the root and follows anyway.<br><br>Scene changes to a shot of the trees in the Swamp in the evening. Switch to a slight aerial view of Pepper and The Swamp as wistful music plays. Return back to Jinora as she opens her eyes and the camera pulls back to reveal Ikki and Meelo glancing down at her.)</i><br><br><b>Jinora:</b> There is an enormous amount of spiritual activity here, <i>(frowns slightly and looks out to The Swamp)</i> but I don't feel Korra.<br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(places a hand on his chin)</i> Well, that's what we get for listening to <i>(turns towards his second oldest sister)</i> Ikki.<br><b>Ikki:</b> <i>(pleads)</i> Guys, we just got here. Let's at least look around.<br><b>Jinora:</b> <i>(turns to face her sister)</i> I'm sorry, Ikki, but I'm with Meelo on this. I don't think we're going to find her here. <i>(return back to a scenic shot of Pepper and The Swamp)</i> Let's go, Pepper.<br><br><i>(The air bison grunts and turns around but vines suddenly shoot out from The Swamp below and ensnares Pepper's legs. The beast growls as it gets pulled down and the children scream.)</i><br><br><b>Jinora, Ikki, Meelo:</b> <i>(simultaneously)</i> Aah!<br><br><i>(Cut to an aerial shot of the trees as Pepper gets fully pulled down into the canopy. Cut to commercial break.)</i><br><br><br><br><b><u>Act III</u></b><br><br><i>(Episode returns to the airbender kids screaming as Pepper gets pulled down into The Swamp. The air bison lands and skids along the water as more vines start to take interest in the intruder. Cut to the saddle wrapped around by vines as Meelo stands up and takes charge, slicing the vines away with airbending while his sister looks on in horror at her brother's sudden ferocity. The boy leaps up and when he lands on a vine, he farts on it, slicing it on half. Camera pans out to Pepper as it pulls a vine away with its teeth with a growl. All of the vines finally retreat. Cut back to the inside of the saddle as Poki and Ikki's new flying squirrel fly in to join their owners.)</i><br><br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(arms crossed)</i> Why did those stupid vines pull us in here anyway?<br><b>Ikki:</b> Because <i>(her siblings turn to face her)</i> they want us here. <i>(clenches her fists togeter as she pleads)</i> I'm telling you, Korra's got to be close.<br><b>Jinora:</b> I don't know, Ikki. I still don't sense Korra.<br><b>Ikki:</b> Well, you <i>(leans towards Jinora)</i> haven't sensed her the entire time we've <i>(waves her arms to the side in frustration)</i> been looking for her.<br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(Poki jumps on Meelo's head)</i> Next time I go on a mission, it's going to be boys only, just Poki and <i>(points a thumb to himself)</i> me. <i>(Ikki sighs in annoyance)</i><br><br><i>(Scene changes to Toph and Korra climbing to the top of a tree root in the evening. Switch to a view behind their backs as the camera slowly pans upwards against the thick root and suddenly pulls back to reveal a beautiful and scenic shot of the Banyan Tree Grove.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> It's beautiful.<br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(camera returns to a scenic shot of Korra and Toph standing on one of the roots which spread out into The Swamp)</i> The roots of the Banyan Grove Tree spread out for miles in every direction, connecting this whole swamp. <i>(cut to a close up of the two as the wind blows their hair)</i> Your problem is you've been disconnected for too long, disconnected from the people who love you and disconnected from yourself.<br><br><i>(Korra takes a few steps forward to a more even part of the root before she kneels down and places a hand on the root. Cut to a close up of Korra's face as she closes her eyes. The camera returns back to a view of her hand on the root and a golden trail of energy shoots forth from the spot beneath her hand and down the long root. The camera follows it from behind and pans up to a shot of the trees in The Swamp. Cut back to Korra with her eyes closed as she is deep in concentration.<br><br>Switch to her point of view as she travels through the root like a tunnel, heading to the light at the end of it. They're here!<br><b>Toph:</b> Good. Hopefully, they're here to take you home.<br><br><i>(View changes to Pepper meandering through the vines in the forest. Cut to a scenic shot of the Banyan Tree Grove as Pepper emerges from the canopy. Switch to a shot of the airbending kids on Pepper.)</i><br><br><b>Jinora, Ikki, Meelo:</b> <i>(simultaneously)</i> Korra! <i>(Jinora and Meelo wave to her)</i><br><br><i>(Return back to a shot of Korra she stands up and we can see the air bison flying close from behind. Cut back to Pepper as all three children leap off Pepper and open the wings of their airbender suits to fly towards Korra with wide smiles on their faces. Cut back to Korra who is smiling as well and she wipes away the happy tears from her eyes. <br><br>Cut to Toph standing to the side and smiling as Jinora lands and rushes towards Korra, embracing the Avatar's waist. Ikki and Meelo throw their arms around Korra's waist as well and the young adult hugs the back of their heads.)</i><br><br><b>Ikki:</b> Oh, <i>(cut to a close up of Ikki as she looks up at Korra with tears in her eyes)</i> we missed you so much, Korra.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(return back to a full body shot of the group hug)</i> I missed you so much too. How did you find me <i>(the children pull away from her)</i> all the way out here?<br><br><i>(Switch to a shot of the kids with Toph behind them.)</i><br><br><b>Ikki:</b> <i>(smiles)</i> Jinora sensed your energy.<br><b>Jinora:</b> <i>(looks at her sister)</i> But we never would've been here if it weren't for Ikki.<br><b>Ikki:</b> <i>(looks to Meelo)</i> I never would've <i>(Meelo smiles to himself)</i> stormed off and found those soldiers if it weren't for Meelo.<br><b>Meelo:</b> I was trying to toughen up these ladies, but I guess it was a team effort.<br><b>Ikki:</b> I love your hair.<br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(switch to a shot of the children and Korra)</i> It's <i>so</i> you.<br><br><i>(Toph clears her throat loudly off-screen and the kids turn towards the sound. Cut to Toph putting her hand behind her back.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> I'm so sorry. <i>(return back to a shot of the Avatar and the airbender trio)</i> This is Meelo, <i>(Meelo starts to pick his nose)</i> Jinora, <i>(Jinora bows)</i> and Ikki, <i>(Ikki gives a wave)</i> Aang and Katara's grandchildren.<br><br><i>(Switch to a profile shot of the scene.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(steps towards the group)</i> Your grandpa was a real pain in my butt.<br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(removes his finger from his nose)</i> Wait a minute, <i>(flicks his booger away)</i> cranky, <i>(raises an eyebrow)</i> old, <i>(places a hand on his chin)</i> blind... <i>(waves his hand in front of Toph's face)</i> You must be Toph! <i>(clenches his fists excitedly)</i><br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(smiles)</i> Oh, <i>(points a thumb to Meelo)</i> I like this one.<br><b>Jinora:</b> <i>(turns to Korra)</i> You need to come home, Korra. Kuvira is taking over the Earth Kingdom.<br><b>Ikki:</b> You have to stop her.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(switch to a close up of an uncertain Korra)</i> I don't know. I'm not the Avatar I used to be. I can't even go into the Avatar State.<br><b>Ikki:</b> <i>(return back to a shot of the sisters as they plead)</i> Please, Korra.<br><b>Jinora:</b> <i>(camera slowly zooms in on Korra)</i> The World needs you back.<br><br><i>(Korra lowers her head, unsure. <br><br>Scene fades to Pepper and Poki resting outside Toph's swamp home while the airbender children, Toph, and Korra hang around a campfire inside the house. The Avatar inhales and exhales.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> Close your eyes. <i>(Korra does so and we cut to a close up of Toph with her eyes closed as well)</i> Clear your mind. <i>(opens her eyes)</i> And don't freak out like last time. <i>(cut to Korra as she looks a little irked)</i> Now, <i>(Korra closes her eyes again)</i> focus your energy. <i>(switch to a shot of Korra's arms hanging at the side of her)</i> Find the metal. <i>(Korra brings her arms up)</i> Let it move through your body.<br><br><i>(Cut to a frontal shot of Korra as she lowers her hands and bends down slightly, bringing her hands together. A flashback of Korra pushing herself off the ground in the Avatar State is seen. Camera flashes white again to Zaheer moving his arms out to part the finishing blow. She has cold sweat on her face and she looks to Toph.)</i><br><br><b>Toph:</b> <i>(camera pans to Toph)</i> That fight is over. <i>(cut back to an anxious Korra)</i> <i>Release</i> the fear.<br><br><i>(Korra closes her eyes briefly before opening them with a frown. Korra brings her arms in and we switch back to a full shot of Korra as she brings her arms up before bring her arms in and pushing them out again. The liquid metal moves down to her arm bands.<br><br>Cut to a shot of Korra's fingertips as the liquid metal seemingly fly off from both hands in two separate blobs and they merge into a big globule. I won't make any moves until you talk to her and get back to me.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(return back to a close up of Korra as she look down and contemplates)</i> Maybe that will be for the best.<br><br><i>(Scene changes to Baatar Jr. walking up to a pair of lookouts standing outside Varrick's train carriage.)</i><br><br><b>Baatar Jr.:</b> Have you seen Bolin?<br><b>Lookout:</b> He came by to see Varrick, but we turned him away.<br><b>Baatar Jr.:</b> <i>(cut to a close up of Baatar Jr. as he narrows his eyes suspiciously)</i> Open the door.<br><br><i>(Cut to the open hatch in Varrick's compartment and camera pulls back to Baatar Jr. and the lookouts staring at it.)</i><br><br><b>Baatar Jr.:</b> <i>(switch to Baatar Jr. as he glowers)</i> We have some fugitives to catch.<br><br><i>(Scene changes to three platinum colored mechatanks on a hill, walking away from Kuvira's campsite near sunset. One of the mechatanks stops and turns around while the other two continue to walk forward.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(inside the mechatank looking at the campsite)</i> Okay, <i>(lifts a robotic finger up in the air)</i> I say we go up and around the mountains <i>(turns around)</i> and <i>(the helmet on the tank pulls back to reveal Bolin's head)</i> sneak into Zaofu from the rear.<br><br><i>(Switch to a shot of Varrick and Zhu Li. The inventor is standing up from his compartment in the mechatank. Zhu Li lowers her helmet.)</i><br><br><b>Varrick:</b> We're not going to Zaofu. that place is doomed. We've got to head to Republic City.<br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(cut to a close up of Bolin has he frowns slightly)</i> What? No. No, no, no. We've got to help here.<br><b>Varrick:</b> <i>(return back to Varrick and Zhu Li)</i> We'll be helping by warning the World about Kuvira's potential super weapon.<br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(cut to a shot featuring all three of them)</i> Well, that is helping, <i>(the robotic arms of Bolin's mechatank moves along with him as he gesticulates)</i> but it's a completely different type of helping. <i>(puts a robotic hand on his chin)</i> Hmm, let me think about this. <i>(an arc of electricity shoots at Bolin from off-screen, knocking him off his feet)</i> Ahh!<br><br><i>(Cut to a shot of three mechatanks, one colored black while the others are colored green as they run down the hill towards the fugitives. Camera quickly cuts to Varrick as he shrinks back into his compartment with his hands covering his head protectively. Zhu Li enters the frame and stands in front of Varrick's mechatank in a defensive position.<br><br>Cut to a scenic shot of Baatar Jr. slamming a fist down on Zhu Li and a cloud of dust is created. Baatar's backups begin to charge at Zhu Li and Varrick, sending a blast of electricity to inventor and assistant. Varrick quickly scurries away while Zhu Li side steps the attack. Zhu Li then punches the shoulder of her opponent, knocking him off his feet. The assistant then faces the screen and raises an arm, shooting out a cable. Cut to Varrick with his helmet rapidly opening and closing above his head. Mechatank pilot #2 advances towards Varrick but Zhu Li's cable snags him and his mechatank gets tied up before falling to the ground beside Varrick.)</i><br><br><b>Varrick:</b> <i>(taps the neck of his mechatank with his robotic arm)</i> That's not the flamethrower. <i>(the helmet stops opening and closing)</i> What idiot designed these things?<br><b>Zhu Li:</b> <i>(enters the frame and speaks from within the safety of her mechatank)</i> You did, Sir.<br><b>Varrick:</b> <i>(stands up and points to something behind Zhu Li)</i> Less lecturing, more saving my life! <i>(pilot #1 enters the frame and punches Zhu Li's mechatank in the shoulder)</i><br><b>Zhu Li:</b> Oh!<br><br><i>(Switch to a full shot of the scene as Zhu Li takes a step back. Camera pans right to Baatar Jr. grabbing Bolin's mechatank and throwing him against a boulder.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> Ugh!<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of a perspiring Baatar Jr. in his mechatank as he growls menacingly. Camera pans up to Varrick perched on a tree trunk with one robotic arm sparking with electricity.)</i><br><br><b>Varrick:</b> Hey, I think I figured it out.<br><br><i>(Cut to his point of view as he aims at a mechatank Zhu Li is holding to. She quickly throws the pilot away and Varrick accidentally fires the electric current at Zhu Li's mechatank.)</i><br><br><b>Zhu Li:</b> <i>(screams)</i> Ahh! <i>(cut to a close up of Zhu Li's mechatank as it falls to the ground and we switch to a close up of the assistant in the fallen mechatank)</i> Sir, you're making this <i>(closes her arms with displeasure)</i> very difficult. <br><br><i>(She widens her eyes and we switch to the outside of the tank as one of the pilots picks Zhu Li up and tosses her away. In the background, we can still see a torrent of flame hitting the protective earth wall Bolin is hiding behind.)</i><br><br><b>Zhu Li:</b> Wh-ahh!<br><br><i>(Switch to a shot from behind Baatar Jr. and Bolin tosses a slab of earth at the man who quickly steps to the side to avoid the chunk. Switch to a shot of Bolin as he cartwheels to a tree.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> Argh! <i>(bends the earth beneath the tree)</i> Yah! <i>(tosses the tree off-screen)</i><br><br><i>(Cut to Baatar Jr. as he tries to get away but the tree trunk collapses on top of him and he grunts. Cut to Varrick with his the arms of his mechatank tied up against the machine's torso. There is a mechatank pilot grabbing Varrick's mechatank and shaking it. The inventor quickly slides out of the mechatank and onto the ground before quickly standing up and running away. Zhu Li lands on the ground and quickly pushes herself up. It was sadness. <i>(looks down)</i> You tainted our past and destroyed our future together.<br><b>Hiroshi:</b> I want to make amends.<br><b>Asami:</b> <i>(looks up at her father)</i> I'm not sure I'll ever be able to forgive you, <i>(return back to a frontal shot of Asami as her expression softens slightly)</i> but that doesn't mean I shouldn't try. <i>(picks up her bag from under the table and we switch to a shot of her hand sliding a Pai Sho board onto the table)</i> I thought we could play some Pai Sho, <i>(cut back to Asami as she gives a soft smile)</i> like we used to.<br><b>Hiroshi:</b> <i>(cut to Hiroshi as he smiles as well)</i> Nothing would make me happier.<br><br><i>(Switch to a full shot of the room as Hiroshi makes the first move on the Pai Sho board.<br><br>Scene changes to a metal door sliding open to reveal Baatar Jr. and he walks into Kuvira's office. Switch to a full view of the inside of the tent.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(pleads)</i> Don't torture us.<br><b>Kuvira:</b> <i>(stands up and we cut to a close up of Kuvira and her fiance)</i> Send these three away on the next train. <i>(switch to a view of Bolin and Zhu Li as they listen to their punishment with blank expressions on their faces)</i> Bolin and Zhu Li will be going to the re-education camp <i>(camera pulls back to reveal Varrick)</i> for our most severe dissenters. <i>(Kuvira steps into frame and is almost nose to nose with Varrick)</i> And you will continue work on the spirit energy project under close, <i>armed</i> supervision. <i>(walks away and we switch to a shot from the floor of the room looking up)</i> I want it weaponized immediately.<br><b>Zhu Li:</b> <i>(takes a few steps forward and drops to her knees behind Kuvira)</i> Please, have mercy on me! Don't send me away, <i>(opens her palms out to Kuvira)</i> take me back!<br><b>Kuvira:</b> <i>(switch to a back view shot of Kuvira as she turns around and scrutinizes Zhu Li)</i> Why would I?<br><b>Zhu Li:</b> <i>(cut to a close up of Zhu Li with her boss and Bolin behind her)</i> Because my only mistake was being loyal <i>(her eyes gaze to the side to Varrick behind her)</i> to the wrong person. <i>(Varrick is shocked by the revelation and Zhu Li looks down sadly)</i> I was blindly devoted to Varrick, <i>(Varrick frowns in the background)</i> and I looked past <i>all</i> the times he ridiculed me <i>(closes her eyes)</i>  or ordered me around or <i>(opens her eyes)</i> made me clean his disgusting feet, <i>(Varrick raises a confused eyebrow)</i> because I thought he possessed the most brilliant mind in the World. But when I met you, I realized I was wrong. Compared to you, Varrick's a fool.<br><b>Varrick:</b> <i>(outraged)</i> Hey, come on. I'm right here.<br><b>Zhu Li:</b> <i>(ignores Varrick)</i> I believe in everything you've done, <i>(return back to Kuvira who is now listening with a raised eyebrow)</i> and I believe in your vision. I want to devote my life to you. I pledge my allegiance to you, Great Uniter.<br><b>Kuvira:</b> You two could learn something from her. Rise, Zhu Li. I'll give you another chance.<br><br><i>(Switch to a full shot of the room as Zhu Li stands up.)</i><br><br><b>Varrick:</b> <i>(walks up to Zhu Li and pleads)</i> Think about what you're doing. We're partners. We have history.<br><br><i>(Cut to an over the shoulder shot from behind Varrick looking at Zhu Li and Kuvira.)</i><br><br><b>Zhu Li:</b> <i>(angered)</i> I did everything you ever asked of me, and you <i>never</i> appreciated it. Guards, <i>(points at Varrick)</i> do the thing.<br><br><i>(A metalbender enters the frame and grabs Varrick's arm, dragging him off-screen.)</i><br><br><b>Varrick:</b> No, <i>(cut to a close up of a panicked Varrick as two metalbenders drag him out of the room)</i> not the thing! <i>(opens his palms out to Zhu Li)</i> Zhu Li! <i>(the door slides close)</i><br><br><i>(Location changes to Baatar Sr. pacing up and down a flower garden near Su's residence with his arms crossed. Korra enters the frame and runs up to him.)</i><br><br><b>Korra:</b> Where's Su? <i>(cut to a close up of Baatar Sr. as Korra stops in front of the architect)</i> I have to talk to her.<br><b>Baatar Sr.:</b> <i>(lowers his arms)</i> She's not here. <i>(the camera slowly zooms in on the duo)</i> She took Wing and Wei. They're going to sneak into Kuvira's camp and put an end to this.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(cut to a horrified Korra)</i> No.<br><br><i>(Tense music continues to play before it ends abruptly.)</i><br><br><br><br>[End Credits]<br>
<b>The Battle of Zaofu</b><br><b>Written By:</b> Tim Hedrick<br><b>Directed By:</b> Melchior Zwyer<br><b>Storyboard By:</b> Sol Choi, Elsa Garagarza, Shaun O'Neil, Owen Sullivan<br><b>Animation By:</b> Studio Mir<br><b>Transcribers:</b> Icy_Ashford, Psycho Silver<br><br><br><br><i>[Previously on "The Legend of Korra" sequence, including clips from "Enemy at the Gates".]</i><br><br><br><b>Shiro Shinobi:</b> Kuvira threatens to take Zaofu by force. After tensions flared between Su Bei Fong and her former protege, Korra brokered a truce. But it was too late. Su and her sons were already on their way to put an end to Kuvira. Meanwhile, Bolin and Varrick learned of Kuvira's true tyrannical intent and deserted her army. But they were captured and betrayed by Zhu Li. Now they're being held against their will.<br><br><br><br><u><b>Act I</b></u><br><br><i>(Episode opens to Kuvira's campsite at night and mechatanks stand guard around Kuvira's tent. Camera pans out to a full view of the campsite and searchlights can be seen searching up and down the camp grounds in the distance. In the foreground, a soldier patrols the hill near the campsite with a flashlight in hand. Suddenly, a strip of metal is bent around his mouth and his shouts are muffled. He throws away the light in surprise as a cable shoots out from a nearby bush and wraps around his ankles, knocking him off his feet. He continues to groan behind the makeshift gag as his body is dragged into the shrubs. Cut to a view of the bushes and camera pans up to the branch of the tree above the bush as three cables shoot out and wrap themselves around the tree branch.<br><br>Switch to a slight close up of the branch as the cables reel upwards. Three figures clad in black stealth suits land on the branch and they are the silhouettes of Su and her twin sons.)</i><br><br><b>Wing:</b> <i>(whispers)</i> Are you sure this will work? <i>(cut to a close up of the trio)</i> Even without Kuvira, they could still crush us.<br><b>Su:</b> Most of this army has been forced into service by Kuvira. If we take her out, they'll have no reason to fight. <i>(cut to a frontal shot of Su's face as she pulls the hood of her suit up, covering her head)</i> Tonight we end her reign of terror. <i>(she pulls up another portion of her mask to cover her mouth and nose, only leaving her eyes unprotected)</i><br><br><i>(Scene changes to a mechatank patrolling the grounds where the tanks are parked. Camera pans down a tank to reveal Su and her sons hiding under it. Switch to a shot of even more parked tanks as Su peeks out from behind one and quickly ducks behind it when a searchlight beams in her direction. As the light moves away, Su and her son move forward. In the foreground, the other twin advances as well. <br><br>Cut to a bunch of supply crates and energy generators in front of Kuvira's tent as the three of them take cover behind the makeshift barricade. Return back to Su as she addresses her sons.)</i><br><br><b>Su:</b> <i>(whispers)</i> She's alone in there. Now's our chance.<br><br><i>(Cut full body shots of the trio as they bend at the ground repeatedly and create small, individual tunnels in the ground. All three of them disappear into the ground like moles. Cut to the floor of Kuvira's tent as a hole is bent open in the metallic floor and Su and her sons jump up from the hole. Switch to the cable holder on Su's hip as she shoots out a cable. Camera pans out to Kuvira's sleeping form with her arms up in front of her face as the cable wraps around Kuvira's torso. Su tugs the body towards her and we cut to a frontal shot of Zhu Li dressed up as Kuvira. It was a trap!)</i><br><br><b>Zhu Li:</b> Don't hurt me! <br><b>Su:</b> <i>(cut to Su as she pulls down her hood to reveal her whole head)</i> Zhu Li?<br><br><i>(Alarms blare and we switch to a shot of Kuvira's tent as the walls are pulled away. Cut to an aerial shot of the tent as numerous metalbenders and mechatanks surround them. Two searchlights focus their attention on the trio. Cut to Su getting into a defensive posture as a mechatank is heard stomping towards them. Switch to Kuvira with two mechatanks by her side.)</i><br><br><b>Kuvira:</b> <i>(walks forward)</i> I knew you'd try a sneak attack. <i>(return back to a shot of the trio surrounded by the army with Zhu Li seated upright on the bed behind them)</i> You were afraid to step up and lead the Earth Kingdom when you had the chance, you were afraid <i>(cut back to a stern looking Kuvira)</i> to join me when I became the leader, and now you're afraid of a fair fight. <i>(cut to Su and her sons, angered and holding their positions)</i> You've always been a coward. <i>(Su doesn't take kindly to that statement and we return to Kuvira as she turns and walks away)</i> Take them.<br><br><i>(The two mechatanks raise their arms and shoot out arcs of electricity.<br><br>Scene changes to the closed petal domes of Zaofu at night.)</i><br><br><b>Jinora:</b> <i>(off-screen)</i> Korra, you have to go stop Su before she does something <i>terrible</i>!<br><br><i>(Cut to Jinora, Opal, and Korra gathered in front of the guest houses. We should be helping her!<br><b>Korra:</b> We have no idea where your Mom is or what her plan is. <i>(switch to a close up of the girls)</i> If we go charging into Kuvira's camp, we could get them all captured or worse. <i>(worriedly)</i> All we can do now is wait.<br><br><i>(Cut to a close up of Opal as she looks down angrily. We have to go break out Mom and my brothers!<br><b>Jinora:</b> <i>(empathetic)</i> You swore an oath <i>(Korra looks at Jinora sadly)</i> of non-aggression when you became an airbender. <i>(frowns)</i> You <i>can't</i> just attack Kuvira.<br><b>Opal:</b> I don't care about the oath. Baatar Sr. walks up to the girls and the children.)</i><br><br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(rubs his eyes)</i> Why is that loudspeaker lady <i>(Ikki stretches in the background)</i> talking when I'm trying to sleep?<br><b>Baatar Sr.:</b> Korra, <i>(Huan enters the frame with very wild bed hair on his head)</i> what are we going to do?<br><b>Korra:</b> Jinora and I will go talk to Kuvira at dawn, and maybe we can work something out. <i>(to Opal)</i> I promise I'll do everything I can to keep the peace.<br><b>Opal:</b> <i>(cut to Opal and Huan)</i> I'll go with you.<br><br><i>(Cut to Korra, the airbender kids, and Baatar Sr.)</i><br><br><b>Ikki:</b> We'll go, too. <br><b>Jinora:</b> <i>(turns her head towards her younger siblings)</i> No. <i>(Meelo crosses his arms and we switch to a close up of Jinora with a serious expression on her face)</i> Dad told us to find Korra, and we found her. <i>(softens her expression into concern)</i> Now you need to stay safe.<br><b>Ikki:</b> <i>(return back to the previous shot)</i> Come on, let us help.<br><b>Korra:</b> <i>(turns around to face the younger kids)</i> I can't risk anyone else being captured. <i>(bends down to their height)</i> You can stay with Baatar and Huan while I work this out with Kuvira. <i>(Meelo crosses his arms again and pouts)</i> Make sure <i>(to Baatar Sr.)</i>  they get back to Tenzin safely if anything goes wrong. <i>(Baatar Sr. nods)</i><br><b>Meelo:</b> <i>(pouts)</i> Aw, man. When am I gonna see some action?<br><br><i>(Scene changes to a train speeding down the tracks in the morning. Huan enters the frame and stops, frowning slightly at Meelo's work.)</i><br><br><b>Huan:</b> Ah, pedestrian. <i>(cut to Meelo's very professional painting of himself in a coronation robe and a crown off to his side)</i> I already know what you look like on the outside. <i>(cut back to Huan and Meelo as the young boy doesn't look amused)</i> I want you to show me the Inner Meelo.<br><br><i>(Cut to a full shot of the art area as Jinora's spirit flashes into view.)</i><br><br><b>Jinora:</b> Help! <i>(everyone turns towards her and we cut to a close up of Jinora)</i> You have to get Korra and the rest of us out of here now! <i>(concerned)</i> Hurry!<br><br><i>(Cut back to Meelo as he drops his palette and knocks the easel to the ground when he slides off the chair.)</i><br><br><b>Meelo:</b> Finally! <i>(fist pumps)</i> Let's get it on!<br><br><i>(Scene changes to an overhead view of Varrick's train car as an engineer and guard quickly run to the adjacent carriage. Switch to a frontal shot of Bolin and Varrick.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> This is everyone. Our half of the train is clear.<br><b>Varrick:</b> <i>(smiles)</i> That's good. We're almost out of time.<br><br><i>(Switch to Baatar Jr. and a guard as they oversee the evacuation of the train staff.)</i><br><br><b>Baatar Jr.:</b> You're insane.<br><br><i>(Return back to Varrick and Bolin.)</i><br><br><b>Varrick:</b> You knew that when you hired me. Bolin, do the thing.<br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(unsure)</i> Uh...<br><b>Varrick:</b> Unhook the cars! Oh, come on, that was an easy one!<br><br><i>(Cut to Bolin's hand as he pulls a lever down. Cut to Baatar Jr. and the guards in their own car as it disengages from Varrick's carriage and it slowly drifts backwards. The door to Varrick's cabin slides shut. Switch to a shot of the train cars from the outside as Varrick's carriage continues moving forward and puts some distance between him and Baatar Jr. Return back to Bolin and Varrick inside the train car.)</i><br><br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(ecstatic)</i> Man, that was great! I gotta admit, you had me going there for a while. I <i>really</i> thought you were going to blow us up. Now, how do we turn this thing off?<br><br><b>Varrick:</b> Oh, we can't turn  it off. We're going to blow up. <i>(a scare chord plays and Bolin reacts with horror)</i> But we had a pretty good run, right?<br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(grabs the front of Varrick's uniform)</i> What are you talking about, a good run? I'm still running! I like running!<br><br><i>(Bolin lets go of Varrick and runs over to the spirit vine energy device and comically inspects it from all angles but he doesn't know what to do. Cut to a frontal shot of Bolin as he glances around nervously until something catches his eye off-screen. Camera pans across to the other side of the carriage and the camera zooms in on the hatch on the floor of the train car. <br><br>Cut to the floor hatch from the outside and the panel swings down. Varrick screams and we hear the sound of earthbending, Bolin and Varrick presumably have tunneled their way out from the bottom of the train car. <br><br>Cut to someone's point of view looking through a spyglass at Varrick's train car. Cut to a frontal shot of Baatar Jr. and the guards that watch the spectacle.)</i><br><br><b>Baatar Jr.:</b> I can't believe <i>(the purple glow dissipates)</i> he actually blew himself up. <i>(widens his eyes as big as saucers)</i> That man was crazier than a sewer-pipe elephant rat. <i>(narrows his eyes and turns towards the guard behind him)</i> Let's get back to Zaofu.<br><br><i>(Location changes to the huge smoking crater in the ground that was created by the explosion. Cut to a rocky wall as a chunk of it gets burst open to reveal Varrick and Bolin coughing. Varrick falls to the ground and continues hacking. Bolin drops to his knees from sheer relief.)</i><br><br><b>Varrick:</b> <i>(laughs and fist pumps)</i> Yes! <i>(sits up)</i> You did it, <i>(crawls towards Bolin)</i> Bolin! <i>(Bolin still doesn't look happy)</i> You did the thing! <i>(Varrick grabs Bolin's head and kisses the young teen's forehead)</i> Mwah! <i>(pulls away)</i><br><b>Bolin:</b> <i>(still steaming)</i> I can't believe Zhu Li worked for you as long as she did.<br><br><i>(Return back to an aerial view of the tornado as the winds continue to push the metalbenders back. We'll be fine! <i>(return back to a shot of the saddle)</i> Just go!<br><b>Opal:</b> <i>(tearfully)</i> I'll be back for you! <i>(she closes her eyes as the tears stream down her face before opening them again)</i> I love you!<br><br><i>(Switch to a shot of Pepper flying away and camera pulls back to reveal the metalbenders and Kuvira watching them escape.)</i><br><br><b>Kuvira:</b> <i>(turns around and throws an arm up in the air victoriously)</i> Zaofu is ours!<br><br><i>(Camera pans across the battalion as they cheer gleefully with their arms raised.<br><br>Scene changes to a couple of Kuvira banners in the city of Zaofu. Kuvira, now with her hair tied back in a neat bun, Baatar Jr., and Zhu Li stand behind the prisoners.)</i><br><br><b>Kuvira:</b> Bring the citizens of Zaofu <i>(switch to a close up of Su and her sons looking defeated as Kuvira commands the residents of Zaofu below)</i> to kneel before The Great Uniter. <i>(camera pans across the scared folks)</i> All who pledge their loyalty to <i>me</i> will keep their freedom and be dealt with fairly <i>(cut to a close up of Kuvira)</i> as full citizens of the  Earth Empire. Now bow.<br><br><i>(Row by row, the citizens sink to their knees to kneel. Standing right behind the group, Baatar Sr. and Huan continue to stand tall and proud, defying Kuvira's command. She is your rightful leader! <i>(Baatar Sr. closes his eyes and looks down.)</i><br><b>Baatar Sr.:</b> <i>(cut to a close up of Baatar Sr. as he looks at his son with sadness)</i> I'm so disappointed in you, Junior.<br><br><i>(Return back to the previous view of father and son.)</i><br><br><b>Baatar Jr.:</b> Take them away!<br><br><i>(Two metalbenders enter the frame and grab them by the arms. Baatar Sr. walks away but Huan resists.)</i><br><br><b>Huan:</b> Get your hands off me. <i>(the metalbender nudges his back and leads him away)</i> You're crushing my individuality.<br><b>Baatar Jr.:</b> <i>(turns around and raises his arm up in the air)</i> All hail The Great Uniter!<br><br><i>(Camera cuts to a profile shot of Su as she hangs her head in shame when the crowd cheers and whistles. The camera slowly zooms in.<br><br>Scene changes to Kuvira bending a small piece of metal in her hand into various shapes. The pattern starts off with a six pointed star and then Kuvira clenches her fist, bending the metal into a rock-like mass before she opens her palm and turns it into a long spike. Kuvira then bends it into the shape of a globe before it turns into a shard.)</i><br><br><b>Kuvira:</b> Are you sure <i>(turns the metal into a mishapen lump)</i> there's no way <i>(bends the metal into a shape of a wave)</i> they survived?<br><br><i>(Switch to a full view of Kuvira, Baatar Jr. and Zhu Li standing at the metalbending training ground at Su's residence. Kuvira continues to bend the metal up and down.)</i><br><br><b>Baatar Jr.:</b> Positive, <i>(Kuvira turns the metal back into a globe)</i> but I think I can replicate <i>(Kuvira briefly changes the shape of the metal into a cone before turning it into a flat disc)</i> his work with the spirit vines and get us back on track. <i>(Kuvira brings the metal up and lets it fall into her palm)</i> I'll just need an assistant. <br><br><i>(Kuvira looks over to Zhu Li. Cut to a shot of Kuvira's face with her fiance in the background as she smiles.)</i><br><br><b>Kuvira:</b> How would you like to help Baatar build the most powerful weapon <i>(camera changes to Zhu Li)</i> the World has ever seen?<br><b>Zhu Li:</b> <i>(lifts her eyebrows slightly as she replies calmly)</i> It would be my honor, <i>(bows)</i> Great Uniter. <i>(straightens her posture, turns away, and walks off)</i><br><br><i>(Return back to a shot of Kuvira and Baatar Jr. as they watch Zhu Li walk away.)</i><br><br><b>Kuvira:</b> Begin dismantling the domes.<br><br><br><br>[End Credits]<br>
